快速获取贝利	Fast way to gain Beli
1.精炼装备失败会产生祝福值，提高下次精炼的成功率。\n2.祝福值越高，精炼成功率越高，当祝福值达到满值时，精炼将100%成功。\n3.精炼成功后，祝福值将被清空。	1.Polish failure brings you luck to increase your success rate.\n2.The more luck, the higher the success rate for polish. Full luck grants 100% success rate.\n3.Polish success will clear your luck.
1.刻印失败会产生祝福值，提高下次刻印的成功率。\n2.祝福值越高，刻印成功率越高，当祝福值达到满值时，刻印将100%成功。\n3.刻印成功后，祝福值将被清空。	1.Imprint failure brings you luck to increase your success rate.\n2.The more luck, the higher success rate for imprint. Full luck grants 100% success rate.\n3.Imprint success will clear your luck.
1.重铸效果享受刻印等级的加成；\n2.如刻印3级的速度为100，重铸效果为20%，则该装备重铸的速度加成为120点。	1.Refinement bonus is based on Imprint bonus;\n2.For example, 100 Imprint speed bonus and 20% Refinement bonus rate makes 20 Refinement speed bonus.
温馨提示：\n酒馆中可以抽到部分限定船员，具体可通过放大镜查看；\n抽到已拥有的船员时，将转化为一定数量的碎片。	Note:\nSome specified crew members can be drawn at Tavern.\nClick [Magnifier] for details.\nWhen players draw a recruited crew member here, this member will be transformed to certain amount of fragments.
三星过关之后开启扫荡	Wipe-out can be activated upon 3-star achievement
1.每次扫荡消耗5点行动力；\n2.扫荡过程中离线不会终止中断扫荡；\n3.背包满时，战利品将通过邮件发送。	1.Each wipe-out consumes 5 vitality;\n2.Wipe-out won't stop when you get off-line;\n3.Loots will be sent by mail when your bag is full.

玩法说明：\n1.每天只能进行1次海贼试炼，胜利后可挑战下一关，失败可重新挑战，不限次数。\n2.已经通关的关卡可以使用扫荡功能，每通过十关必定会获得奖励。	1.Pirate Trial can be challenged once per day. By successfully completing previous stage, player can challenge next stage. \n2.Cleared stages can Wipe-out. Every 10 stages can obtain abundant rewards. 
1.扫荡过程中离线不会终止中断扫荡；\n2.背包满时，战利品将通过邮件发送。	1.Wipe-out will continue while offline. \n2.Loots will be sent via mail if pack is full.
玩法规则：\n1.深海大监狱一共分为6层，每一层由30个守卫把守。击败全部守卫可以进入下一层。\n2.每天可免费闯关1次，每次闯关有3次尝试机会。\n3.击败守卫后有概率获得宝箱和船件。	Rules:\n1.The Great Underwater Prison is divided into 6 levels. Each level is guarded by 30 guards. Defeat all the guards to enter the next level.\n2.There is a free chance for challenge per day, 3 trials for each challenge.\n3.Chests and ship parts can be looted from defeated guards.
1.报名时间为周一0:00~周三19:30；\n2.必须由团长或副团长报名；	1.Register time is from 00:00 Monday to 19:00 Wednesday. \n2.Only Captain and First Mate can register. 
1.海贼大战由周三预选赛和周日决赛组成；\n2.预选赛采用积分制，安排2轮对战，每轮对战根据最终战况获得积分，2轮累积积分排名前8的海贼团将获得决赛资格；\n3.决赛采用淘汰制，八强对战中失败的一方将无缘下一轮对战，四强对战中决出冠军则比赛结束。决赛最多为3轮对战。	1.Pirate Battle includes the Pirate Battle Preliminaries on Wednesday and the Finals on Sunday. \n2.According to the Score System, 2 rounds will be arranged. The Scores are in accordance with player’s performance in the Preliminaries and after 2 rounds' fighting, the top 8 are eligible to sign up for the Finals. \n3.The Finals follow the Elimination System and also 2 rounds will be arranged till the winner is known.
1.准备阶段时，玩家可以任意进出战场，也可以自由在各个分战场之间切换或者调整位置。\n战斗开始后则不能再进入战场。\n2.对战的双方海贼团只能由同一战场的作战人员之间进行战斗，战斗中可手动操作奥义，最多3V3组队。\n3.海贼大战的战斗将保存剩余生命值。只有当战场中一方的3个玩家全部阵亡后，才开始下一波的战斗，直到某一方的玩家全部阵亡，即决出该战场的胜负。	1.During preparation period, players can switch between battlefields or adjust position. But players can't enter other battlefields as soon as the battle begins. \n2.Only the players within the same battlefield can start a battle. Also Ogi skill can be casted manually with battles of 3VS3 at most. \n3.The players who die will not be revived in the next round and HP will not be recovered. Next round will only start when all 3 enemies are dead. Battle will continue till all the players at the other side die.
1.将同一战场中敌方成员全部击败则该战场获胜，或该战场没有敌方人员参战，则直接获胜。\n获胜后得到该战场对应的积分。\n2.战斗结束时某战场双方未决出胜负，则双方都不获得该战场的积分。\n3.比赛结束时，比较双方海贼团获得的积分总值，总值高的一方获胜；若积分总值一样，则攻克战场数量多的一方获胜；若攻克战场数量一样，则攻克最高积分战场的海贼团获胜。\n4.获胜的海贼团将获得额外的30积分加成，将更有利于进入决赛。	1.Kill all the players at the enemy side to win the battle. Or no players join this battlefield at the enemy side, players can directly win the battle. \n2. When the battle ends, if it's still even, then both sides fail to obtain any points. \n3.The final victory belongs to the pirates team who has the highest points in the 6 battles. With the same points, then the team who overtakes the most battlefields wins. With the same overtaken battlefields, then the team who overtakes battlefield with highest points wins. \n4.The winning Pirates will gain extra 30 points which could help a lot in getting into the Finals.
“想要我的财宝吗？想要的话可以全部给你！去找吧，我把所有的财宝全部放在那里！”\n\n这就是世上最神奇、最危险的地方，所有海贼梦想中的终极宝藏就藏在这里的某一处。财富、名声、力量，你想要的一切在这里都可以找到！	"You want my treasure? I can give you all if you want! Go and find it, I put all my treasure in there!"\n\n It is the most mysterious and dangerous place in the world where the largest treasure all pirates dreamed of is buried. Treasure, fame and power, you can find anything you want here!
1.每天只能进行1次夺宝奇兵，每次可挑战多个关卡。\n2.每次夺宝时，含主角最多可选10名船员，中途可调整阵容，但已出战的船员将被锁定。\n3.战斗结束后，敌我双方会保存剩余生命，且战败的船员无法继续作战。\n4.战斗达到20回合后，敌我双方全部船员将判定为战败，并通过对应关卡。\n5.夺宝奇兵中，参加过战斗或正在阵上的船员在关卡重置前将无法解雇。	1.Players can only challenge Treasure Hunter once per day for many stages. \n2.Players can choose 10 crew at most to join the Instance. Also selected crew members will be locked after the battle begins. \n3.When battle ends, remaining HP of both parties will be kept, but the defeated members cannot  join the following battles. \n4.If the score is even (reaching the max rounds), then victory belongs to Our Side but all the crew members who participated in the battle failed. \n5.In Treasure Hunter, the crew members who joined in battle or currently in formation cannot be dismissed before resetting.
       这是一片特殊的海域，地磁、天象、海流、气流都是一片混乱，连确认自己的位置都很困难，更不用说寻找岛屿。这里是世上最神奇、最危险的航道，但是这里却有着一些零星的岛屿被强大的势力所牢牢占据，无人敢挑战他们的权威。	This is a unique area where the terrestrial magnetism, celestial phenomenon, currents and airflows are in mess. It is quite difficult to locate where you are, let alone looking for islands. It is the most mysterious and dangerous waterway the world. But some scattered isles are seized firmly by powerful forces so that no one dares to challenge their power. This is the so-called “Grand Line.”
1.伟大航路中每个阵地由三批强劲的势力所占据，每天只能进攻一批势力，胜利后次日可进攻下一批势力；\n2.阵地中前两批为精英势力，第三批为BOSS势力。活动开始后每5分钟会刷新一波敌人，在活动时间内将所有敌人全部消灭则为胜利；\n3.当战胜BOSS势力后，次日BOSS会率领部队进行反攻。你需要想尽一切办法阻止敌人的前进并尽快消灭敌人，活动时间内在保证阵地未被摧毁的前提下消灭所有敌人则为胜利；\n4.如果阵地沦陷，则需要重新对BOSS势力发起攻击，直到占领阵地为止。攻占阵地后次日即可对下一个新的阵地发起挑战。\n5.占领阵地后，将永久获得阵营徽章。	1.Each stage includes 2 groups of monsters and 1 group of BOSS. Defeat one group, then players can challenge the next group in the next day. \n2.The first 2 groups are elites, the 3rd group is the BOSS. Defeat all enemies in given time to win the battle. \n3.After defeating the BOSS group, the BOSS will come back the next day to fight back, players have to protect the base position and defeat all enemies in given time to win the battle. \n4.Fail to protect the base position, then players have to launch another attack to capture the base position again in order to attack next position. \n5.After taking over the position, Camp Badge can be obtained permanently.
1.活动期间玩家最多可选择14名含主角在内的船员进行战斗，在战场中选择好想要上阵的船员并点击“开始战斗”按钮，即可开始匹配战斗。活动持续期间玩家可任意进出战场。\n2.死亡海上竞赛的战斗中主角可以不出战。活动期间除主角以外，其他被击败的船员将无法再次出战。战败方所有出战船员均算被击败。\n3.消耗10点券/钻石即可复活任意战败船员，每次活动只有3次复活机会。\n4.完成竞赛挑战即可获得对应奖励，胜利达到5场即可完成所有挑战。\n5.达成挑战的奖励会在活动结束后统一以邮件形式发送到玩家邮箱中。	1.During the event time, players can choose 14 crews at most(including the main character) to join the event. Click "Start" button with chosen crews to join the match. During the event time, players can quit and join at will.\n2. The main character is allowed to not join the match. During the event, defeated crews cannot join the match again, except for the main character. All chosen crews of the defeated player are considered defeated, and will need to select new crews to join the match.\n3. Players can revive any defeated crew once by spending 10 Coupons/Diamonds, and can revive at most 3 times during the entire event.\n4. Players will receive corresponding rewards after completing Challenged Matches. Successfully challenging 5 matches means players complete all matches.\n5. Available rewards will be sent via email after the event ends.
1. 匹配赛所有玩家的船员统一使用固定属性，且不记速度以外的其他属性加成。\n2. 匹配赛中玩家只能选择使用已经拥有或者本周免费的船员参加战斗，每周五会更换一批免费船员。\n3. 匹配赛为积分匹配制，系统会为你选出合适的对手。战斗结束后，胜利方获得1分，连胜三场以后（包括第三场）每次胜利获得2分，失败方扣除1分。\n4. 当积分累计达到一定值后还能提升匹配段位并获得奖励。达到某个新的段位后，即使因失败扣分低于本段位最低线也不会掉段位。\n5. 每个月的第一天将清空所有曾经达到过元帅段位玩家的段位积分，并以邮件形式发放对应奖励。	1.In Matching Battle, all players’ crew members will have the same attributes, and other attributes bonus except AGI attributes bonus will not be included. \n2.In Matching Battle, players can choose crew members that they have already owned or this week's free members to join the event. A new batch of free crew members will be updated every Friday. \n3.Based on Rank Scores rules, Matching Battle will choose the proper opponents automatically for you. When battle ends, the winner will get 1 points. After winning 3 battles consecutively (including the 3rd battle), the winner will get 2 points, and if failed once, then deduct 1 point. \n4.When players' points reach designated number, players can upgrade their Rank and obtain corresponding rewards. After reaching a new Rank, players will not drop to a lower Rank even if their points are less than the lowest points of the current Rank. \n5.On the first day of each calendar month, points for players that reach Marshal rank will be cleared, and the reward will be sent via e-mail.
1. 大乱斗由系统指定15个船员供玩家选择使用，只能从中选择4名参赛。\n2. 大乱斗所有玩家的船员统一使用固定属性，且不记速度以外的其他属性加成。\n3. 赢满12场或输满3场则本局乱斗结束。获得胜利次数越多奖励越丰厚。	1.In Super Smash, the system will provide 15 crew members for players, yet players can only choose 4 crew members to fight. \n2.In Super Smash, all players’ crew members will have the same attributes, and other attributes bonus except AGI attributes bonus will not be included. \n3.After winning 12 battles or losing 3 battles, the current Super Smash will end. Winning more battles means receiving more rewards.
1.天梯排位战中选用船员真实属性，每场战斗最多可同时出战5人。\n2.天梯排位赛采取积分匹配制，系统会为您找出合适的对手。\n3.每次战斗胜利可获得一定积分，失败会扣除一定积分，根据积分获得相应段位。\n4.天梯排位赛中有连胜机制，战斗结束时胜利方会根据连胜场次增加一定积分，连胜场次每日24:00分重置。\n5.段位达到钻石1段的积分前10名将晋升王者段位。\n6.每天有10次免费挑战机会，可花费钻石/点券购买额外次数。\n7.每月1日，会根据段位情况结算赛季奖励，届时赛季所有的数据也会重置，迎接下一个风云变幻的赛季。	1. In Ladder Tournament, crew’s real attributes will be used. Each battle allows 5 crews at most to join.\n2. Ladder Tournament follows point-matching system. Your opponent will be properly selected by system.\n3. Points will increase after winning and reduce after losing. Player can obtain corresponding Rank according to Points.\n4. Ladder Tournament has consecutive-victory system. When battle ends, the winner’s points will increase according to winning battles. The consecutive victory times will be reset at midnight.\n5. Players who rank top 10 in Gem Rank 1 can promote to King’s Rank.\n6. Player has 10 free chances to challenge per day. Player can buy extra chances with Diamonds/Coupons.\n7. On the 1st day of each calendar month, monthly rewards will be sent to email according to the Ranking. At that time, data of this event will be cleared. Be ready to compete for the Pirates King in the next month.
当活动在第七天24:00结束的时候，战斗力排名前30名的玩家将会获得丰厚大礼，奖励将会通过邮件发放，请注意查收邮箱。	The event ends at Midnight of the 7th day. The players in the Top 30 for Battle Power will receive abundant rewards. Rewards will be sent via email, please remember to check it.
当活动在第七天24:00结束的时候，竞技场排名前10名的玩家将会获得丰厚大礼，奖励将会通过邮件发放，请注意查收邮箱。	The event ends at Midnight of the 7th day. The Arena's Top 10 players will receive abundant rewards. Rewards will be sent via email, please remember to check it.
当活动在第七天24:00结束的时候，海贼团等级排名前3名的海贼团所有玩家将会获得丰厚大礼，奖励将会通过邮件发放，请注意查收邮箱。	The event ends at Midnight of the 7th day. Only Pirates team that reach Lv.2 or above can join Pirates Ranking.  Members of the pirates team in ranking will receive abundant rewards. Rewards will be sent via email, please remember to check it. 
在活动期间，投资500钻石，即可获得每日礼包领取权利以及每日优惠礼包购买特权，持续7天（活动购买期间7天，活动结束后还有7天领奖期）。当天奖励仅限当天领取。	During event time, players who invest 500 Diamonds can claim the free Giftpack once per day and purchase discount Giftpack for 7 days continuously. (Investment is only available for 7-day event time). When the investment ends on the 7th day, players can still claim and purchase Giftpack in the following 7 days. Please remember to login to claim event rewards each day!
比如玩家购买当天算作第一天，第二天如果玩家没有登陆，那么第三天登陆，玩家只能领取第三天的免费礼包和购买第三天的优惠礼包了，每份优惠礼包仅限购买一次。	For example: Player A invests 500 diamonds, then this day will be counted as day 1, but this player fails to login on day 2 yet login on day 3, then this player can only claim the free Giftpack and purchase discount Giftpack of day 3. And then player A continues to login in the following day 4 to day 7, then this player can totally claim 6 days’ free Giftpack and purchase 6 days’ discount Giftpack.
累计可免费领取如下奖励：<br />第1天奖励：<br />贝利*100000<br />3级宝石箱*1<br />瓦尔波合金*2<br />第2天奖励：<br />贝利*200000<br />3级宝石箱*1<br />瓦尔波合金*4<br />第3天奖励：<br />贝利*300000<br />3级宝石箱*1<br />瓦尔波合金*6<br />第4天奖励：<br />贝利*400000<br />3级宝石箱*1<br />瓦尔波合金*8<br />第5天奖励：<br />贝利*500000<br />3级宝石箱*1<br />瓦尔波合金*10<br />第6天奖励：<br />贝利*600000<br />3级宝石箱*1<br />瓦尔波合金*15<br />第7天奖励：<br />贝利*800000<br />3级宝石箱*1<br />瓦尔波合金*	Invest to claim free Giftpack: <br />Day 1: Beli*100000, <font color='#00EC00'>Random Gem Chest Lv3*1</font>, <font color='#800080'>Wapometal*2</font><br />Day 2: Beli*200000, <font color='#00EC00'>Random Gem Chest Lv3*1</font>, <font color='#800080'>Wapometal*4</font><br />Day 3: Beli*300000, <font color='#00EC00'>Random Gem Chest Lv3*1</font>, <font color='#800080'>Wapometal*6</font><br />Day 4: Beli*400000, <font color='#00EC00'>Random Gem Chest Lv3*1</font>, <font color='#800080'>Wapometal*8</font><br />Day 5: Beli*500000, <font color='#00EC00'>Random Gem Chest Lv3*1</font>, <font color='#800080'>Wapometal*10</font><br />Day 6: Beli*600000, <font color='#00EC00'>Random Gem Chest Lv3*1</font>, <font color='#800080'>Wapometal*15</font><br />Day 7: Beli*800000, <font color='#00EC00'>Random Gem Chest Lv3*1</font>, <font color='#800080'>Wapometal*20</font>

活动期间，累计充值钻石到相应额度可以领取相应奖励，每档奖励仅可以领取一次。	During event time, players can claim corresponding Rewards once only when top-up required amount of Diamonds.
在活动期间，累计消费钻石到达一定数目，可以领取相应奖励，每档奖励仅可以领取一次。	During event time, players can claim corresponding Rewards once only after spending required amount of Diamonds.
活动期间每天首次充值任意金额都可以领取每日首冲礼包,每天只可以领取一次，次日00:00重置。	During event time, players who top up any amount for the first time each day can claim the Daily First Top-Up Giftpack once. Event will be reset daily at Midnight.
玩家每天签到即可获得1次机会参与活动抽奖，更有机会获得丰厚手办，苹果手机奖励！	Players can draw the Turntable once every day after signing in. <br />There is a high chance to receive One Piece Kits and iPhone. 
每抽奖1次获得1积分，十连抽获得12积分	Can obtain 1 point after drawing once <br/>and obtain 12 points after drawing 10 times.
*活动时间截止至{0}\n*所有开启了刻印玩法的玩家均可参与该活动\n*活动期间，玩家刻印每升级成功一次可获赠对应装备升下一级的限时祝福值，直到升满10级为止。\n*获赠的限时祝福值仅在活动期间有效，活动结束后，如您的装备刻印未升级成功，则当前装备获赠的祝福值将会消失。\n*活动结束后，玩家自己消耗海楼石获得的祝福值不会消失。"	*The event will not end until{0};<br/>*Players who activated Imprint function can join the event;<br/>*During event time, after successfully upgrading Imprint by 1 level, player can obtain Limit-Time Blessing values to upgrade the gear. Player can upgrade to Lv.10; <br/>*Obtained Limit-Time Blessing value will be available only during the event. When the event ends, Blessings obtained during the event will disappear if your gear fails to upgrade;<br/>*When the event ends, the Blessings obtained through consuming Small Kairoseki will not disappear. 
*活动时间截止至{0}\n*所有开启了精炼玩法的玩家均可参与该活动\n*活动期间，玩家精炼每升级成功一次可获赠对应装备升下一级的限时祝福值，直到升满10级为止。\n*获赠的限时祝福值仅在活动期间有效，活动结束后，如您的装备精炼未升级成功，则当前装备获赠的祝福值将会消失。\n*活动结束后，玩家自己消耗魔晶石获得的祝福值不会消失。"	*The event will not end until{0};<br/>*Players who activated Imprint function can join the event;<br/>*During event time, after successfully upgrading Imprint by 1 level, player can obtain Limit-Time Blessing values to upgrade the gear. Player can upgrade to Lv.10; <br/>*Obtained Limit-Time Blessing value will be available only during the event. When the event ends, Blessings obtained during the event will disappear if your gear fails to upgrade;<br/>*When the event ends, the Blessings obtained through consuming Magical Crystal will not disappear. 
1.解封失败会产生祝福值，提高下次解封的成功率。\n2.祝福值越高，解封成功率越高，当祝福值达到满值时，解封将100%成功。	1.If Activate failed, receive Blessings to increase successful chances to activate next time.\n2.Higher Blessings mean higher chances to successfully activate. When the Blessings are full, players can 100% activate.

生命成长：影响升级时生命值的增加	HP Growth: HP increases when you level up
攻击成长：影响升级时攻击的增加	ATK Growth: ATK increases when you level up
防御成长：影响升级时防御的增加	DEF Growth:  DEF increases when you level up
技力成长：影响升级时技力的增加	SP Growth: Skill Power increases when you level up
抵抗成长：影响升级时抵抗的增加	RES Growth: Resistance increases when you level up
生命：生命越高，战斗中生存能力越强	HP: Hit Points. The higher HP, the longer you may survive in battle.
攻击：攻击越高，战斗中对目标造成的普通伤害越大	ATK: Attack. The higher ATK, the more damage you may cause.
防御：防御越高，战斗中受到目标的普通伤害越小	DEF: Defense. The higher DEF, the less damage you may take.
技力：技力越高，战斗中对目标造成的技力伤害越大	SP:  The higher Skill Power, the more S. Power DMG you may cause.
抵抗：抵抗越高，战斗中受到目标的技力伤害越小	RES: The higher Resistance, the less S.Power DMG you may take.
命中：命中越高，攻击越容易命中目标	Hit: The higher Hit, the greater chance to hit your target.
闪避：闪避越高，闪避敌人攻击的概率越大	Dodge: The higher Dodge, the greater the chance of avoiding enemy attack.
暴击：暴击越高，攻击触发暴击的概率越大	Crit: The higher Crit, the greater chance of triggering critical attacks.
抗暴：抗暴越高，被敌人暴击的概率越低	Fortitude: The higher Resistance, the lower the chance of taking critical attacks.
精准：精准越高，攻击时被敌人格挡的概率越低	Accuracy: The higher Accuracy, the lower the chance of your attack getting blocked.
格挡：格挡越高，被攻击时发动格挡的概率越大	Block: The higher Block, the higher the chance of blocking your enemy's attack.
攻击加成：提高对目标造成的普通伤害效果	ATK Bonus: Increase damage dealt in normal attack
技力加成：提高对目标造成的技力伤害效果	SP Bonus: Increase damage dealt in skill power attack
暴伤：暴伤越高，攻击触发暴击时造成的伤害越高	Crit DMG: The higher Crit DMG, the more damage you may cause when launching a critical attack.
速度：速度高的船员在战斗中将优先进行攻击	Agility: Determines who strikes first.
硬化：硬化越高，受到伤害越少	Hardening: Higher Hardening means receiving less damage.

消费：	Spend: 
*新装备保留较高的精炼星级\n*新装备保留较高的刻印等级（无视重铸）	*New gear will keep higher Polish Stars.\n*New gear will keep higher Imprint Level.(Refresh not kept)
1.你需要手动选择参与继承的两件装备，继承后旧装备的所有附加效果将全部清空，恢复为初始属性。每次继承消耗20钻石或点券。\n2.继承时根据已消耗的强化费用来折算新装备的强化等级，但是无法超过装备的等级上限。\n3.继承后新装备保留较高的精炼星级，并且同时保留祝福值。\n4.继承后新装备保留较高的刻印等级，并且无视重铸效果，只保留较高等级的刻印效果和其对应的重铸效果。\n5.继承时你可以选择是否将两件装备上已镶嵌的宝石进行互换，默认为勾选互换。	1. You can choose two gears manually when inheriting, all the old gears’added effect will be cleared and restored to original attribute. One inheritance will deduct 20 diamonds or coupons.\n2. Enhancing cost of the old gear will be converted to the new gear's enhance level when inheriting, but cannot go beyond level cap.\n3. New gear will keep higher Polish Stars after inheriting, and Blessing will remain the same.\n4. New gear will keep higher Imprint Level after inheriting, Refine will be cleared, will only keep higher Imprint Level and correponding Refine effect.\n5. You can choose whether to change the embedded Gems between the two gears when inheriting, default setting is clicked.

战友成长	Friend Growth
1.新玩家创建角色后在战友召集活动中填写您的邀请码，即算成功邀请1人。\n2.被邀请新玩家需是在您生成邀请码之后创建角色的玩家，老玩家填写邀请码不算在内哦，为了不影响您的游戏体验，请尽快生成邀请码。\n3.邀请者根据邀请成功的数量可获得丰厚的邀请大礼，每档奖励礼包限领1次。\n4.被邀请者在游戏中达到成长目标时，您可领取丰厚的成长大礼。\n5.被邀请者累计充值付费达到要求后，您可领取丰厚的点券大礼。	1. For new players, fill in your invitation code in Summon Teammates after you created your character and this means you have successfully invited one friend. \n 2. Invited new players refer to players who create character after you created invitation code. Current players who filled in the invitation code don't count. Please create your invitation code ASAP to avoid influencing your game experience.\n3. Players who have invited others can claim great rewards based on number of successful invites. Each Giftpack tier can be claimed once. \n4. If invited friends reach growth goals, you can claim great rewards. \n5. If invited friends' accumulative top-up meet specific requirements, you can claim great rewards.

*每累计充值满1000钻石，单次基金购买价格减少10钻石。<br/>*单次基金购买最低价格不低于800钻石。<br/><font color='#00EC00'> 例：某玩家累计充值了1000钻石，他可以以990钻石/份的价格买1份基金；后续又陆续累计充值了4000钻石，则他现在可以以950钻石/份的价格再买4份基金。</font>	*After accumulatively topping up 1000 Diamonds, the price of each single Fund purchase will be reduced by 10 Diamonds.<br/>*The price to purchase Fund each time cannot be less than 800 Diamonds.<br/><font color='#00EC00'> For example: If player A accumulatively tops up 1000 Diamonds, he can purchase 1 Fund at the price of 990 Diamond. If he continues to accumulatively top up 4000 diamonds, then he can purchase 4 Funds at the price of 950 Diamond. </font>

示例	example
例如,玩家第一天购买了VIP6礼包，他当天就可以领取第一次奖励。如果他第二天没有来领取，第三天仍旧可以领取第二次奖励，总共可以领取七次。但奖励仅限活动期间内领取。	 For instance, a player purchased a VIP 6 Giftpack on the first day of this event, he can claim the rewards on the first day. If the player misses login on the second day, he cannot claim the Reward on the second day but can claim the Rewards on the third day when he login again.

*活动期间，每天登录游戏可以获得3个雪球，用雪球砸雪人，砸的越准奖励越丰富。\n*累计在线满1小时可以领取3个雪球，每天通过累计在线最多可领取9个雪球。\n*砸雪人除了能拿到奖励外还能砸出雪花，活动结束时将根据拥有的雪花数量进行排名，获得丰厚的排名奖励！排名奖励在活动结束后通过邮件发送。\n*你也可以通过充值来获得雪花，每充值1钻石可获得1雪花	*During event time, players can receive 3 snowballs after logging in each day. Players can receive 9 snowballs at most per day through staying online.\n*Players can get snowflakes as rewards after throwing snowballs. When the event ends, there will be a ranking list according the number of snowflakes. Players can have chances to get abundant rewards! Rewards will be sent via email when the event ends.\n* Player can top-up to receive snowflake, 1 diamond for 1 snowflake.

说明	Explanation
1.如在竞拍结束前30秒内仍旧有人出价，则竞拍时间自动延长至30秒\n2.拍卖进行期间出价保证金会暂时冻结，于拍卖结束后解冻。	1. Anyone still bidding within 30 seconds before the auction is over, then it will be automatically problonged to 30 seconds\n.2. Bid bond will be temporarily frozen during the auction and unfreeze after the auction.
1.每天12：00推出一款竞拍商品，持续竞拍8小时。\n2.如在竞拍结束前30秒内仍旧有人出价，则竞拍时间自动延长至30秒，直至成交或到21：00点。\n3.拍卖进行期间出价保证金会暂时冻结，于拍卖结束后解冻。\n4.竞拍成功获得的物品通过邮件发放，请及时领取。	1. Goods will become available at 12 am everyday and auction hour lasting 8 hours.\n2. Anyone still bidding within 30 seconds before the auction is over, then it will be automatically problonged by 30 seconds until goods are sold or until 21:00. \n3. Bid bond will be temporarily frozen during the auction and unfreeze after the auction.\n4. Successfully bid goods will be sent by e-mail, please claim it in time.

布阵	Formation
1.冒险狩猎周1~周6每天开放2次，周日开放4次。“东海霸主”只在每周1/3/5/7日开启，“珍兽奇遇”只在每周2/4/6/7日开启。\n2.“东海霸主”和“珍兽奇遇”都分三个等级。简单级别20级开启，普通级别40级开启、困难级别60级开启。\n3.冒险狩猎挑战限时10回合。挑战“东海霸主”可以获取贝利，对东海霸主造成的伤害越高，奖励的贝利越多。挑战“珍兽奇遇”可以获取经验书，击杀的珍兽越多，奖励的经验书越多。	1. Players can join Beasts Battle twice per day from Monday to Saturday and 4 times only on Sunday. Lord of the Coast will only be available on Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Sunday, while Beasts Adventure will only be available on Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday and Sunday.\n2. Lord of the Coast and Beasts Adventure both have 3 difficulties, including Easy (available for Lv 20), Normal (available for Lv 40) and Difficult (available for Lv 60).\n3. Max challenge is 10 rounds at Beasts Battle. By challenging “Lord of the Coast”, players can obtain Beli as rewards. Higher DMG to Lord of the Coast means more Beli in return. By challenging Beasts Adventure, players can obtain EXP Books. Killing more Beasts can obtain more EXP books.

游荡在大海上的海贼们终于和世界政府的正义机构海军发生了正面冲突，战争一触即发！	After wandering in the ocean for some time, the Pirates finally directly confront the Marines. A massive war between Marines and Pirates is coming!
报名参赛	Register
已报名	Registered
未报名	Not Register Yet
奖励预览	Rewards Preview
规则说明：\n1、活动于19:30开始报名，报名后即可进入战场。报名时间持续10分钟，19:40战斗正式打响，届时将不可再进入战场。\n 2、在战场中和敌对阵营的玩家进行1V1的战斗，战斗胜利可获得大量积分，且连胜数越高获得的积分越多。失败也可获得少量积分，具体数量和击败对手的船员数量有关。\n3、每个玩家初始有100点士气，PK失败扣除20点，胜利增加10点，但士气上限为100点。当士气为0时，玩家将被传送出战场。\n4、当某一方阵营击杀了敌对阵营的BOSS，或将敌对阵营的全部玩家清出战场，或在达到战场时限时总积分最高，则该阵营获胜。\n5、阵营BOSS由三大守护者守护，每个守护者每秒可为己方阵营提供1点阵营士气，阵营士气每次累计满100时可以转化为1层阵营buff来提升己方阵营全体玩家的属性。击杀守护者可以大幅削弱BOSS的抗击打能力，并可减缓敌对阵营士气提升速度，同时还能为己方阵营提升大量阵营士气。\n6、每个参与战斗的玩家，都可获得个人积分奖励。此外还有机会获得优胜阵营奖励和积分排名奖励。	Rules:\n1.Player can start to register at 19:30, and then can join the event. Time for registering lasts for 10 mins. After the event starts at 19:40, player cannot join the event again.\n2.Player challenge enemies in 1v1 battle on the battlefield. If successful, player can obtain a lot of points. More consecutive wins means obtaining more points. If failed, player will also get a few points which are determined by number of crews killed on the enemy team. \n 3. Each player will have 100 Morale Points initially. If defeated, 20 Morale Points will be deducted, while if won, 10 Morale Points will be added. The max Morale Points is 100. When player’s Morale Points decrease to 0, he will be teleported away from the battlefield. \n 4. If team A kills the BOSS of team B, or all players in team B are teleported away from the battlefield or team A obtains the highest points in limited time after joining the battle, then team A win the victory. \n 5. The BOSS is protected by the three admirals. Each single admiral can give 1 Morale Point/second to own team. Every 100 Morale Points will become one layer of buff which add attributes to the all players of self team. Killing admirals can greatly weaken Boss resistance, and can also slow down the speed to increase Morale Points. At the same time, own team will obtain more Morale Points. \n 6. Each single player who joins the event will receive individual rewards, and also has chances to obtain team rewards and ranking rewards.

护送成功,获得以下奖励	Escorted successfully! Please receive the following rewards.
抢劫结果	Plunder results 
抢劫成功,获得以下奖励	Plundered successfully. These rewards are for you: 
规则：\n1.每天可以护送4次，抢夺3次。\n2.只能在活动期间内接受护送任务。抢夺则没有时间限制，只要有护送中的货船即可抢夺。\n3.升级货船有概率使你的船升级成为更高级的货船，大大提升你的护送奖励。\n4.护送时可以邀请你海贼团内的成员帮忙协助，如遇抢夺则优先操作协助者的队伍进行战斗。\n5.被抢夺则会损失所有的护送额外奖励，但是成功击退打劫者则可以大幅缩短你的剩余护送时间。	Rules:\n1. Player can escort 4 times and plunder 3 times daily.\n2. Player can only accept the escort task during the event time. There is no limit to the plunder time. Player can plunder as long as there are escorting ships.\n3. Upgrading your ship has a chance to obtain a better ship and more escorting rewards.\n4. When escorting, you can invite your team members for assistance. When being plundered, the assistor's team will battle first.\n5. If being plundered successfully, all escorting rewards will be lost. If player can defeat the plunderer, the remaining escort time will be shortened a lot.

拥有	Own
花费	Spend
自动强化	Auto Enhance
强化消耗宝物精华和贝利，自动强化会直接强化至下一级或材料不足	Enhancing costs Token's Spirit and Beli, Auto Enhance will directly enhance to next level or lead to inadquate material.
规则：\n1.强化需要消耗宝物精华和贝利，每次强化增加一定强化经验值。\n2.当强化经验值满时宝物强化等级+1并增加对应宝物属性。\n3.自动强化会直接强化至下一级或材料不足。	Rules: \n1. Enhance will consume Token Spirit and Beli, each Enhance will increase certain Enhance EXP. \n2.  When Enhance EXP is full, token's enhance level will +1 and corresponding token's attributes will increase. \n3. Auto Enhance will directly enhance to the next level or lead to not enough materials.
需要分解的物品	Items need to be dismantled
分解获得	Diamantle to get
一键放入	Place in All
投入的宝物数量越多，得到特殊材料概率越高，一次性投入5个宝物必定获得特殊材料。	More token you put in means greater chance you get special materials. Must get special materials by putting 5 tokens at one time.
规则：\n1.投入宝物分解，必定获得精华，有概率获得特殊材料。\n3.2.投入的宝物数量越多，获得特殊材料概率越高，一次性投入5个宝物必定获得特殊材料。\n3.3.分解会返还80%强化的精华。	Rules:\n1. Dismantle token must get spirit, and has chance to get special materials.\n2. More token you put in means greater chance you get special materials. Must get special materials by putting 5 tokens at one time.\n3. Dismantle can return 80% of enhanced spirit.
打造材料	Forge materials
特殊材料	Special materials
材料品质	Material quality
宝物品质	Token quality
打造目标品质概率:{0}	Probability to forge token of target quality:{0}
使用一个保护材料	Use one protective material.
规则：\n1.可将背包中的材料拖入打造间进行宝物打造，每个宝物具有一定的价值。\n2.打造成功会根据拖入的材料总价值产出目标品质的随机部位宝物，失败则得到其余品质的随机宝物。\n3.打造时加入特殊材料可控制产出宝物的部位，特殊材料本身具备非常高的打造价值。\n3.4.打造时可勾选使用打造保护符，可提升打造成功率。\n3.5.每次打造需要消耗500000贝利.\n3.6.同时穿戴【优秀】以上的同品质指定宝物之间可产生宝物套装效果。	Rules:\n1. Place materials in the bag into forge room to forge token, every token has certain value.\n2. After forging successfully, random token parts of target quality will be produced based on source materials' total value. You will get the random token of other quality if failed.\n3. Add special materials when forging can control produced token parts, special materials have very high forging value.\n4. You can choose to use Protection Talisman when forging which will increase success rate.\n5. Each forge will consume 500,000 Belis.\n6. Equip certain tokents of same quality and [Excellent] or above qualities can have Token Sets Effect.

位于伟大航路中的巨大沙漠王国阿拉巴斯坦，遍地废墟的沙漠王国究竟隐藏什么故事？	The giant Alabasta Kingdom is located on Sandy Island; what is hidden within the ruins of Alabasta?
经由“生或死的危险航路”才可能到达的，不存在于世人记忆中的梦幻之岛――黄金乡！	The only way to reach it is through the Knock Up Stream. This is the home of Shandora, the "City of Gold"!
世界政府设立的不夜之岛，被押到司法岛就必定被认为有罪，象征着海军绝对的正义！	Established by the World Government, it is also known as Never-Night Island. Anyone who is sent to the Judicial Island is considered guilty, a representation of the Marine's Justice!
每年有超过100艘以上的船只失踪的魔幻岛屿，四周浓雾缭绕，神秘而可怕。	Every year, more than 100 vessels get lost around this mystical island which is surrounded by thick fog.
由多颗大树构成，会从地底冒出气泡的神奇岛屿，想要进入新世界，就来香波地镀膜吧！	Even though it is called "Archipelago", it is actually a massive mangrove forest which produces magical bubbles. If you want to enter, get your ship coated at Sabody Archipelago!
位于海底的因佩尔顿大监狱，关押着世界上最凶恶的罪犯，拥有“铜墙铁壁”之称。	Impel Down, located underwater at Calm Belt, is the World Government's maximum-security prison for the most dangerous criminals and pirates.
影响时代走向的战役，“四皇”白胡子对阵海军精锐与七武海联军，谁将胜出？	The war which changed the world in which "Yonko" Whitebeard battle against Marine's Greatest Military Power and the Shichibukai. Who will win the ultimate victory?
伟大航路的后半段，又被称为新世界，是最困难、最危险的海域，由“四皇”统治！	The second half of the Grand Line, also known as "New World", is considered the most dangerous and the toughest region. It is also ruled by the Yonko.

随机获得一级宝石	Lv1 Gem
* 自带增加20怒气的被动使得无进场冷却的奥义可以在第一回合就释放，奥义附带的燃烧效果可以和女法打出一套combo。<br />* 德雷克和乌尔基的老牌劲旅组合现在依然强力，马赫巴伊斯的加入使得你的生存能力也获得了较大的提升。	*Add 20 Fury points can allow crews without CD time to cast Ogi skill in the first round. Burning debuff along with the Ogi skill can allow Dark Mage to make a combo.<br />*The team of X Drake and Urouge is still strong and popular. Drag Machivise to Formation can make you survive longer in battle. 
*该阵容中霍迪琼斯、鹰眼、卡库3人每回合都能进行2次普攻，再配上剑客男主的奥义【绝影】，第一回合就能给对面造成成吨的伤害。<br />*你也可以尝试用拥有暴击光环的【乌尔基】、拥有吸血光环和打断技能的【拉奥G】、拥有控制技能的【范德戴肯】来代替部分船员。<br />*合理的搭配将使你的战斗更加轻松。	* When Sailor uses Additional Strike skill, Hordy Jones, Mihawk and Kaku can deal DMG twice for each round, which can deal great DMG to enemies in the first round.<br />* Players can replace some crews with Urouge, Lao G and Vander Decken. <br />* Reasonable arrangement of your crew can defeat enemies more easily.
*福克西的奥义【迟缓光线】可以让对手减速，马尔科可以和女法打出一套combo。<br />*在现在满大街都是男枪的时代一个拥有嘲讽的船员是多么的有必要，但有的时候罗布路奇并不一定是最好的选择，你可以使用马赫巴伊斯来代替他，【10吨拜斯】可以让你多控制一个对手。<br />*佩罗娜是MVP的存在，【幽灵附体】可以让你连续放出奥义，连续的减速和沉默可以让你的对手毫无还手之力。	* Foxy’s Ogi skill-Noro Noro Beam can slow down enemy’s Agility. Marco and Dark Mage can become a combo.<br />* It is necessary to have a crew that can attract enemies’ attack. Both Locci and Machvise are good choice!<br />* Perona’s Ogi skill- Negative Skill can clear CD of Ogi skill for all allies and clear Debuff. Thus, other crews can cast Ogi skill continuously. More and more slow Agility and Trap Debuff to enemies can make them receive high DMG.
* 两个奶妈&两个肉盾的存在可以使你的生存能力异常强大，同时马尔科的【不死鸟果实】还能让对手燃烧，配合船医的【淬毒】，依靠稳定DOT伤害来慢慢磨死对手。<br />* 基德的被动【守护】可以让他越打越强，不过缺点是奥义【磁力风暴】非瞬发，你也可以使用乔兹来替代它。	* Two healers and two tanks can survive longer in the battle. Marco’s skill- Phoenix Fruit can cast Burning Debuff to enemies and Doc’s skill- Envenomed can deal Poison Debuff to enemies. Thus you can deal stable DOT DMG to enemies until they are defeated.<br />* Kid’s Passive skill- Protection that greatly increase self ATK and slightly increase self DEF makes him deal more DMG as he battles more rounds. You can replace him with Chopper as Kid’s Ogi skill- Genocide Raid is non-instant.
*该阵容配合罗宾的被动，使你在第一回合中就可以同时使用男枪和多弗朗明哥的奥义，造成爆炸性的伤害。<br />*即使没有华丽的阵容，多弗朗明哥也能对敌人造成成吨的伤害。【乌尔基】就是个不错的选择，他的两个被动【巨大化】和【铁杵】可以给多弗朗明哥提供不小的加成效果。	*With the help of Robin’s passive skill, Sniper and Doflamingo can cast Ogi skill in the first round to deal tons of DMG.<br />*Even without the help of other very strong partner, Doflamingo alone can deal great DMG. Urouge is a good option. His skill-Gigantism and Iron Bar can increase great Crit Hit and DMG to Doflamingo. 
*乔巴【圣诞节】可以和任何职业的主角进行搭配，充足的治疗量和自保能力让其可以为团队源源不断的提供恢复。<br />*你可以在夺宝奇兵中使用乔巴【圣诞节】，保证健康的队伍状态过关可以让你的闯关更为顺利。	* Chopper [Xmas] can be partner for every class. Recovering high HP for self allies and for himself enables him to supply HP for allies continuously. <br />* Players can add Chopper [Xmas] to Formation when challenging Treasure Hunter to win more smoothly and easily. 
*暗术士和福克西先手控场两回合，可以让对手无力反击。<br />*艾尼路的【雷电】效果和僵尸奥兹的非瞬发晕眩，在减速效果的辅助下可以更好的发挥作用。<br />*在面对时下流行的男枪爆发流时可以考虑带上一个拥有嘲讽技能的船员。	*Dark Mage and Foxy can cast Debuff for 2 rounds, which can prevent enemies casting skill. <br />*Enel’s Thunder debuff and Zombie Oars’ non-instant Stun debuff are very effective under the slow speed condition. <br />* It is necessary to add a crew that can attract enemies’ attack.  
*该阵容主打控制流，每个人都带有控制，使你能掌握战场主动权。<br />*霍金斯的【降魔之相】能有效的让你免于被对手集火的尴尬。<br />*此阵容唯一的缺点是过于依赖怒气，女法的【黑暗祭祀】和艾尼路的【神罚】多少能为你缓解一下这个问题。	*This is a formation of control, each crew can cast Debuff to control enemies.<br />* Hawkins’s Ogi skill-Goma no So can help one of your allies to receive 80% HP after receiving fatal DMG.<br />*The obvious weakness of such a formation is Fury. However, Dark Mage’s passive skill-Dark Sacrifice and Enel’s passive skill-Holy Pressure can help to restore certain amount of fury.
*路飞作为一个半肉，【橡皮・巨人火箭炮】可以在2个回合中连续控制对手，【D的意志】让路飞免疫普通伤害和控制，让你空出一个打断位和一个肉盾位，使你的阵容搭配更加灵活。<br />*汉库克【情人节】和路飞【情人节】真是最佳搭档，路飞可以为汉库克提供大量怒气，使得汉库克的奥义得以释放。<br />*后期佩罗娜刷新CD将对对手造成轮番轰炸。	*Luffy is a half MT theoretically, his skill [Gomu Gomu no Gigant Bazooka] can control targets for 2 rounds, also with the skill [Will of D], Luffy is immune to normal DMG and controlling Debuff. Thus, you can spare 2 positions to add more powerful crews.<br />*Hancock [Valentine’s Day] and Luffy [Valentine’s Day] are matched to each other. Luffy can recover lots of Fury for Hancock to cast her Ogi skill.<br />*Perona can clear CD of Ogi skill for all allies and All Debuffs, thus can deal great DMG to your enemy.
*新版船医的【淬毒】使得buff流再一次步入了大家的视线。同时该阵容两奶两肉一辅助的存在可以使你的生存能力异常强大。<br />*佩罗娜是此阵容的核心，【幽灵附体】可以使得你在3~5个回合中持续的拥有减伤、群体回复手段。	*Doc’s passive skill- Envenomed attracts players’ attentions again. With 2 Doc, 2 MT and 1 support in this formation, you can survive much longer. <br />*Perona plays a vital role in the formation. Her Ogi skill-Negative Ghost can ensure you to decrease DMG received and heal all allies for 3 to 5 rounds. 
*当你在使用维尔戈时往往需要手动选择目标才能让其奥义发挥出最大的威力。<br />*维尔戈和鹰眼都比较依赖奥义来轰炸对手，所以这里选择了砂糖以便迅速的获得怒气。<br />*你需要安然的度过第一回合，之后在第二回合中重创对手，所以你也可以适当的使用一些防御性伙伴。总之，合理的搭配将使你的战斗更加轻松。	*When using Vergo, players need to click targets to cast his Ogi skill to deal more DMG to opponents. <br />*Vergo and Mihawk are both good at dealing DMG with Ogi Skill, so that Sugar is very useful to recover Fury Points.<br />*After surviving through the first round, opponents can get heavy DMG at the second round. Crew members of Tanks are also good for the team. Anyway, a proper formation ensures you to enjoy the game more! 
*马尔科开启第二个被动【不死鸟果实】后和女法的配合十分巧妙，马尔科奥义让对方全体燃烧，女法的【心炎焚化】则攻击所有燃烧的敌人。两波aoe加燃烧的伤害，一轮下来就可以让对面血量告急了。<br />*罗宾的存在可以让你开场就有40怒气，只要速度够快，马尔科就可以直接奥义开始轰炸。并且罗宾的另一个被动【花花果实】可以大幅提升满血队员的伤害，所以优先出手显的尤为重要。<br />*常言道进攻就是最好的防守，这套阵容追求的就是伤害最大化，用连续的AOE直接将对方砸趴下。此阵容总体来说没有太大的缺点，唯一不足之处就是太依赖奥义了，万一奥义被打断或怒气不足则输出将大打折扣。	*Marco’s passive skill-[Phoenix Fruit] and Dark Mage’s skill-[Dark Fire] are matched well. Marco’s passive Ogi skill can cast Burning debuff to all enemies and Dark Mage’s skill can deal great Skill Power DMG to all Burning enemies. Enemies’ HP will be reduced a lot after receiving AOE and Burning debuff.<br />*Players can have 40 Fury Points with Robin on formation. Marco can cast Ogi skill directly as long as players have higher Agi. Robin’s passive skill-[Flower-Flower Fruit] can increase great DMG for all allies with full HP, so it is very important that who can cast skill first. <br />*Attack is the best for defense. The formation aims at dealing most DMG with continuous AOE. The formation doesn’t have obvious disadvantages, but is too dependent on crew member’s Ogi skill. DMG that can be dealt will be reduced if the Ogi skill is interrupted or short of Fury Points. 
* 自带增加20怒气的被动，配上觉醒后的马尔科和女法，使你开场就能打出一套奥义的Combo。<br />* 请合理利用【花花果实】的效果，务必在满血时把最大效果发挥出来。<br />* 德雷克和乌尔基的组合在前期十分强力，不至于使你后继无力。	* With the passive skill-increasing self side Fury by 20 points, when Marco and Dark Mage end their CD time, player can cast a series of Ogi skill at the start of the battle.<br />* Please remember to make the most of the passive skill-[Flower-Flower Fruit]. Cast skill when all allies have full HP.<br />* The cooperation of X Drake and Urouge is very powerful at the beginning of the battle, which can ensure you deal more DMG to the whole enemy team.
*说这是目前的最强组合一点也不夸张，路飞单体强控，熊和女帝全体控场，再加上佩罗娜刷新奥义，两轮下来战斗已经结束了。<br />*熊和路飞本来就可以作为半个肉盾站在前排，如果碰到男枪一波流好不容易切死你一个伙伴时，凭借船医【轮回复生】再次站起来的伙伴会让对面绝望的。	*It is no denying that the formation is the best one for now. Luffy [Valentine] Stun for 2 rounds with a chance for Crit. Hit. Moreover, Kuma and Hancock [Valentine] deal both normal and Skill Power DMG for the whole enemy team. Cooperated with Perona’s Ogi skill-[Negative Ghost] clear CD of Ogi skill for all allies and All Debuffs, opponents will be defeated in 2 rounds. <br />*Kuma and Luffy[Valentine] can be used for half-tank to stand in the first row. If one of crew members is killed by Sniper accidently, the crew member with lowest HP can be revived for Doc’s Ogi skill-[Blessing of Might], which will make your opponent in deep desperation. 
*先利用罗布路奇的奥义让你顺利度过第一回合，并在回合末时减速对手的核心伙伴。<br />*第二回合你可以继续用奥兹来控场，拉开了2个回合的差距后相信你已经掌控了战局。如果这样还是不行，那就用佩罗娜刷新后再来一次吧！<br />*船医的【淬毒】可以为你增添不少的伤害。<br />*奥兹的奥兹是非瞬发，所以利用减速或控场来为奥兹做铺垫就显得尤为重要。	*With Rob Lucci’s Ogi skill, players can win the first round smoothly and slow down opponent’s speed at the end of battle rounds.<br />*In the second round, players can continue to use Zombie Oars to Stun the whole enemy team for 1 round. After 2 rounds, the whole battle will be under your control. If this doesn’t work properly, players can use Perona to clear CD of Ogi skill for all allies and All Debuffs to try again.<br />*Doctor’s Ogi skill-[Envenomed] can deal great DMG to enemies.<br />*As Zombie Oars’ Ogi skill is non-instant, it is very important to Slow Down or Stun enemies to save more time for Oars. 
*这套阵容走的是纯爆发路线，男剑的【绝影】可以让你在第一回合中就造成12次普攻和1次十字范围的奥义。<br />*请根据情况合理搭配阵容，你可以试着用闪电来代替比斯塔，一位能起手解控的伙伴有时候会有意想不到的效果。	*This formation features high DMG dealt. Sailor’s Ogi skill-[Additional Strike] can cast 12 normal attacks and 1 Ogi skill effect at cross rows.<br />*Players can arrange your formation properly according to current situation. Players can replace Vista with Inazuma who may bring unexpected results as Inazuma’s Ogi skill can interrupt enemy to cast skill. 
*这套阵容是物理攻击一波流的代表，罗宾【凋零】开场为全队提供额外怒气，闪电的奥义和狙击手第一轮的爆发在全队被动的增持下会对敌人造成成吨的伤害。<br />*拉奥G奥义为瞬发，第二回合可以有效限制对方技能，使敌方进退两难。<br />*请根据情况合理搭配阵容，你可以试着用佩罗娜来代替乌尔基，佩罗娜的【消极】可以有效的限制对方第一回合的行动，并可以刷新技能使得伤害更为恐怖。	*This formation is a representative of single wave of Phy. ATK. Robin's passive skill-[Withered] increases self side Fury by 20 points when battle starts. Buffed with the passive skill of self team, Inazuma's Ogi skill and Sniper's Ogi skill can deal tons of DMG to the enemy team. <br />*Lao G's Ogi skill can cast instantly. In the second round, He can effectively restrain enemy from casting skill, which pushes enemy team into a dilemma. <br />* Please choose the proper crew for your team. You can also replace Urouge with Perona. Perona's passive skill-[Negative] can effectively stop enemy from casting skill in the first round, and can also clear all debuff for self team. 
*麦哲伦的奥义【地狱之审判】耗怒低，开场无冷却，可对敌方全阵营最多12个目标造成伤害并附加中毒BUFF，是一个最佳的先手技能。<br />*这套阵容打的是AOE爆发，乔拉的【艺术果实】开场为全队提供额外怒气，配合麦哲伦的奥义和乔拉的奥义和女法的奥义可在第一回合造成成吨的aoe伤害。<br />*艾尼路的奥义吸怒为全队提供了更强的续航能力。<br />*马尔科的重生和麦哲伦的毒躯可以站在队伍的最前方为身后船员提供强有力的保护。<br />*请根据情况河里搭配阵容，你可以试着用霍金斯来代替麦哲伦，霍金斯的奥义【稻草人】可以让前排撑的更久，并且被动【娃娃果实】可有效的限制对方的行动。	*Magellan’s Ogi skill-[Venom Demon: Jigoku no Shinpan] costs only 20 Fury without start CD time. It can deal Skill Power DMG to at most 12 enemy targets with Poison debuff for 1 round, which is very powerful to cast first. <br />*This team is good to deal group damage to target enemy. Jora’s passive skill-[Art-Art Fruit] increases self side Fury by 20 points. With the Magellan’s Ogi skill-[Venom Demon: Jigoku no Shinpan], Jora’s Ogi skill-[Dying Art] and Dark Mage’s Ogi skill, this team can deal tons of DMG in the first round. <br />*Enel’s passive skill can absorb all of enemy’s fury, which can ensure other crews to battle longer. <br />*When putting Marco and Magellan in the front row, Marco’s recover after dying and Magellan’s skill of dispelling poison can effectively resist enemy’s attack. <br />*Magellan can be replaced with Hawkins. Hawkins’ Ogi skill-[Goma no So] can guarantee 1 of self allies to survive longer, and his passive skill-[Voodoo Fruit] can cast Stunning debuff to enemies. Player can create different formation according to your needs.  <br />
*索隆【鬼气】的被动【鬼气】每回合攻击2次且杀死敌人后还能继续行动，配合鹰眼的被动【剑豪】可以使整个队伍每回合造成成吨的伤害。<br />*拉奥G的被动为全队提供吸血配合白星的奶量为全队提供了续航能力。<br />*剑客的奥义配合索隆和鹰眼的平砍，能在一回合造成更多的输出。<br />*请根据情况合理的搭配阵容，你可以试着用霍迪琼斯、卡库、特尔阿法加・罗代替白星，这样团队的输出会更加恐怖。	*Zoro's passive skill-[Shock Wave] can deal one extra time after killing an enemy. Plus Mihawk's passive skill-[Great Swordsman] can also deal one extra time after killing an enemy. Therefore, each round the team can deal tons of DMG. <br />*Lao G's passive skill can heal all self allies and Shirahoshi's passive skill can also increase healing effects by 45% for all allies, which can make the team survive longer. <br />*Swordsman's Ogi skill with the support of Zoro and Mihawk, more DMG can be dealt to enemy in each round. <br />* Please choose the proper crew for your team. You can replace Shirahoshi with Hordy Jones, Kaku and Law. Then the DMG dealt of this team can threaten away your enemy. 
*弗兰奇奥义可以驱散敌方护盾和增益效果，配合多弗朗明哥、狙击手的爆发可以对敌方进行有效的点杀，可将弗兰奇放置后手用普攻对敌方进行吸怒，从而保证团队第一回合的怒气需求。<br />*弗兰奇的被动【弗兰奇将军】使得弗兰奇可以顶在队伍的最前方作为一个强壮的肉盾。<br />*拉奥G的吸血光环可为全队提供强力的续航能力。<br />*整个队伍由狙击手组成，弗兰奇的被动【人造将军】可为全队免疫控制技能的干扰。<br />*闪电可以有效的打断对敌方船员释放的技能。	*Franky's Ogi skill-[Radical Beam] can dispel Shield and clear Buffs for target enemy. With the help of Doflamingo and Sniper, the team can kill target enemy one by one. Franky can be put behind another crew to absorb enemy Fury so as to meet the Fury needs in the first round. <br />* Because of the passive skill-[General Franky], Franky can be placed in the front row as a good tank. <br />* Lao G's passive skill-[Jio-Ken] can heal self allies by certain percentage, which can ensure the team to survive longer. <br />*All crew in this team is Snipers. Franky's passive skill-[Cyborg Tactics] clear all Debuffs for all Sniper allies and immune to all Debuffs until the round ends. <br />* Inazuma can interrupt the casting skill from enemy. 
*布鲁克的普攻和奥义都会造成睡眠，并且奥义攻击睡眠和造成燃烧效果，配合暗术师普攻睡眠，引爆燃烧效果，整体AOE效果爆炸。<br />*布鲁克的被动【灵魂演奏】每回合回血可以作为一个MT和马尔科一样顶在队伍的前方。<br />*队伍所有的船员都是恶魔果实能力者，布鲁克的被动【共鸣】可以使小队第一回合的输出达到极限。<br />*艾尼路的奥义可以有效的对地方进行怒气控制。	*Brook's normal attack and Ogi skill can cast Hypnotize debuff. His Ogi skill can also deal normal damage to at most 7 target enemies with Burning debuff. Plus with Dark Mage's normal attack and Hypnotize and Burning debuff, the team can cast great AOE. <br />* Brook's passive skill-[Soul of Play] can recover self HP based on self ATK so that he can be placed in the front row as a tank like Marco. <br />* All self crew are Devil Fruit User. Brook's passive skill-[Resonance] can deal tons of DMG in the first round. <br />* Enel's Ogi skill can effectively absorb enemy's Fury.

打开这个宝箱你可以获得: <br />100活动积分	Open it to obtain: <br />100 Point
name	desc
圣诞节――签到送好礼	*每天在活动页面签到即可领取当天奖励，VIP用户更可获得多倍奖励！<br />*如您错过签到日期，您可以花费钻石进行补签领奖，每次100钻石。
圣诞节――装饰圣诞树	*用糖果棒兑换不同的装饰物来装扮你的圣诞树，每次装扮圣诞树都可以获得奖励。<br />*装扮完成一颗完整的圣诞树更可额外获得80个【多弗朗明哥碎片】！<br />*每天在活动页面可以免费领取20个糖果棒。<br />*你也可以通过扫荡剧情/精英副本获得糖果棒。
圣诞节――圣诞老人的礼物袋	*圣诞节过去了，但圣诞老人却把他的礼物袋落下了…或许…你可以试着翻翻看。<br />*每次你可以从礼物袋中找出6个物品，你可以选择拿走它们，当然那样做需要支付一定的钻石。如果你找到了“乔巴【圣诞节】”或者“罗宾【新年】”的碎片，那么恭喜你，你可以以1钻石的价格拿走它们！<br />*你找到的物品会一直存在，你将它们全部拿走后会立刻换一批新的物品给你。每隔4小时可以免费重新翻找一次。你也可以花费20钻石立刻重新翻找。
圣诞节――打猎啦	*活动期间，每天登录游戏可以获得3个雪球，用雪球砸雪人，砸的越准奖励越丰富。<br />*累计在线满1小时可以领取3个雪球，每天通过累计在线最多可领取9个雪球。<br />*砸雪人除了能拿到奖励外还能砸出雪花，活动结束时将根据拥有的雪花数量进行排名，获得丰厚的排名奖励！排名奖励在活动结束后通过邮件发送。<br />*你也可以通过充值来获得雪花，每充值1钻石可获得1雪花。
情人节――恋爱暴风雨	*汉库克朝路飞发起了猛烈的恋爱攻势，你需要控制路飞左右移动来尽可能多的躲避俘虏之箭的攻击。<br />*在60秒内，每存活5秒就会获得50个汉库克的芳心，但是一旦被击中则会减少10芳心并且逐渐陷入石化状态降低你的躲避速度。被击中3次则彻底石化，游戏提前结束。<br />*如果顺利存活60秒则将进入15秒的加时阶段，此时汉库克会发动速度极快的吻枪，使得攻势越发猛烈。加时阶段被击中1次则游戏结束，如果顺利存活，则会额外获得900芳心。<br />*游戏不限次数，仅取每日最好成绩。
情人节――充值排行	*活动期间玩家充值钻石的数量会进行累计并进入排行榜，仅排名在前30的玩家可以获得奖励，奖励将在活动结束后通过邮件形式发放。

巨型大虾	Giant Lobster
珍宝斑马鱼	Precious Zebrafish

生活在深海中的八爪鱼，在鱼市上随处可见，是常年航行在海上之人最喜欢的下酒菜品。	An Octopus that lives in the deep sea, it's common to see in fish market, we can use it to cook a delicious snack!
只有在南海海域中才有的超级大虾，肉质肥厚鲜美，是不可多得的料理食材。	Giant Lobsters can only be found in South Blue, it's lean, fresh and delicious. A precious ingredient.
每年冬天珍宝斑马鱼都会从北海游到红土大陆周边来繁殖，这时正是捕鱼旺季。	Winter is the fishing season of the Precious Zebrafish, this kind of fish will sail from North Blue to Red Line every year at this time,.
特产于南海的大象O鱼，被誉为“海洋的宝石，奇迹的食材”。	A specialty of South Blue, Elephant Tuna is crowned with the name "gem of the sea", "Miracle ingredient".
东海――和平的海域，年迈的海龟长眠之所，鱼店老板可是一直在收购坚硬的龟壳。	Peaceful East Blue is the place where Giant Turtles live, you can always sell turtle shells for a good price!
每当夜晚降临，在四海交汇之地All Blue的海面中会泛起星星点点的亮光――月光墨鱼。	The shining light in an All Blue night is actually from the Moon Cuttlefish.
传说中深海帝王鳐只会出现在鱼人岛正上方，据海平面3000米的深海中，当真是有价无市。	A kind of legendary fish will only appear on Fishman Island, it lives 3000 meters deep down sea level. It is priceless.

首次解除封印将激活冥王，你将获得下列属性加成：<br />攻击 +150（可通过强化提升）<br />技力 +150（可通过强化提升）	Obtain these Attributes Bonus after activating Pluton's Primary Level: <br />ATK +150（Increase after Enhance）<br />SP +150（Increase after Enhance）
二次解除封印将开启冥王次级形态，你将获得下列属性加成：<br />攻击 +300（可通过强化提升）<br />技力 +300（可通过强化提升）<br />硬化 +600（可通过强化提升）<br />生命 +750（可通过强化提升）	Obtain these Attributes Bonus after activating Pluton's Advance Level: <br />ATK +300（Increase after Enhance）<br />SP +300（Increase after Enhance）<br />Hardening +600（Increase after Enhance）<br />HP +750（Increase after Enhance）

乌索普[狙击之王]	"King of Snipers" Usopp

罗宾[革命之灯]	"Devil" Robin
弗兰奇[人造人]	"Cyborg" Franky
布鲁克[灵魂之王]	"Soul King" Brook
罗宾[新年]	Robin [New Year]
汉库克[情人节]	Hancock [Valentine]
路飞[情人节]	Luffy [Valentine]
草帽海贼团剑士，在鹰眼米霍克的教导下剑术突飞猛进，立志要成为世界第一大剑豪的男人。	Noronoa Zoro is the swordsman of the Straw Hat Pirates. With the training of Dracule Mihawk, Zoro advances his swordsmanship greatly.  His dream is to become the greatest swordsman in the world. 
草帽海贼团狙击手，是躲在暗处伺机而动的智慧型船员，看似普通的弹弓缺总能在关键时给与敌人致命一击，立志成为大海的勇士。	Usopp is the sniper of the Straw Hat Pirates. He is very intelligent and a talented sniper who always waits for the very moment to attack enemies. He is determined to become the world's great warrior.
草帽海贼团厨师，最爱女人，很花心但很有风度，是一个死也不会踢女人海贼绅士。	Sanji is the cook of the Straw Hat Pirates. He is extremely amorous, constantly flirting with any attractive women he sees, yet he is a gentleman actually. His strict rule in combat is, "even if it kills me, I refuse to kick a woman".
草帽海贼团的航海士，精通气象学和航海术，能用身体感知天气，拥有操控天气的魔法天候棒。	Nami is the navigator of the Straw Hat Pirates. She is a highly skillful navigator and a talented cartographer, and also has a supernatural ability to sense changes in the weather with her body. Her fighting style mainly focuses on using the Clima-tact to manipulate the surrounding weather.
草帽海贼团的船医兼宠物，年龄最小的成员，可利用蓝波球结合人人果实的能力进行九段变形，喜欢吃棉花糖，被人夸奖会情不自禁。	Chopper is the doctor of the Straw Hat Pirates and is often mistaken for the crew's pet. He is the youngest member among other crews. With the power of Rumble Ball and Hito Hito no Mi, he can transform  into a human and human-reindeer hybrid at will. He loves eating spun sugar and often blushes when being praised. 
草帽海贼团的历史学家，擅长考古学和暗杀，学识渊博，对于世界政府，海盗，航海的事情都了如指掌。	Robin is a skilled archaeologist and a good assassin; she is also the historian of the Straw Hat Pirates. She knows everything about World Government, pirates and navigation. 
草帽海贼团的船匠，将自己的身体改造成机械，拥有多样毁灭性的武器并且不惧怕任何子弹和炮弹，喜欢将可乐作为自己的燃料。	Franky is the shipwright of the Straw Hat Pirates. His body is equipped with a wide variety of mass destruction weapons including rockets, and all kinds of bullets and shells cannot scare him away. His stomach contains three bottles of cola to fuel him. 
草帽海贼团的音乐家，非常热爱开音乐会，被歌迷称为“灵魂之王”，擅长用音乐置幻敌人然后将其斩杀。	Brook is the musician of the Straw Hat Pirates. He is a great lover of music with the nickname of the Soul King. His technique, Nemuriuta Flanc, can make anyone who hears the song falls asleep and occasionally is killed in the dream. 
原本只是一只普通驯鹿，在某一年圣诞节被圣诞老人看中，从此担任为人间发放圣诞礼物的使者。	Chopper is a reindeer that was chosen by Santa Claus on Christmas. Since then on, he started to act as a gift-giver to bring gifts to people on earth. 
心思缜密的考古学家，世界上唯一能解读历史的人，偶然的机会从历史中发现为新年的人们带来好运的方法。	Robin is an archaeologist who pays attentions to details and she's the only person in the world who can explain history. She happened to find a good way to bring fortunes to others for the new year.
九蛇女儿岛的国王，被无意间闯入女儿岛的路飞吸引，许诺这辈子一定要和路飞结婚并为路飞做一顿能让他吃饱的饭菜。	"Pirate Empress" Boa Hancock is the ruler of Amazon Lily who falls in love with Luffy. She wants to marry Luffy and cook a delicious meal which Luffy can become full from eating.
不经意间闯入九蛇女儿岛，遇见世界第一的绝世美女――汉库克，在汉库克的追求下最终与汉库克结为夫妻。	Luffy fell into Amazon Lilly by accident and met Hancock, the most beautiful woman in the world.
出生在混乱年代的少年在小岛上过着平凡的生活却有一颗成为闻名大剑豪的心，当一群自称是海贼的人来到小岛，少年平静的生活被打乱……	This young man lives an ordinary life in a peaceful island before the pirates' invasion… now he is on the way to seek for power and to become a great swordsman in the world.
古灵精怪的少女从孩童时期就展现出了优秀的魔法天赋，为了学习世界各地的古老魔法，毅然踏上了冒险之旅。	She is a mischievous girl who possessed unbelievable magic in her childhood. Her dream is to find and learn all the ancient magic worldwide. That's why she starts the adventure.
从小听村子里的人谈论大狙击手耶稣布的故事。对狙击手以及枪械产生巨大的好奇，出海后一边寻找耶稣布的足迹，一边收集各式珍惜的枪械。	He grew up with Yassop's legendary stories and showed a great interest in snipers and guns. He searches for Yassop's signs and collects all kinds of guns on his adventure.
来自海边小镇的女孩，有一颗乐于助人的善良之心，年幼时被一位高人指点医术，尽得高人医术真传，从此踏上了救死扶伤的船医之路。	A kind hearted girl from a seaside town, she learnt healing skills from a mysterious old man when she was young. She is going to help her teammates during her adventure.
草帽海贼团船长，由于他的标志性特征是一顶草帽，因此常被直接称呼为草帽。出生于东海，爷爷是海军，父亲是革命家，梦想却是成为海贼王。	Monkey D. Luffy, known as "Straw Hat Luffy", had a father at Revolutionary Army and a Marine grandfather. His only dream is to be the Pirate King and find the legendary treasure.
草帽海贼团中的战斗员，能够自由操纵三把刀战斗。爱喝酒，爱睡觉，讲义气，为了小时候与挚友的约定而踏上了前往世界第一剑士的道路。	Roronoa Zoro is among the top 3 fighters in Straw Hat Pirates. He is a stern, serious and distanced person who cares for his crewmates. He wants to be the world's greatest swordsman.
草帽海贼团狙击手，是出名的吹牛大王，并没有多少战斗力却总是大放厥词，梦想是要成为勇敢的海上战士。	Usopp is the sniper of the Straw Hat Pirates, an easily frightened, anxious, insecure, compulsive liar. His dream is to become a "brave warrior of the sea".
草帽海贼团厨师，曾跟随大海贼红脚・哲普学习厨艺和战斗技巧。梦想是找到传说之海All Blue而跟随路飞一同进入了伟大航路。	Sanji is the cook of the Straw Hat Pirates, and the former sous chef of Baratie. Zeff taught him to be a chef, and trained him to fight. His dream is to find the rumored All Blue.
草帽海贼团的航海士，精通气象学和航海术，擅长偷术，是个能精确画出航海图的天才航海士。最喜欢钱和橘子，梦想是要画出全世界的地图。	As the navigator of the Straw Hat Pirates, Nami is is at good stealing, meteorology and nautics. She is greedy for money. Her dream is to draw a map of the whole world.
非常崇尚美丽，自认为是大海上最美的女人，但是却满脸雀斑，体型肥胖样貌丑恶。	Alvida sees herself as the most beautiful lady in all of the sea, even on her bad hair days; if someone disagrees, she will smash the offender with her iron mace.
海军基地上校，非常骄傲自大。因为抓到了想要隐退的黑猫海贼团船长克洛的替身，而从普通的海兵升级成上校。其实这个上校的身份是克洛赏赐的。	As a Marine Captain, Mogan is a cruel man who rules by fear. He forced people to pay high tax using his marine title, he even kills his own men if they refuse to obey his commands.
巴基海贼团参谋长，此人是个卑鄙，阴险的剑客，专挑伤口打，拿自己人挡炸弹。	As Buggy's second mate, Cabaji the Acrobat is a proficient acrobatic fighter and a formidable opponent. He doesn't care for anyone else, but uses his teammates as protective shield.
巴基海贼团副船长，总是骑着心爱的狮子利基。能够和动物沟通，并能够驱使动物为自己做事，让动物臣服。	Mohji the Beast Tamer is a pirate and the first mate of the Buggy Pirates. He is able to communicate with animals, and Richie is Mohji's favorite pet lion.
原为黑猫海贼团的副船长，助船长克洛顺利隐退后，上位成为海贼团团长。后成为海军本部三等兵。	Jango is Captain Kuro's former first mate,  now he works under Captain Hina as a seaman recruit.
猫人兄弟之一，斑纹猫，和山姆配合起来威力惊人。	One of the Nyaban Brothers, an overweight man who wears an outfit based loosely on a black and white cat.
猫人兄弟一，暹罗猫，武器是猫爪，在西罗布村一战和布奇合力对付索隆。	One of the Nyaban Brothers, he has a hunched back, making him look smaller than he actually is. 
克利克海贼舰队战斗总队长，被封为鬼人，对克利克十分忠心，冷酷没有人情味，就算敌人在他面前哭喊求饶也一样杀人不眨眼。	As a member of the Krieg Pirates, Gin the "Man-Demon" is fiercely loyal to Don Krieg, as he obeys all orders from Don, no matter how brutal or ruthless the orders would be.
阿龙海贼团三干部之一，擅长使剑的章鱼鱼人，用的是六刀流剑法。	Hatchan is an octopus fishman and an officer of the Arlong Pirates. He is a swordsman who is good at Rokutoryu.
阿龙海贼团三干部之一，软骨鱼人，鱼人空手道40段。其必杀技千枚瓦正拳可以在水中击破1000枚瓦片。	Kuroobi is a ray fishman and an officer of the Arlong Pirates. He is a level 40 practitioner of Fishman Karate. His ultimate skill is "The Thousand Brick Fist".
阿龙海贼团三干部之一，接吻鱼人，突出的嘴唇看上去像铁炮鱼，口中可以含大量水吐出攻击敌人。	As a smelt-whiting fishman and an officer of the Arlong Pirates, Chew strongly looks down on humans. He can spit water out of his mouth as just like bullets.
巴洛克工社成员之一，拥有强大的力量，拥有吃了狗狗果实（腊肠狗型）的枪“拉苏”，挥舞枪里吐出的暴弹来攻击敌人。	As an officer agent of the Baroque Works, Mr. 4 has the power of the Mutt-Mutt Fruit and gun-dog Lassoo. He can shoot timed exploding baseballs that weigh as much as cannonballs.
巴洛克工作社高级特工之一，爆爆果实能力者，全身各部分包括弹出的鼻屎和口鼻中呼出的气都会爆炸。	Mr. 5 is the lowest-ranked officer agent in Baroque Works. He has the power of Bomb-Bomb Fruit which allows him to turn any part of his body into a bomb without harming himself.
巴基海贼团船长，“四分五裂果实”的能力者。有着一个大红鼻子，外形像小丑，他很忌讳别人谈及他的鼻子，也因为如此常常发狂及伤及无辜。	As the captain of Buggy Pirates, Buggy the Star Clown consumed the Chop-Chop Fruit which allowed him to separate and control body parts independently. He's touchy for his red nose.
黑猫海贼团船长，因向来诡计多端、计划周详而被称为“百计”。因为厌倦了海贼生活，所以隐退后来到西罗布村，妄图谋取大富豪可雅财产。	As the captain of the Black Cat Pirates, Kuro is an extremely intelligent man (With the 2nd highest IQ in East Blue after Benn Beckman). He once plotted to capture Kaya's wealth.
东海最大海贼团的首领，拥有常人没有的怪力，身上装备了很多武器，自认为自己是天下无敌的，集自大、无情、卑鄙于一身。	As the captain of Krieg Pirates, Don Krieg is a tyrannical leader who is also cruel and oppressive. With a huge arsenal of weapons, he considers himself invincible.
前太阳海贼团干部，是王下七武海之一海侠甚平的手下，与首领甚平不和以后离开伟大航路重新组建阿龙海贼团。	Arlong the Saw is a sawshark Fishman. He was the captain of the all Fishman crew, the Arlong Pirates, a former member of the Sun Pirates and the older half-brother of Madam Shyarly.
阿拉巴斯坦王国的公主，为了解救王国而隐姓埋名加入了巴洛克工作社。	Nefertari Vivi is the princess of Alabasta. She was under the Baroque Works codename Miss Wednesday in order to be a spy plotting against Baroque Works.
原磁鼓王国国王，吞吞果实能力者，专制残暴。磁鼓王国被黑胡子袭击后，抛弃了国民逃到海上当了海贼，也就是布里基克海贼团船长。	As a former monarch of the Drum Kingdom, "Tin-Plate" Wapol abandoned the people and became a pirate when Blackbeard and his crew attacked Drum. He has the power of Munch-Munch Fruit.
巴洛克工社的高级干部之一，蜡蜡果实的能力者，可以用蜡做成任何东西，为了胜利而不择手段战斗的头脑派。	As an officer agent of Baroque Works, Galdino (aka Mr. 3) has the power of Wax-Wax Fruit. He can form and control the wax, he can even harden it to become as hard as steel.
“模仿果实”能力者，可变成右手触摸过的任何一个人，是个外型像芭蕾舞者的人妖。	As an officer agent of Baroque Works and an okama, Bentham (aka Mr. 2 Bon Kurei) owns the power of Clone-Clone Fruit that allows him to turn into the person his right hand touches.
胸口上刺有“摇弊值墓馔纺凶樱快斩果实能力者，刀刃人。可以把身体的任何一部分变成刀刃，同时也让皮肤变成跟钢铁一样坚硬。	As a bounty hunter at Baroque Works and a high ranked male Officer Agent under Crocodile, Daz Bones (aka Mr. 1) ate Dice-Dice fruit. He can turn his body parts into steel blades.
弹簧果实能力者，自小就仰慕多弗朗明哥，成为海贼后加入多弗朗明哥旗下，个性自大、狂妄，认为有梦想的海贼都是笨蛋人渣。	Bellamy the Hyena is the former captain of the Bellamy Pirates, and currently a member of the Donquixote Pirates.
掌管生存率10%的“球之试炼”的神官，象征喜怒哀乐中的“喜”。	Satori of the Forest punishes criminals with the Ordeal of Balls. He is one of Enel's top warriors, the Skypiea Priests. His ordeal has a 10% chance of survival.
掌管生存率3%的“绳之试炼”的神官，象征喜怒哀乐中的“怒”。	"Sky Rider" Shura is the third priest of the Upper Yard, who punishes criminals with the Ordeal of String, which had a survival rate of 3%. He rides a giant flying bird named Fuza.
掌管生存率50%“沼之试练”的神官，象征喜怒哀乐中的“乐”。	Sky Boss Gedatsu was the second priest of Enel, and punished criminals with the Ordeal of the Swamp, which has a 50% chance of survival.
掌管自称生存率0%的“铁之试炼”的神官，象征喜怒哀乐中的“哀”。	Skybreeder Ohm is the fourth priest of Enel, who punishes criminals with the Ordeal of Iron. His victims are cut into pieces by barbed wire booby traps with 0% chance for survival.
表面上是水之七岛的酒馆老板，真实的身份是卧底在水之七岛五年的特务组织CP9的成员之一。	Blueno was the bartender of a bar in Water 7 before he was revealed to be an assassin of CP9. He has the power of Door-Door Fruit.
隶属于世界政府的特务机构CP9。道力值810，拥有“生命归还”的技能。在司法岛事件后于CP9成员一起救出了路奇。	Kumadori is a member of CP9, he has mastered all six techniques of Rokushiki, having a Doriki of 810 and his skill Life Return can control his bodily functions to his desire.
CP9的成员，道力值800。因为常不小心说出秘密，所以嘴巴有拉链，但还是常常泄漏重要的情报。	With a Doriki of 800, Fukuro is one of the weaker members of CP9. He has a big mouth both figuratively and literally.
CP9中唯一的女性。任务是在水之七岛的市长、卡雷拉公司的社长冰山身边工作5年夺取机密资料。恶魔果实能力为泡泡果实。	Kalifa was Iceburg's secretary; as well as the only female member of CP9. She owns the power of Bubble-Bubble Fruit.
三怪人之一，天才外科医师。虽不是指挥官，却可以从主人莫利亚那里随意挑自己想要的僵尸来指挥。	Dr. Hogback is a world-renowned surgeon who entered the employment of Gekko Moriah, assisting him in creating his undead army.
三怪人之一。僵尸士兵与僵尸将军指挥官。透明果实能力者，能够把自己身体透明化，并能够令与身体接触的人和物同样透明化。	As the leader of the Zombie Soldiers of Thriller Bark, Absalom of the Graveyard is one of the Mysterious Four and he can turn himself and other things he touches invisible.
超新星11人之一，基德海贼团的战斗员。头上戴着面罩看不到其真面目，个性沉默，身手敏捷，武器为挂在手上的镰刀。	As the "Eleven Supernovas", "Massacre Soldier" Killer is a pirate of Eustass Kid. Killer fights silently and tends to focus on the elimination of his enemies.
超新星11人之一，北海海军出身，曾为海军少将，现为德雷克海贼团船长，拥有比动物系幻兽种更稀有的远古种果实能力。	As the "Eleven Supernovas", X Drake was a Marine admiral in North Blue, and then captain of Drake Pirates. His Ancient Zoan Devil Fruit ability can transform himself into a dinosaur.
超新星11人之一，“长手族”人，一身中国装束，胸前绣著一个“音”字。全身皆可变为乐器，可以使出音波对目标造成各种攻击及破坏。	As the "Eleven Supernovas", Scratchmen Apoo is a notorious pirate in Grand Line and captain of On Air Pirates.He can release music as Tatakau Music to attack his opponents.
超新星11人之一，能力者，身体内部就像是一座城堡，可以把自己手下，大炮，甚至马变成迷你号然后藏在身体里，出来后会恢复原状。	As the "Eleven Supernovas", Capone "Gang" Bege is a mafia pirate and captain of Firetank Pirates. He holds an army of subordinates within his body with unknown Devil Fruit ability. 
超新星11人之一，背上有空岛人特有的羽翼，块头大，武器是把巨大的铁棒，可使身体巨大化大幅度提升威力，船员以“僧正”来称呼他。	As the "Eleven Supernovas", Urouge is a pirate from skypiea and captain of Fallen Monk Pirates. He can convert damage taken to strength and even change his size.
超新星11人之一，南海出身，有着粉红色长直发、涂口红的女子，性格粗鲁傲慢，是个女大胃王。	One of the "Eleven Supernovas", Jewelry Bonney, also known as the "Big Eater", is the captain of the Bonney Pirates and a South Blue native.
因出生时长相奇特被其母称为“被诅咒的婴儿”，在香波地群岛率领飞鱼海贼团帮了草帽一伙不少的忙。	Duval is the leader of the Rosy Life Riders, who were initially the Flying Fish Riders kidnapping gang in the neighborhood of Fishman Island and Sabaody Archipelago.
大事件后崭露头角的新人，最初想干掉草帽海贼团以扬名却未能成功。进入鱼人岛后意图不轨，但最终被草帽所阻止。	"Wet-Haired Caribou" is an infamous rookie pirate who was at the Sabaody Archipelago around the time of the Straw Hat Pirates' reunion. He owns the ability of Swamp-Swamp Fruit.
深海大监狱推进城原副署长，最大的宿愿便是当上监狱署长。大事件结束两年后，如愿登上监狱署长的宝座。	Hannyabal is an employee of Impel Down. He was once the Vice Warden, but during the two year timeskip, he became the Warden and is now in charge of Impel Down.
白胡子海贼团五番队队长，是船上最强的剑士！二刀流剑士，实力得到鹰眼的认可！	"Flower Sword" Vista is the 5th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
雪茄达摩鲨鱼人，双颚的咬合力道甚至连甜品加工厂的墙壁都能轻易破坏。	Daruma is a cookie-cutter shark fishman and a former officer of New Fishman Pirates. He has powerful jaws which can even pulverize stone walls.
新鱼人海贼团杀手，蓝圈章鱼人鱼，八刀流剑士。和小八是旧识，两人也交手过无数次，但小八却从来都没赢过他。	Hyouzou is a poisonous blue-ringed octopus merman. Prior to his imprisonment, he was an assassin of New Fishman Pirates and was known as the best swordsman on Fishman Island.
初代范德戴肯的子孙，有着非常强烈的占有欲和忌妒心，爱慕鱼人岛的公主白星。	Vander Decken IX is the captain of Flying Pirates on their ship, the Flying Dutchman, and the eighth descendant of the Vander Decken of legend. He has the power of Mark-Mark Fruit.
表面上是凯撒的手下，实际上却是王下七武海之一的唐吉诃德・多弗郎明哥的手下之一。	Monet is an artificial harpy who posed as a scout for Caesar Clown and his underlings in the research facility on Punk Hazard. She is actually a deep cover agent sent by Doflamingo.
唐吉诃德海贼团隶属代号黑桃“琵卡军”的杀手，“爆爆果实”能力者。	Gladius is an officer of Pica Army under Donquixote Pirates. His Pop-Pop Fruit allows him to make inorganic object to rupture and explode till the object to swell and burst.
唐吉诃德海贼团女仆兼杀手，武器果实的恶魔果实能力者，能将身体任何部分或整个身体变成枪炮刀剑等多种武器。	Baby 5 is a servant and assassin of the Donquixote Pirates and an officer of the Pica Army. Her Arms-Arms Fruit allows her to change her entire body into any kind of weapon.
唐吉诃德海贼团中的战斗员。转转果实能力者，其旋转可以像螺旋桨一样在天空飞行，也可以转起暴风。	Buffalo is a combatant of Donquixote Pirates and an officer of the Pica Army. His Spin-Spin Fruit allows him to turn into a rotating man and allows him to fly freely.
唐吉诃德“托雷波尔军”杀手，艺术果实能力者。	Jora is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Trebol Army and owns the ability of Art-Art Fruit.
表面上是德雷斯罗萨的舞娘、唐吉诃德家族特雷波尔军团杀手。真实身份为德雷斯罗萨王国的公主。	As an assassin and officer of Trebol's Army division of Donquixote Pirates, Violet is Rebecca's aunt and 2nd daughter of King Riku Dold III, so she's the princess of Dressrosa.
童趣果实能力者。唐吉诃德家族干部，隶属梅花军托雷波尔。	Sugar is a special officer of Donquixote Pirates' Trebol Army. She can turn any dissenters into toys by her Hobby-Hobby Fruit ability. She is also the younger sister of Monet.
唐吉诃德海贼团的干部之一，隶属方块“迪亚曼蒂”的成员，头爆青筋的光头老者。有老花眼，战斗时遇到近身战时会戴上老花眼镜。	As an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army, Lao G proved himself to be a skilled martial artist, he's able to defeat Thunder Soldiers, also known for speed and dexterity.
唐吉诃德海贼团的干部之一，隶属方块“迪亚曼蒂”的成员，在斗牛角斗场担任最后守关者之一，是“超体重人”。	As an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army, Machvise is one of the officers of Donquixote Pirates at Corrida Colosseum. He can turn into a Super Weight Human.
唐吉诃德海贼团的干部之一，隶属方块“迪亚曼蒂”的成员，“水水果实”能力者。	Senor Pink is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army. His Swim-Swim Fruit allows him to swim on the ground or through walls.
唐吉诃德海贼团的干部之一，隶属方块“迪亚曼蒂”的成员，在斗牛角斗场担任最后守关者之一，奉多弗朗明哥的命令，准备处置贝拉米。	Dellinger is a combatant and an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army.[3] He is a hybrid between a Human and a Fighting Fish Fishman.
原海军总部上士，后晋升海军总部少尉，斯摩格的直属部下，誓言要收齐所有被恶人夺去的名刀。	Captain Tashigi is a Marine Officer serving under Vice Admiral Smoker in the base of G-5.
原海军上校，现海军G-5支部中将。烟雾果实能力者，全身可以随意变成烟雾，烟雾可实体化、困住敌人。	Smoker the White Hunter is a Marine officer stationed at the G-5 base. His Smoke-Smoke Fruit allows him to create, control and become smoke.
原空岛“加雅岛”的统治者（现已离任），自然系响雷果实能力者，自称为“神”，手下有四名神官。	Enel is the former "God" of Skypiea. He can use a variety of lightning based attacks by striking the drums on his back, but was defeated by Straw Hat Pirates 2 years ago.
利用残酷游戏DBF来吞并海贼团的海贼团船长，非常在意自己被说分槽头，很容易沮丧。	Foxy the Silver Fox is the captain of Foxy Pirates and a cheater. He joined the Davy Back Fight. It's a contest among pirates, as the winning side can steal the defeated's members.
CP9间谍成员，在CP9中排行第三。认为自己的道力绝不比卡库差，喜欢骗人，与路奇性格相反，非常讨厌路奇。	Jabra is a member of CP9 also the third strongest member. His Mutt-Mutt Fruit Wolf Model gives him the power to change into a full wolf and a human-wolf hybrid.
CP9最年轻的成员，牛牛果实―长颈鹿形态能力者，道力2200，擅长四刀流，手握二刀，双脚算两刀，故为四刀流。	Kaku was a member of CP9 but dismissed by Spandam working undercover to get Pluton blueprints from Iceburg. With a Doriki of 2200, he's the 2nd strongest assassin  in CP9 history.
CP9实质上的队长，以黑暗的正义为本职，被称为CP9历代最强最冷酷的杀戮兵器，号称司法岛CP9 800年来最强者。	Rob Lucci was the strongest member of the CP9 unit operating undercover to obtain the Pluton blueprints from Iceburg. He was a sawyer, treenail, and bolt specialist.
三怪人之一。僵尸动物与吓人僵尸指挥官。鬼魂果实能力者，鬼魂人，拥有随意产生出灵体的能力。	As the former "Wild Zombies" and "Surprise Zombies Commander" of Thriller Bark before the collapse of Gekko Moriah's zombie army, "Ghost Princess" Perona ate the Hollow-Hollow Fruit.
来自冰之国，是历史上被称作“魔人”的狂战士的尸体。被莫利亚注入了路飞的影子后，拥有了超强的战斗力。	Oars was labeled as the 900th Zombie of the Zombie Army also the only classified Zombie. Moriah used him to keep the stolen shadow of Luffy and the ancestor of Little Oars Jr.
革命军的干部，人妖王伊万科夫的部下。原本一直和人妖王隐居在推进城5.5层中，后和路飞一起成功越狱。	Inazuma works for the Revolutionary who's from South Blue, working under Emporio Ivankov. Because of Ivankov's gender changing powers, Inazuma appears half man and half woman.
超新星11人之一，南海出身的海贼，实力强大却个性残忍，是个兼具理想与野心的人。	One of the "Eleven Supernovas", Kid is a notorious pirate from South Blue and the captain of the Kid Pirates.
北海出生，超新星11人之一，决定自己的行动前会进行占卜，能通过身上的“诅咒”草人来转移伤害，还能自己化身成为草人来攻击对手。	One of the "Eleven Supernovas", Basil Hawkins is an infamous pirate known as the "Magician" and the captain of the Hawkins Pirates. He came from the North Blue.
海军本部科学部队队长，外表酷似金太郎，武器是一柄巨大的板斧，率领了和平主义者部队。	Sentomaru is the bodyguard of Vegapunk and is in command of the Marines' Science Unit. After the timeskip, he has become a full-fledged Marine officer.
深海大监狱推进城署长，毒毒果实能力者，被誉为“监狱最强的男人”，实力极其接近海军本部最高战力海军大将，责任心极强。	Magellan's the vice warden of Impel Down, once the chief warden. He was replaced by Hannyabal and demoted when he failed to stop the jail break.
白胡子海贼团三番队队长，钻石果实能力者，能抵御所有物理攻击。在顶上战争中曾抵御了鹰眼的世界最强斩击。	"Diamond" Jozu is the 3rd division commander of Whitebeard Pirates. He ate a currently unnamed Devil Fruit which allowed him to transform body parts into diamond.
路飞的哥哥，海贼王哥尔・D・罗杰的儿子，白胡子海贼团二番队队长。烧烧果实能力者，人称“火拳艾斯”。	Portgas D. Ace, born as Gol D. Ace and nicknamed "Fire Fist Ace", was the adopted older brother of Luffy and Sabo. Roger. Ace was the 2nd division commander of Whitebeard Pirates.
白胡子海贼团一番队队长，人称不死鸟马尔科，只因其拥有的恶魔果实能力是比自然系还要稀有的动物系幻兽种。	Marco the Phoenix is the 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. He owes his nickname to his Mythical Zoan ability to transform into a phoenix.
鱼人岛的龙宫王国公主，拥有能挽救无数生命或者毁灭全世界的巨大力量――三大“古代兵器”之一的“海皇”“波塞冬”。	Princess Shirahoshi, also known as the Mermaid Princess, is a giant smelt-whiting mermaid and the youngest of King Neptune's children. She is also the current form of Poseidon.
新鱼人海贼团的船长，大白鲨鱼人，极端种族歧视者，小八甚至还形容他“是在鱼人族的憎恨与愤怒之中成长的男人”。	Hody Jones is a great white shark fishman, the former captain of New Fishman Pirates and a former soldier of Neptune Army. He's an admirer and militant believer of Arlong's ideals.
和之国武士，拥有高超的剑术水平，为了寻找自己的孩子桃之助而来到庞克哈萨德。	"Foxfire" Kin'emon is a samurai from Wano Country whom the Straw Hat Pirates found in various pieces at Punk Hazard. He is the father of Momonosuke.
原超新星11人之一，红心海贼团船长。2年后成为王下七武海，手术果实能力者，拥有死亡外科医生的称号。	Trafalgar D. Water Law, known as "Surgeon of Death", is the captain and doctor of Heart Pirates. He's one of "The Eleven Supernovas" and became a Shichibukai during the timeskip.
海军中将，海军支部G-5基地长，实际上是唐吉诃德・多弗朗明哥的最高级干部。拥有极强的战斗力，可以全身武装色。	"Demon Bamboo" Vergo was one of 4 elite officers and the 1st to occupy the Heart seat of Donquixote Pirates under the codename Corazon, also a Marine vice admiral and head of G-5.
与贝克庞克齐名的科学家凯撒・克朗，还号称第一杀戮武器专家。现在与王下七武海之一的特拉法尔加・罗合作，要证明自己才是世界第一发明家。	Caesar Clown, called as "Master" by his subordinates, is a former colleague of Vegapunk. He's the leading expert on chemical weapons of mass destruction and is a demented scientist.
唐吉诃德家族成员，隶属特工部队――琵卡军的最高干部。石石果实能力者。身穿武士盔甲的壮汉，波浪发。声音很尖。	Pica is one of the top three executives of the Donquixote Pirates. He occupies the Spade seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Pica Army subdivision.
唐吉诃德家族成员，隶属特殊能力小组――托雷波尔军的最高干部。黏黏果实能力者，负责专职保护砂糖和地下工厂的一切事宜。	Trebol is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates. He occupies the Club seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Trebol Army subdivision.
唐吉诃德家族成员，最高三大干部之一，统领家族的格斗集团。飘扬果实能力者，斗牛竞技场的英雄。	Diamante is a top 3 officer of Donquixote Pirates. He's the proprietor of the Corrida Colosseum of Dressrosa and earned title as "Hero of the Colosseum"
草帽海贼团的船医，吃了人人果实的驯鹿能力者，人人驯鹿，可用蓝波球进行八段身体变形。	Tony Tony Chopper is the doctor of Straw Hat Pirates. He's a reindeer that ate Human-Human Fruit. He's from Drum Island and the only member who was born on the Grand Line.
草帽海贼团的考古学家，出生在西海的考古学之岛“奥哈拉”。目标是找到真正的历史正文，绝不饶恕践踏历史文物的人。	Nico Robin, also known by her epithet "Devil Child" is the archaeologist of the Straw Hat Pirates. She was the vice president of Baroque Works, known as Miss All Sunday.
草帽海贼团船匠，有着十分出色的制造工艺，用宝树亚当的材料建造了一艘梦想之船，取名“万里阳光号”，并赠送给草帽海贼团。	Franky is the shipwright for Straw Hat Pirates and the eighth member to join the Straw Hat crew. Franky decided to join the Straw Hats to fulfill his dream.
草帽海贼团音乐家，原为伦巴海贼团成员，50年前曾死过一次，因恶魔果实的能力复活并以骷髅状态生存。后为了履行和拉布的约定，正式加入草帽海贼团。	Brook is the skeleton musician of Straw Hat Pirates, who was found on board a ghost ship after drifting into Florian Triangle. He ate the Revive-Revive Fruit and became the undead.
原隶属于王下七武海，具有着沙沙果实能力，能自由的操控沙子，并能将身体沙化，是犯罪集团巴洛克工作社的社长。	One of Shichibukai, Sir Crocodile is the former president of the mysterious criminal syndicate, Baroque Works
原为王下七武海，鱼人海贼团船长，为人行侠仗义，人称“海侠”。拥有可怕的怪力，擅长“鱼人空手道”和“鱼人柔术”，在海中可发挥最大力量。	As the former Shichibukai, Jinbe is a whale shark fishman and the 2nd captain of Sun Pirates after Fisher Tiger. He is a master of Fishman Karate with immense fishmen strength.
原为王下七武海，拥有夺取别人影子的能力，在“伟大航路魔鬼三角地带中与草帽海贼团激战后败北，在顶上战争后被世界政府除名。	One of Shichibukai, Gekko Moriah resides on the largest ship in the world, Thriller Bark. His Shadow-Shadow Fruit allows him to manifest and control shadows as physical beings.
王下七武海之一，被称为世界第一剑客。在草帽一伙分散的两年间，接受罗罗诺亚・索隆的请求，指导他剑术。	As a Shichibukai, Dracule Mihawk is the current title holder for "Greatest Swordsman in the World". He served as Roronoa Zoro's swordsmanship master during the two-year timeskip.
王下七武海中唯一的女性，是生活在亚马逊・百合的战斗民族九蛇的最高领导人和九蛇海贼团的船长，同时也被认为是世界第一的绝世美女。	As the only female Shichibukai, "Pirate Empress" Boa Hancock is also the "Snake Princess" of Amazon Lily. She is considered by many to be the most beautiful woman in the world.
多弗朗明哥黑白两道通吃，控制着世界各地诸多产业。线线果实能力者，任王下七武海与德雷斯罗萨国王，是王下七武海中特立独行的存在。	As a Shichibukai, Doflamingo is the captain of Donquixote Pirates, the tyrant King of Dressrosa and a former World Noble. He's an underworld broker using alias "Joker".
王下七武海之一，外号“暴君”，从前是一个纵横跋扈的凶残海贼，后成为革命军的干部。在“大事件”前自愿被Dr. 贝加庞克完全改造而失去自我意识。	As a Shichibukai, Bartholomew Kuma is formerly a Revolutionary. He's a type of cyborg called "Pacifista" developed by Dr. Vegapunk and once feared as a vicious pirate as a "Tyrant".
我不会去统治这片大海，在这片大海上，最自由的人…就是海贼王!！	We are NOT asking him where the treasure is hidden!!! We're not even asking him whether there IS any treasure or not!! I'm not sure, but... ...everybody set out to sea, risking their lives to search for it!!! If you ask this old man anything about it here and now... Then I'll quit being a pirate! I don't want to go on a boring adventure like that!
我不管这个世上的人怎N说我...我只想依照我的信念做事，绝不后悔，不管现在将来都一样！	Let me tell you something, squidy! I've made a promise that one day, I would meet a man. Until then, even the God of Death can't take my life away!
如果我现在没有全力作战的话，就没有资格和他们搭同一艘船！我更不可能和他们一起开心地笑了！	One, two, on the third step you will get shot by me and that'll be it!... Oh man, I'm losing my edge. I used to bluff better in the past, but now I can actually do these things!
我从小就被教导不能踢女人，所以就算会没命，我也不能踢女人。	Even if it kills me, I refuse to kick a woman!!
我的钱是我的钱，可是我的契约是你们大家的契约!  	Life is like a pencil that will surely run out, but will leave the beautiful writing of life.
在这大海之中，最美丽的…是什么？是我！我是最美丽的！	Who is the most beautiful woman in the world? It is me!
在强大的权利面前，个人的力量还真是微不足道。	Everyone is weak in front of great power.
最近…我的手开始痒了，就让你们见识下我的杂技吧！	It is show time!
敢阻挡本大爷前进的道路，只有死路一条。	I will kill anyone who dares to stop me!
对手厉害的话，我也要变得厉害，只要我说「一、二、赞高」就会变强！	One, two, Jango!
我的力量无与伦比，我的脚可以随意踢裂地面。	I am so strong! I can break the ground with one kick!
你有没有丢东西啊？我可不负责哦!	Have you lost something? Oh it is none of my business.
干什么都行，但伟大航线可一定要放弃，那个地方实在太可怕了！	I shall go wherever except the horrible and dangerous Grand Line.
六刀流天下无敌，鱼人岛除了豹藏之外，剑术最强的就是我。	My rokutoryu can beat almost everybody! I am the greatest swordsman in Fishman Island except Hyouzou! 
根本性的力量差距，不管是在水中还是陆地上都是一样的。	Strength is the difference between us, the result will be the same no matter on the land or in the sea.
没有人中了我的水大炮还能安然无恙！	No one can survive from my water bullet.
我…我吗？真是不好意思，你们的速度太快了。	Do you mean… me? I am sorry I don't catch you, you are so fast.
凭借着炸弹之果的能力，我从来都没有完不成的…任务!	With the power of Bomb-Bomb Fruit, I can finish all my missions!
如果你能成为海贼王，那么我就已经是神了。	If you can be Pirates King someday, I am already God now!
我只是想既不被政府追杀又能得到巨额财产，我可是和平主义者！	I, who was once the dreaded Captain Kuro, bowed and scraped to a spoiled little girl, and catered to her every whim... Can you fathom my humiliation?
我对这种天真的义和情最讨厌了，战斗是以胜利为目的的！不择手段才是真正的强者！	I am bored with such kind of na?ve thoughts! Victory is all I want from a war! I shall do whatever to gain my victory!
又笨又蠢又没用的种族就是人类！沉到海里就不能靠自己力量上来的人类能干什么！	Money is the best, you can trust it more than the humans.
叛乱军也好!国王军也好!这个国家的人谁都没有错!为什么一定要有人去死呢？	Rebels or soldiers… neither of them are doing something wrong! Why one side has to die?
这个国家的所有东西都是我的！该我的总是我的！	Everything in this country belongs to me! All mine!
我是一个造型艺术家，我会把你们都变成我的艺术品！	If I were to tell you... I am here to fulfill the final wish of my lost comrade... would you laugh at me, hmmm?!
无论踏错了男人之道也好，或是踏错了女人之道也好，始终没有偏离人之道！	You might have lived wrongly as a man, or you might have lived wrongly as a woman. In the end, it's a still a way of human. We may part under the real blue sky, but the Okama Kempo will strive.
我的武器可以让你粉身碎骨，我可不是剑客，是杀手！	I am not a swordsman, I am a killer!
我只要看到那些白日梦的笨蛋…就恶心的想要吐。	The Lost city of Gold!? The Emerald city!? The great Treasure of "One Piece"!? The fools who go looking for their "dream treasure" cannot notice what's in front of them! In this era of the sea the ones that do not have real strength... are the ones that are killed by their own imaginations!
罪恶，源自于无知啊！	Evil comes from ignorance.
有人逃走，就得有人牺牲，以死谢罪…这是这世界永恒不变的真理。	Some escaped, some sacrificed and died… that is how it works in the world.
我们…嗯嗯嗯嗯嗯!嗯嗯嗯…嗯嗯!	We… how careless!
想要安安稳稳就不能逆天行事。	If you want to live, you'd better behave.
六式在速度的领域里，绝对是所向无敌的！	Speak of speed, Rokushiki is unbeatable in this area.
秋风萧萧，人生苦短，春芽吐翠，无缘再看！昙花一现，不可复求，飘零散落，唯留情义！	We'll gladly accept your soaked cash.
就让你见识一下我的杀人拳吧!用指枪的速度发射的超级重拳！	Let me show you my strength!
我可没有生活在软弱的世界里！既然已经得到了格杀令，那我就要你的命！	This world shows no mercy to the weak. According to the order, I have to kill you!
你想尊敬我，那是你的自由！要说失望，那可是驴头不对马嘴！因为我们本来就是志不同，道不合！	It is your freedom to respect me, but you have no qualification to be disappointed with me. We are not in the same road from the beginning to the end.
把我的女人还回来！你就在不见天日的黑暗中苟且偷生去吧！	Give her back! Then you can hide and live as you wish!
不要在那发呆！该战斗了！	Don't hesitate, it's combate time.
有本事去新世界闹腾啊！	Come to have a combat with me in New World!
要打架就到山壁对面去打吧！看来你还不知道我的厉害！	Come to have a combat to the other side! You have no idea how good am I!
好粗俗的女人！倒了我的胃口！把她的嘴给我堵上！	You guys have already lost... in sheer military force.
在非法地带也大摇大摆地招摇过市，真是太过分啊！	A strut in this very region will make you regret for it.
既然大家都是海盗，就得遵守海盗的潜规则，不要连累了我们！	Both of us are pirates, so let's play it with pirates' rules!
那天突然把我打入十八层地狱的男人！今天在这里，就算与你同归于尽…我也一定要宰了你。	The man who have experienced so much suffering, I would rather die with you here and today!
沼泽和泥沼都是不可能逃脱的「无底沼泽」，越挣扎…陷的就越深哦。	It is your end here in my swamp. The harder you struggle, the deeper you get trapped.
为了让弱小群体安心度日，本监狱特将穷凶极恶的罪犯收押与此，此乃地狱的要塞!	Impel down keeps all evil criminals here in order to create a peaceful life for the weak.
一切都交给我吧，我会拦住他的！	I can handle this, I promise to stop him!
要我将你的肉撕成碎片吃下去吗？我的最爱是巨鱼的骨头，给我记住了！	I will tear you into pieces and eat you all! My favorite is fish bone! Keep it in your mind!
帮助？我可是被雇佣的，只认准钱的啊…阿龙那么小气，雇得起我吗？	Help? I am employed, money is all I care. Arlong is so mean, he won't pay me.
身为鱼人却无法游泳…在我受到靶靶诅咒的同时获得了恶魔的力量！	Can't swim? What a shame for a fishman! It is a curse, but also a kind of power for me, the devil's power!
重叠了十层厚度的冰窖，可不是随随便便就能打破的哦。	Those who do good will get good things in return.

对正面一整行的敌人造成普通和技力伤害。	Deal both normal and Skill Power damage to the enemies in the facing horizontal row.
为己方小队生命最低的2个船员施加一个基于自身防御力的<font color="#00EC00">护盾</font>	Create a <font color="#00EC00">Shield</font>, which is equal to self defense for 2 allies with the lowest HP.

使用后，本回合中己方小队全体成员将进行一次额外的普通攻击。	While using the skill, all allies in current round can have an extra chance for Normal Attack.
对敌方全小队造成普通和技力伤害，并为自己施加一个基于自身防御力的<font color="#00EC00">护盾</font>。	Deal both normal and Skill Power damage to the whole enemy team and create a <font color="#00EC00">Shield</font> for self which is equal to self defense.
每次受到攻击时，增加自身大量攻击和少量防御。	Each time receiving attack, greatly increase self ATK and slightly increase self DEF.
战斗开始时，本队至多3名水手的伤害提升20%，持续5回合。	When battle starts, 3 Sailor allies at most can greatly increase damage, lasting for 5 rounds.
每次受到治疗时，增加自身大量攻击和少量防御。	Every time receiving healing, greatly increase self ATK and slightly increase self DEF.

每回合首次行动后，增加20点怒气	Each round after first action, recover 20 points of Fury.
