对敌方全小队造成普通和技力伤害，并<font color="#00EC00">打断</font>其正在释放的奥义。	Deal both normal and Skill Power damage to the whole enemy team and <font color="#00EC00">Interrupt</font> enemy to cast Ogi Skill.
使自身在本回合中<font color="#00EC00">免疫所有负面状态</font>，且可进行3次普通攻击，并增加<font color="#00EC00">暴击率</font>。	While using the skill, one can <font color="#00EC00">Immune All Debuffs</font> within current round and add 3 extra Normal Attack with increased <font color="#00EC00">Crit.Hit</font>.
普攻有一定概率晕眩目标1回合。	Normal attack has a chance of <font color="#00EC00">Stunning</font> targets for one round.
主角在场时，我方全小队对目标造成普通攻击时将按照伤害的一定比例治疗自己。	When main character is in formation and alive, self side whole team damage dealt through normal attack will heal self by certain percentage.
战斗开始时，本队至多3名狙击手的伤害提升20%，持续5回合。	When battle starts, 3 Snipers allies at most can greatly increase damage, lasting for 5 rounds.
极大概率闪避每回合受到的第一次普通攻击。	High chance of dodging the first normal attack for each round.
每回合额外进行一次普通攻击，且当击杀一名敌人后，可立即进行一次额外的普攻。	Each round dealt one extra normal attack, and after killing one enemy, can immediately extra normal attack one time.
本队所有满血的船员造成的伤害大幅度提升。	All allies with full HP can greatly increase damage.
治疗本小队中生命最低的1个船员	Heal 1 ally who is in the lowest HP, and clear <font color="#00EC00">All Debuffs</font>.
对正面的敌人造成普通和技力伤害，并<font color="#00EC00">吸收</font>至多40点怒气，一定概率造成<font color="#00EC00">沉默</font>2回合。	Deal both normal and Skill Power DMG to enemy in front and <font color="#00EC00">absorb</font> 20 Fury most with chance to cast <font color="#00EC00">Silence</font> debuff for 2 rounds.
为我方全小队恢复生命值，并解除所有<font color="#00EC00">负面状态</font>。	Heal all allies and clear <font color="#00EC00">All Debuffs</font>.
对敌方全小队造成技力伤害，此技能可暴击。	Deal Skill Power damage to the whole enemy team, also with a chance for Crit. Hit.
复活选定的一个友军，并恢复少量生命。	Revive a selected defeated ally along with low HP.
战斗开始时，本队至多3名船医的伤害提升20%，持续5回合。	When battle starts, 3 Doctors allies at most can greatly increase damage, lasting for 5 rounds.
暴击时对目标造成晕眩效果，持续1回合。	With Critical Hit, one can cast <font color="#00EC00">Stun</font> debuff, lasting for one round.
战斗开始时，己方阵营至多9个女性船员增加一个基于自身防御的护盾。	When battle starts, 9 female allies at most can receive one <font color="#00EC00">Shield</font> which is equal to caster's DEF.
己方小队所有船员受到的治疗效果增加25%（效果可叠加）。	All allies can increase healing effect by 25% (effects can be stacked).
本小队船员进行普通攻击造成伤害的同时附带1回合中毒效果。	When allies use normal attack, deal both damage and <font color="#00EC00">Poison</font> debuff for 1 round..
战斗开始时，对敌方阵营至多6名男性船员施加束缚1回合。	When battle starts, one can <font color="#00EC00">Trap</font> 6 male enemies at most for 1 round.

1.共有10道题目可供回答。<br />2.每道题目有30秒的回答时间。<br />3.10道题目全部回答完后，将根据回答正确的数量给予额外奖励。	1. There are 10 quesstions available.<br />2. Each question has 30 seconds to answer.<br />3. After completing the 10 questions, system give out bonus reward according to number of correct answers.
1.对奥兹造成的伤害越高，奖励越多。<br />2.活动结束后总伤害排名靠前的玩家将会获得额外奖励。	1. More damage dealt to Oars means more reward.<br />2. When the event ends, players with higher damage on the ranking list will receive bonus reward.
1.1~3人组队进行挑战。<br />2.敌人由多批部队组成，每获得1轮战斗胜利就将获得1份奖励。	1. Players form team of 1-3 people to challenge.<br />2. The enemies are many teams of monsters, winning 1 round will win 1 reward.
1.需由海贼团报名获得参赛资格后方可参战。<br />2.海贼团获胜则可获得500贡献和1000声望；失败也可获得300贡献和一定的声望（700+获胜战场数*100）。	1. Players need to register through Pirates Team to obtain qualification.<br />2. Pirates Team victory can obtain 500 Contribution and 1000 Medals; defeat can obtain 300 Contribution and set amount of Medals（700+Winning Rounds*100）.
1.决赛将在预选赛前8名的海贼团之间进行争夺。<br />2.决赛除了个人参赛奖励外还将获得额外奖励，最终排名越靠前的海贼团获得的奖励越好。	1. The top 8 teams of Preliminaries will join the Finals.<br />2. The Finals include not only individual participation reward and also bonus reward, higher ranking Pirates Team will obtain better reward.
1.击败阵地BOSS并守住BOSS的反击后即可占领阵地，占领阵地后可获得全服buff加成。<br />2.活动中造成的伤害越高，奖励越多。<br />3.击杀怪物可获得大量奖励。	1. Defeat the BOSS and defend against the BOSS counterattack to overtake the position, overtaking the position can obtain whole server buff bonus.<br />2. During the event, higher damages means more rewards.<br />3. Defeating the monsters to obtain abundant rewards.
1.需要先在海贼大厅中领取藏宝图。<br />2.需要由相同海贼团中领取了藏宝图（上）和藏宝图（下）的成员一起才能出海寻宝。<br />3.寻宝无次数限制，但前4次才有奖励。	1. Players have to receive Treasure Map at Pirates Hall firstly.<br />2. Only members from the same Pirates Team can receive Treasure Map (Part I) and Treasure Map (Part II) and set sail to search treasure at the sea.<br />3. Search times are unlimited, but only the first 4 times can receive treasure rewards.
1.只能向寻宝中的队伍发起掠夺，需要分别战胜两人后才能获得奖励。<br />2.掠夺成功可以获得寻宝奖励的50%，掠夺失败则没有奖励。	1. Players can plunder the teams in Treasure Search, yet have to defeat all opponents in the search process to win rewards.<br />2. Successful plunder can receive 50% of the treasure, while failure means no rewards.
1.活动期间CP9会出现在谢尔兹镇、西罗布村、可可亚西村、罗格镇、小花园，每5分钟刷出一波。<br />2.与CP9部队战斗胜利后将获得丰厚奖励，并且CP9会消失。	1. During event time, CP9 members appear at Shells Town, Syrup Village, Cocoyasi Village, Loguetown and Little Garden once every 5 mins. <br />2. After defeating CP9 members, you can claim abundant rewards. Then CP9 members will disappear.
1. 完成竞赛挑战即可获得对应奖励，胜利达到5场即可完成所有挑战。<br />2. 达成挑战的奖励会在活动结束后统一以邮件形式发送到玩家邮箱中。	1. Players will receive corresponding rewards after completing Challenged Matches. Successfully challenging 5 matches means players complete all matches.<br />2. Available rewards will be sent via email after the event ends.
1. 在战场中和敌对阵营的玩家进行1V1的战斗，战斗胜利可获得大量积分，且连胜数越高获得的积分越多。失败也可获得少量积分，具体数量和击败对手的船员数量有关。<br />2. 每个参与战斗的玩家，都可获得个人积分奖励。此外还有机会获得优胜阵营奖励和积分排名奖励。	2. Player challenge enemies in 1v1 battle on the battlefield. If successful, player can obtain a lot of points.<br />6. Each single player who joins the event will receive individual rewards, and also has chances to obtain team rewards and ranking rewards.

只有登上王座的人才知道什么是渴望。	Weaklings can't pick their way of death.
在混乱中寻找机会，把握机会才能获得胜利。	Oh, Nope! How could someone be immune to my charms?
不要管有多少敌人，勇敢的冲上去吧。	Kneel before me, and Hail to Your Pirate Empress!!
只靠蛮力作战那是野蛮人的行为，头脑才是最重要的。	Even slaughter innocent people... The world will forgive my actions for my beauty!
别轻易说出失败二字。	Bring me some Okaki, I might pardon you all!
处于危险的境地是要找到正确的突破口。	Remember, my top Motto is "Reigning Justice"!!
没有经历过战争的人不会明白战争的残酷。	Come and taste the fury of my Devil Fruit power, Hito Hito no Mi, Daibutsu!!
真正强大的人会学会掌控整个战斗的节奏。	I hate to interrupt, but…what are you doing here?
当敌人过于强大时，需要的不仅仅是勇气更是计谋。	I am not your ally... If you do anything, I'm the 'enemy' that will be the first to catch you.
这里是冰的世界，你做好准备了吗？	The thing called "justice" changes its shape... Depending on where you stand.
1.多弗朗明哥攻击十分高，建议优先击杀。<br />2.莫利亚奥义会造成眩晕，建议对其进行打断。	1. Doflamingo can deal great DMG while attacking, suggest to attack him first.<br />2. Ogi Skill [Tsuno-Tokage] of Moria can cast “Stun” Debuff, suggest to interrupt.
1.多弗朗明哥攻击十分高，建议优先击杀。<br />2.莫利亚奥义会造成眩晕，建议对其进行打断。<br />3.娜美的奥义会束缚全小队，建议对其进行控制或优先击杀。	1. Doflamingo can deal great DMG while attacking, suggest to attack him first.<br />2. Ogi Skill [Tsuno-Tokage] of Moria can cast “Stun” Debuff, suggest to interrupt.<br />3. Ogi skill [Mirage Tempo] of Nami can cast “Trap” Debuff, suggest to control or kill him first.  
1.多弗朗明哥攻击十分高，建议优先击杀。<br />2.莫利亚奥义会造成眩晕，建议对其进行打断。<br />3.娜美的奥义会束缚全小队，建议对其进行控制或优先击杀。<br />4.琵卡的能对全阵营造成伤害，建议对其进行控制。<br />5.锦卫门能对全小队添加护盾同时会使队友进行额外普攻，建议对其优先击杀。	1. Doflamingo can deal great DMG while attacking, suggest to attack him first.<br />2. Ogi Skill [Tsuno-Tokage] of Moria can cast “Stun” Debuff, suggest to interrupt.<br />3. Ogi skill [Mirage Tempo] of Nami can cast “Trap” Debuff to the whole team, suggest to control or kill him first.  <br />4. Ogi skill [Charlestone] of Pica can deal DMG to the whole team, suggest to control him. <br />5. Ogi skill [Karyu Issen] of Kinemon can create a Shield for all allies and have an Additional Normal Attack Chance to selected ally, Suggest to kill him first.

The Burning Debuff of Kuja Mage can’t be resisted, suggest to bring along crew with Group ATK for massive DMG.<br />2. Kuja Blacksmith is immune to Phy. DMG, suggest to bring along crew with SP ATK for greater DMG. <br />3. Kuja Swordswoman can immune to SP DMG, suggest to bring along crew with Phy. ATK for more DMG.<br />4. Take care! Boa Hancock can cast Ogi skill and Stun target enemy each round.

战斗开始时，本队至多3名水手的伤害大幅提升，持续5回合。	When battle starts, 3 Sailor allies at most can greatly increase damage, lasting for 5 rounds.
主角在场时，本队所有船员用奥义击杀敌人后将清零其奥义的冷却。	When main character is in formation and alive, Ogi Skill CD can be cleared after an ally kills an enemy with Ogi Skill.
战斗开始时，使己方阵营至多6名剑客免疫所有<font color="#00EC00">负面状态</font>，并大幅降低受到的伤害，持续3回合。	When battle starts, 6 swordsmen allies at most can immune to all <font color="#00EC00">Debuff</font> and greatly decrease damage received, lasting for 3 rounds.
战斗开始时，为己方全小队增加一个基于自身防御的<font color="#00EC00">护盾</font>。	When battle starts, one can create a <font color="#00EC00">Shield</font> for all allies, which is equal to self DEF.
战斗开始时，本队至多3名暗术士的伤害大幅提升，持续5回合。	When battle starts, 3 Dark Mages allies at most can greatly increase damage, lasting for 5 rounds.
当己方单位每回合第一次受到来自敌方奥义的<font color="#00EC00">负面状态</font>时，将该状态尽数转移到对方身上。	When allies receive <font color="#00EC00">Debuff</font> from enemy's Ogi Skill for the first time in each round, the Debuff will be completely reverted.
每回合首次行动前，增加20点怒气。	Each round before taking the first action, recover 20 points of Fury.
每回合首次行动前，对敌方小队随机1个船员造成<font color="#00EC00">燃烧</font>1回合。	Each round before taking first action, cast <font color="#00EC00">Burning</font> debuff on a random enemy for 1 round.
战斗开始时，使己方阵营至多6个船长的伤害大幅增加，持续3回合，并施加一个基于自身防御的<font color="#00EC00">护盾</font>。	When battle starts, 6 captains allies' damage greatly increase and receive a <font color="#00EC00">Shield</font> base on caster's DEF, lasting for 3 rounds, 
普通攻击时有一定概率<font color="#00EC00">晕眩</font>目标1回合。	Normal attack has a chance of <font color="#00EC00">Stunning</font> targets for one round.
主角在场时，我方全小队对目标造成普通伤害时将以一定比例治疗自己。	When main character is in formation and alive, all allies can heal self by certain percentage when deal normal DMG to target.
战斗开始时，本队至多3名狙击手的伤害大幅提升，持续5回合。	When battle starts, 3 Snipers allies at most can greatly increase damage, lasting for 5 rounds.
战斗开始时，本队至多3名船医的伤害大幅提升，持续5回合。	When battle starts, 3 Doctors allies at most can greatly increase damage, lasting for 5 rounds.
暴击时对目标造成<font color="#00EC00">晕眩</font>效果，持续1回合。	With Critical Hit, one can cast <font color="#00EC00">Stun</font> debuff, lasting for one round.
战斗开始时，为己方阵营至多9个女性船员增加一个基于自身防御的<font color="#00EC00">护盾</font>。	When battle starts, 9 female allies at most can receive one <font color="#00EC00">Shield</font> which is equal to caster's DEF.
本小队船员造成普通伤害的同时附带1回合<font color="#00EC00">中毒</font>效果。	When allies deal normal DMG, deal both damage and <font color="#00EC00">Poison</font> Debuff for 1 round..
战斗开始时，对敌方阵营至多6名男性船员施加<font color="#00EC00">束缚</font>1回合。	When battle starts, one can <font color="#00EC00">Trap</font> 6 male enemies at most for 1 round.
生命越低，受到的伤害越少。	Lower HP will receive less damage.
每回合首次行动前，恢复基于自身攻击力的生命。	Each round before taking first action, recover HP according to self ATK.
击杀一名敌人后，立即进行一次额外的普通攻击。	After killing one enemy, immediately normal attack one extra time.
满血时造成的伤害大幅度提升。	When full HP, damage dealt is greatly increased.
每次受到攻击时增加自身攻击。	Each time receiving attack, increase self ATK.
闪避提升，一定概率闪躲敌人的攻击。	Increase dodge, with set chance of dodging enemy's attack.
战斗开始时，降低敌方全队的防御。	When battle starts, decrease whole enemy team's DEF.
每次行动前，治疗己方生命最低的1个船员，并解除一个<font color="#00EC00">负面状态</font>。	Each time before taking action, one can heal an ally with lowest HP and remove a <font color="#00EC00">Debuff</font>.
普通攻击有一定概率造成大量的额外伤害。	When normal attack, has a set chance of dealing massive extra damage.
每次受到攻击时增加自身防御。	Each time receiving attack, increase self DEF.
每次行动前为自己增加一个基于自身防御的<font color="#00EC00">护盾</font>。	Each time before taking action, add a <font color="#00EC00">Shield</font> to self which is equal to self DEF.
怒气越高，自身造成的伤害越强，至少60怒气时起效。	Higher Fury, self deals higher damage, become effective when have at least 60 points of Fury.
暴击时对目标造成<font color="#00EC00">沉默</font>效果，持续2回合。	With Critical Hit, one can cast <font color="#00EC00">Silence</font> debuff, lasting for 2 rounds.
战斗中造成的普通伤害将以一定比例治疗自己。	In battle, one can heal self by certain percentage based on the normal DMG dealt. 
战斗开始时，己方怒气增加20点。	When battle starts, self side Fury increases by 20 points.
普通攻击将吸收对方至多20点怒气。	Normal Attack will absorb at most 20 points of Fury from enemy.
对此船员造成普通伤害的敌人会受到1回合的<font color="#00EC00">中毒</font>效果。	The enemy who deals normal DMG to this ally will suffer <font color="#00EC00">Poison</font> Debuff for 1 round.
战斗中造成的普通伤害将以一定比例治疗自己。	In battle, one can heal self by certain percentage based on the normal DMG dealt.
在铁块状态下受到攻击时，大幅度增加自身的攻击。	When receiving attack under Tekkai Buff, greatly increase self ATK.
每次行动前为自己增加一个基于自身防御的<font color="#00EC00">护盾</font>。	Each time before taking action, add a <font color="#00EC00">Shield</font> to self base on self DEF.
每回合额外进行一次普通攻击。	Each round deals one extra normal attack.
对处于<font color="#00EC00">冰冻</font>中的敌人发动攻击时，有一定概率一击必杀。	For enemies within <font color="#00EC00">Freeze</font> mode, there is certain chance of instant kill.
生命越低，造成的伤害越高。	Lower HP will deal higher damage.
奥义对敌人造成伤害的同时将附带1回合的<font color="#00EC00">燃烧</font>效果。	Ogi Skill deals damage to enemy at the same time will attach one round of <font color="#00EC00">Burning</font> debuff.
战斗开始时，为己方阵营至多6个狙击手或船医施加一个基于自身40%防御的<font color="#00EC00">护盾</font>。	When battle starts, 6 Snipers allies or Doctors allies at most can receive a <font color="#00EC00">Shield</font> buff which is equal to 40% of caster's DEF.
处于濒死状态时，大幅度提升暴击率。	In near death situation, greatly increase Crit Hit chances.
每当敌人的奥义对我方小队产生效果时，获得其消耗50%的怒气。	Every time enemy's Ogi Skill affect our team, obtain 50% of the Fury consumed.
每次行动前，治疗己方生命最低的1个船员。	Each time before taking action, one can heal an ally with lowest HP.
受到的生命回复效果翻倍。	The HP recovery effect received are doubled.
奥义对敌人造成伤害的同时将吸收对手全部怒气。	Ogi Skill deals damage to enemy at the same time will absorb all of enemy's Fury.
普通攻击时有一定概率<font color="#00EC00">打断</font>敌人正在释放的奥义。	When normal attack, has a set chance of <font color="#00EC00">Interrupting</font> enemy to cast Ogi Skill
奥义对敌人造成伤害的同时有一定概率造成<font color="#00EC00">石化</font>效果，持续1回合。	Ogi Skill deals damage to enemy at the same time with a chance of dealing <font color="#00EC00">Petrify</font> debuff, lasting for one round.
对此船员造成普通伤害的敌人会受到1回合的<font color="#00EC00">燃烧</font>效果。	The enemy who deals normal DMG to this ally will suffer<font color="#00EC00">Burning</font> Debuff for 1 round.
免疫晕眩、石化、睡眠、冰冻。	Immune to Stun, Petrify, Hypnotize, Freeze.
受到敌人的普通攻击时吸取攻击者10点怒气。	When receiving enemy's normal attack, absorb 10 points of Fury from attacker.
战斗开始时，己方阵营所有水手的伤害大幅提升，持续3回合。	When battle starts, all Sailors allies' damage greatly increases, lasting for 3 rounds.
普通攻击时有一定概率<font color="#00EC00">沉默</font>目标2回合。	When normal attack, has a set chance of <font color="#00EC00">Silencing</font> target for 2 rounds.
每回合开始时，将恢复一定百分比的生命。	Each round at the start, will recover a set percentage of HP.
战斗开始时，降低敌方全队的抵抗。	When battle starts, decrease whole enemy team's Resistance
每次行动前，解除己方全小队一个<font color="#00EC00">负面状态</font>。	Each time before taking action, dispel one <font color="#00EC00">Debuff</font> for self side whole team.
战斗开始时，为己方阵营至多6个船医或暗术士施加一个基于自身40%防御的<font color="#00EC00">护盾</font>。	When battle starts, 6 Doctors allies or Dark Mages allies at most can receive a <font color="#00EC00">Shield</font> which is equal to 40% of caster's DEF.
死亡后自动在两回合后复活，并回复少量生命。	After dying, will be revived automatically after 2 rounds, and recover small amount of HP.
战斗开始时，使本小队所有超新星船员的伤害大幅增加，持续3回合，并施加一个基于自身防御的护盾。	When battle starts, all Supernova allies' damage greatly increase and receive a Shield which is equal to caster's DEF, lasting for 3 rounds.
普通攻击有一定概率对正面一整列的敌人造成伤害。	When normal attack, has a set chance of dealing damage to the enemies in the facing vertical row.
当站在第一列时，敌方的普通攻击只能指定他为目标。	When standing at the first row, enemy's normal attack can only appoint him as target.
战斗开始时，大幅增加己方小队的暴击率。	When battle starts, greatly increase self team's Crit Hit rate.
战斗开始时，己方阵营所有狙击手的伤害大幅提升，持续3回合。	When battle starts, all Snipers allies' damage greatly increases, lasting for 3 rounds.
每回合首次行动前，降低敌方生命百分比最低单位的防御和抵抗。	Each round before taking first action, decrease DEF and Resistance for enemy units with lowest HP percentage.
本小队每存在1个狙击手则将为你增加5%的技力。	In self team, each Sniper can add attack by 5%.

本小队每存在1个水手则将为你增加5%的攻击。	In self team, each Sailor can add attack by 5%.

#拥有5个2级以上的贝壳#	#Owns 5 Dials of Lv 2 or above#
#拥有5个3级以上的贝壳#	#Owns 5 Dials of Lv 3 or above#
#拥有5个4级以上的贝壳#	#Owns 5 Dials of Lv 4 or above#
#拥有5个5级以上的贝壳#	#Owns 5 Dials of Lv 5 or above#
#拥有5个6级以上的贝壳#	#Owns 5 Dials of Lv 6 or above#
#拥有5个7级以上的贝壳#	#Owns 5 Dials of Lv 7 or above#
#拥有5个8级以上的贝壳#	#Owns 5 Dials of Lv 8 or above#
#拥有5个9级以上的贝壳#	#Owns 5 Dials of Lv 9 or above#
从小被香克斯寄于厚望，今天在东方之星上来了一些陌生人。	Shanks placed high hopes on you ever since you were young. Today, some new guests arrived at the Star of the East.
原来陌生剑客竟是世界第一的剑客鹰眼，快过去聊聊吧。	The unknown swordsman is actually the Greatest Swordsman in the World, Dracule Mihawk, go talk with him.
没想到鹰眼竟也对你充满期待，为了达到2位强者的期望，决定向香克斯请教提升实力的方法。	Dracule Mihawk also has high hopes on you. To reach the great goals, you decide to go to Shanks and ask him how to improve your own battle power.
原来战胜实力相似的对手是提升实力的办法，正好附近有海贼闹事，你决定去制止这一切。	One of the method of increasing battle power is to defeat similar battle power opponents. Since there are pirates causing trouble nearby, you decide to go stop them.
得到战利品海贼佩刀，带上它增强自己的攻击力。	You obtain a loot - Pirate Sabre, and decide to equip it to increase own battle power.
佩戴海贼佩刀后攻击力提升，决定去小试身手，并帮助香克斯处理事务。	After equipping with Pirate Sabre, your battle power increases and you decide to help Shanks deal with some problems.
击败了捣乱的海军，获得了战利品正义大衣，决定穿上正义大衣。	You defeated the Marines and obtained a loot -Justice Coat, so you decide to wear the Justice Coat.
听香克斯的建议来到风车村寻找另一个被香克斯选中的家伙――路飞	You listen to Shanks' suggestion and go to Fushia Village to find another person chosen by Shanks - Luffy.
与路飞一见如故的成为了朋友，上阵路飞。	You and Luffy quickly become friends, add Luffy to formation.
与路飞的交谈中了解到路飞曾经的过往。	You chat with Luffy and find out about Luffy's past.
找到第一个伙伴后准备出海历练，离开风车村之前与村长告别。	Since you now have a companion, you decide to set sail. Before leaving Fushia Village, you say goodbye to the Mayor.
两人来到距离风车村最近的小树林，这里的一切都是奇妙的。	The two of you reached the little forest on Goat Island, everything here seems magical.
突然从旁边草丛发出了“嗖嗖嗖”的响声，你们决定前去一探究竟。	You guys hear alarm ringing in the nearby grass area, so you guys decide to explore.
与海贼的战斗让你明白了武器强化后的效果，决定前去强化武器。	After battling the pirates you realize the importance of enhancing gear, so you decide to enhance your own weapon.
成功强化武器之后，决定前去找海贼试炼武器的效果。	You decide to challenge pirates to test the enhanced weapon.
新武器的效果果然给力，轻而易举就将前来报仇的海贼击败了，然而这时却从附近传来一些奇怪的声音。	You easily defeated the pirates, yet at this time you hear some strange sound.
与克比交谈后，决定帮助克比逃脱亚尔丽塔的追捕。	You talk with Coby and decide to help Coby escape from Alvida Pirates.
只有击败亚尔丽塔才能真正让克比逃脱控制，然而亚尔丽塔身边有许多护卫，决定先将亚尔丽塔的护卫击败。	There are many guards surrounding Alvida, so you decide to defeat the Alvida Guards first.
见识到亚尔丽塔护卫的实力后，决定先将正义大衣强化到5级再与亚尔丽塔做最后的决战。	Realizing the battle power of Alvida Guards, you decide to enhance Justice Coat to Level 5 before battling Alvida.
终于到了面对亚尔丽塔的时候了，前往战役击败亚尔丽塔。	It's time to face Alvida, go to battle and defeat Alvida.
成功击败亚尔丽塔后，克比决定前往谢兹儿镇，一番商议后决定与克比一同前往谢兹儿镇。	Coby decides to leave for Shells Town, you guys decide to go with Coby to Shells Town.
到达了一个新的城镇，你们兴奋地在街上闲逛，为了防止危险，克比建议先观察一下，却发现了一个哭泣的女孩。	You are excited to reach a new town and wander around. Coby suggests you guys to observe the new town first, but you see a crying little girl.
从莉莉佳处得知索隆被贝鲁梅伯关在了校场，莉莉佳拜托你们与她一同去探望索隆。	Thanks to Rika, you guys find out that Zoro is locked at drill grounds by Helmeppo. Rika wants you guys to visit Zoro with her.
索隆已经被关在校场饿了9天，你决定去索隆去找吃的，可是巡逻海军小队队长过来阻拦你们。	Zoro has been locked at the drill grounds and not eaten for 9 days. You decide to find food for Zoro, but the Patrol Marine Team Captain comes to stop you.
连续的战斗让你的等级得到了提升，而路飞的等级却与你拉开了差距，经验书可以有效提升伙伴等级。	Continuous battling helps you upgrade your level, but Luffy's level is lower than you. EXP Book can fast upgrade companion's level.
酒吧老板娘听说你们是莉莉佳的朋友盛情地招待了你们。	Tavern Owner heard that you guys were Rika's friends so she treated you guys for free.
从酒吧老板娘处得知贝鲁梅伯去了校场，你们担心贝鲁梅伯会对索隆不利，决定前往校场探探情况。	Learn from the Tavern Owner that Helmeppo went to the drill ground, so you guys decide to go to drill ground to check on Zoro. 
来到校场后，索隆已经被贝鲁梅伯的护卫折磨的奄奄一息，无法忍受这一切的你决定击败贝鲁梅伯的护卫。	When reaching the drill ground, you realize Zoro is severely weaken by Helmeppo Guard, so you decide to defeat Helmeppo Guard.
经过一番苦战击败贝鲁梅伯的护卫，贝鲁梅伯趁机抓走了莉莉佳，为了拯救莉莉佳，你们对贝鲁梅伯发起了进攻。	After a bitter fight, you defeated Helmeppo Guard, yet Helmeppo captured Rika. To save Rika, you guys decide to attack Helmeppo.
击败了贝鲁梅伯彻底得罪了蒙卡，索隆的刀之前被贝鲁梅伯带走，镇长是这个镇知道最多的，快去找镇长打探索隆佩刀的下落。	You defeated Helmeppo and completely annoyed Morgan. Helmeppo took away Zoro's swords earlier. The mayor is the only one who knows about this. Go ask the Mayor about Zoro's swords.
镇长说索隆的佩刀是削铁如泥的好刀，被蒙卡得到了赏赐给自己的护卫了，蒙卡的护卫对这些刀视若珍宝。	The Mayor says Morgan gave the swords to his own guard. So you decide to fight them to get the swords back.
经过一番苦战夺回了2把索隆的刀，而索隆却意外的告诉你他是三刀流剑客，对于他最重要的和道一文字不见了。	You got 2 of Zoro's swords back from the guard, yet Zoro tells you that he is a Santoryu swordsman. The most important sword, Wado Ichimonji, is missing. 
镇长告知和道一文字是一把名刀，被蒙卡赏赐给最贴身的护卫了，为了夺回和道一文字，你们决定深入海军基地。	The Mayor tells you that Wado Ichimonji is a famous sword. Morgan gave it to his personal bodyguard. To get back the Wado Ichimonji, you decide to sneak into the Marine Base. 
得到3把刀后，你们来到校场帮助索隆逃脱，正当给索隆松绑时，蒙卡却来到了校场。	After obtaining all 3 swords, you decide to help Zoro escape. Just as you are untying Zoro, Morgan arrives at the drill ground.
一番苦战后，蒙卡终于被击败了，却发现所有海军都在欢呼，原来这些海军之前都是迫于蒙卡的胁迫之下。	After a bitter fight, you defeated Morgan, yet realize all the Marines are celebrating, because they were all oppressed by Morgan.
镇长说索隆一个人在酒馆等着你，来到酒馆后，索隆决定与你们一同冒险成为了你第2个伙伴。	The Mayor said that Zoro should be waiting for you at the tavern. You went to the tavern and learnt that Zoro decided to join you guys and become your companion.
与索隆的交谈中得知索隆的梦想是成为世界第一大剑豪，对此你感到十分佩服，并用经验书提升索隆等级。	Zoro's dream is to be the greatest swordsman in the world, which you greatly admire. You use the EXP Book to upgrade Zoro's level.
对于索隆加入的消息，镇长也十分开心地提出了增强实力的建议。	With Zoro agreeing to join your crew, the Mayor suggests you to increase battle power.
有了索隆的加入，冒险小队已经达到了3人，海贼船系统开启了，要运用合适的站位才能发挥出伙伴各自的能力。	With Zoro's joining, the team now has 3 people. The Pirate Ship system is activated. You need to place each companion in the right position of the formation. 
谢兹儿镇的冒险结束了，克比决定留在谢兹儿镇，一伙人告别克比来到了橘子镇，认识了海贼小偷娜美。	Shells Town's adventure is over and Coby decides to stay at Shells Town. You guys travel to Orange Town and become friends with Cat Burglar, Nami. 
娜美十分欢迎你们来到橘子镇，路飞表示十分想吃橘子，娜美告诉你们想吃橘子得去询问镇长。	Nami welcomes you guys to Orange Town. Luffy wants to eat the oranges and Nami tells you to find the Mayor if you want to eat oranges.
镇长听说你们的目的后，无奈表示橘子镇的橘田因为巴基海贼团的进入而被摧毁了，愤怒的你决定帮助镇长。	The Mayor explains that the Orange Town's orange grove is destroyed by Buggy Pirates. You decide to help the Mayor. 
轻松击败巡逻海贼后却被镇长告知有一只巨大的狮子正在镇上作乱，你们火速赶往狮子所在的地方阻止狮子。	After easily defeating the Patrol Pirates, the Mayor tells you that a large lion is causing troubles in town. You quickly head to stop the lion. 
为橘子镇赶走了作乱的狮子，作为报答，镇长将贝利树送给了你们，这可是一颗会生钱的树，快试试效果吧。	The Mayor gives you the Beli Tree as reward for chasing away the lion. This tree can grow beli, go and try it.
娜美馋涎巴基的宝藏，但是自己一个人的能力又不够，决定寻找你的帮助。	Nami wants Buggy's treasure, yet she's not powerful enough herself, so she asks you for help.
在于巴基手下的交锋中见识了巴基真正的实力，盗取巴基宝藏的计划要重新设定了，同时镇长又遇到了麻烦。	By fighting Buggy's henchmen, you realize Buggy's true power. You might need to change the plan targeting Buggy's Treasure. At the same time, the Mayor needs your help again.
原来刚才作乱的狮子是巴基得力手下摩奇的宠物，这次摩奇来给自己的宠物报仇了，还抓走了小狗咻咻。	The lion belongs to Buggy Pirates' First Mate, Mohji. Mohji came to revenge for his lion and captured Chouchou the dog.
镇长对你们讲述了小狗咻咻的过往，众人对咻咻的精神感觉佩服，此时娜美正着急地寻找你们。	Mayor tells you guys of Chouchou's past, and everyone greatly admires Chouchou's spirit. Then you find out that Nami is urgently looking for you.
巴基的精英已经进入了橘子镇，看娜美神色凝重，看来这次橘子镇遇到的麻烦可不是那么好解决的。	Buggy Elites already enter Orange Town. Looking at Nami's serious expression, you realize the trouble that Orange Town is facing will not be easy to solve.
以阴险著称的杂技师卡巴吉也来到了橘子镇，并叫嚣着要把所有人杀了，为了阻止这一切，你独自迎战卡巴吉。	Cabaji the acrobat also comes to Orange Town, and claims that he'll kill everyone. To stop all this, you decide to fight Cabaji. 
卡巴吉的阴险程度带给你十分大的震惊，娜美又讲述了巴基喜欢用大炮毁灭村庄，并已经准备用大炮轰击橘子镇。	Cabaji's trickery shocks you. Nami also says that Buggy likes to use bombs to destroy villages, and is preparing his bombs to attack Orange Town. 
镇长无法接受心爱的橘子镇被巴基摧毁，巴基的贴身护卫时刻保护着巴基，想要击败巴基就必须先击败护卫。	The Mayor cannot accept that Buggy might destroy Orange Town. Buggy's bodyguards are always protecting Buggy, so you must defeat the guards first before facing Buggy.
外面传来了炮声，巴基提前轰炸了整个橘子镇，镇长无法接受心爱的橘子镇被毁，独自前去挑战巴基，你担心镇长安危而追了上去。	Buggy starts bombing Orange Town. The Mayor decides to challenge Buggy by himself. You are worried for the Mayor and decide to follow him.
巴基的实力十分强大，使用浑身解数后终于击败巴基，而娜美悄悄的收获了巴基的宝藏，因为你击败巴基而愿意与你分享宝藏。	Buggy is truly powerful and you defeat him after a long battle. Nami also gets Buggy's treasure and she's willing to share some with you.
娜美将得到的宝石分了一半给你，拿到宝石后将宝石镶嵌在装备之上可以有效提升战斗力。	Nami gave you half of the gems. Embed the gems on the gears can effectively increase battle power. 
娜美有话要说，与娜美对话。	Nami wants to tell you something. Go talk with Nami.
橘子镇恢复了往日的繁荣，村民都投身于橘子镇的重建工作，你们决定前往下一站冒险，来到港口与镇长告别。	With the pirates gone, all the citizens of Orange Town join in rebuilding the town. You guys decide to leave and go to say good bye to the Mayor.
第一次出海之后回归，实力进步巨大，看看香克斯大叔有什么要说。	You guys return home after the first adventure and improve greatly. Go visit Shanks and see what he has to say.
为了寻找船只来到西罗布村，遇到了西罗布村的小霸王乌索普。	To find a ship, you guys go to Syrup Village and meet Usopp.
乌索普得知你们来到西罗布村只是为了一艘大船和伙伴后表示刚才都是误会，并告诉你们整个村子只有住在豪宅的可雅小姐有大船。	Usopp finds out you guys came to Syrup Village to find a ship and companions, and tells you that only Miss Kaya who lives in the mansion might own a ship. 
击败豪宅护卫后终于如愿以偿见到了可雅，但是可雅一脸忧郁似乎并不快乐，与可雅交谈后了解可雅想见乌索普。	You defeat the Mansion Guards and meet Miss Kaya. Miss Kaya looks unhappy and she really wants to see Usopp. 
乌索普对可雅小姐想见他感到十分开心，为了感谢你们赠送了你们几颗宝石，并教导你们宝石的合成。	Usopp is very happy to hear that Miss Kaya wants to meet him. He gives you guys a few gems and teaches you about synthesizing gems.
成功学会合成宝石，乌索普迫不及待想要去见可雅小姐了，带着你一起前往可雅小姐的豪宅。	Usopp cannot wait to see Miss Kaya and brings you guys along to Miss Kaya's mansion.
乌索普的吹牛笑话很快就逗乐了可雅小姐，可是克洛带着手下出现阻止乌索普继续与可雅小姐接触。	Usopp's jokes quickly amused Miss Kaya, but Kuro with his crew show up to stop Usopp from meeting Miss Kaya.
克洛侮辱乌索普是接近可雅只是为了可雅的钱财，乌索普无法忍受克洛的侮辱而逃离豪宅，你担心乌索普跟了上去。	Kuro insults Usopp by saying Usopp becomes friends with Kaya only for her money. Usopp cannot stand Kuro's insult and leave the mansion. You are worried about Usopp and follow him.
正当你安慰乌索普的时候意外发现了克洛与赞高的密谈，原来克洛的目的竟是暗杀可雅谋夺财产，为了阻止这一切你迎了上去。	When you are talking with Usopp, you guys accidentally discover that Kuro secretively plotting with Jango. Kuro's goal is to assassinate Miss Kaya for her money. To stop the plan, you decide to challenge Jango.
克洛的阴谋势必会导致整个村庄受难，乌索普决定将这一切都告诉村长，让村长做好海贼入侵的准备。	Kuro's Plot will end up destroying the whole village. Usopp decides to warn the Mayor about pirates attacking the village.
由于乌索普经常骗人导致村长根本就不相信乌索普说的话，无奈乌索普只能放弃村长先去救可雅小姐。	Because of Usopp's previous lies, the Mayor doesn't believe in Usopp at all. Usopp can only try to rescue Miss Kaya first.
乌索普火急火燎的来到豪宅告诉可雅小姐克洛的阴谋，换来的却是可雅对他的失望，你担心乌索普决定陪伴乌索普。	Usopp urgently went to the mansion and told Miss Kaya about Kuro's Plot, yet Kaya did not believe him. So Usopp sadly leaves and you follow after him.
虽然所有人都不相信乌索普的话，但乌索普仍然决定守卫整个村庄，你决定帮助乌索普，此时克洛的船员开始登陆了。	Even though no one believes in Usopp, Usopp still decides to guard the entire village. You guys decide to assist Usopp. At this time Kuro's crew members land on shore.
一场厮杀后击败了山姆，山姆的兄弟布奇对你们发起了疯狂的攻击，为了村庄的安全，你们不能后退半步。	After defeating Sham, Sham's Brother, Buchi, furiously attacks you guys. For the safety of the village, you face Buchi's challenge. 
日常任务是获得经验的有效途径，完成一定量的日常还能够获得额外奖励。	Daily Tasks are a great way to obtain EXP. Completing the required number of tasks can also obtain extra reward.
见识到克洛海贼的凶恶之后，乌索普担心可雅小姐的安危，决定再次返回可雅的豪宅带走可雅。	Usopp is worried about Miss Kaya's safety and decides to return to Kaya's mansion.
你们来到豪宅后却发现管家梅利浑身是血躺在了地上，梅利苏醒后真相大白并摆脱你们阻止克洛，你决定询问村长克洛的踪迹。	You arrive at the mansion and discover the butler, Merry, lying on the floor covers in blood. Merry wakes up and tells you the truth about Kuro and begs for your assistance. You ask the Mayor about Kuro's tracks. 
将主角提升至28级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 28
村长说曾经见过克洛与其他人在港口密谈，你们到达港口后不见克洛的踪迹，只有克洛的护卫在港口等待。	The Mayor says he saw Kuro talking with other people at the harbor. You guys arrive at the harbor and cannot find Kuro, but you discover Kuro's Guard waiting at the harbor.
克洛的踪迹还是没有找到，乌索普还是不放心可雅小姐，决定回去查看可雅小姐。	Usopp is still worried about Miss Kaya, so decides to go back and check on Miss Kaya. 
克洛隐藏在暗处让乌索普十分不安，乌索普打起十二分精神盯着港口的动静，发现又有新的海贼登陆了。	Usopp is really worried about Kuro hiding in the dark, so he keeps watching at the harbor, and discovers new pirates coming ashore.
乌索普的梦想是成为大海贼，快去跟他谈谈吧。	Usopp's dream is to become a brave pirate, go talk with him.
突然间豪宅内传来了可雅小姐的救命声，紧接着可雅小姐被神秘人抓走了，你决定找梅利了解情况。	Suddenly you guys hear Miss Kaya screams and discover that Miss Kaya was captured by a mysterious person. You guys find Merry to get more clues.
将主角提升至30级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 30
梅利描述当时发生的情景，梅利肯定神秘人一定是克洛，拜托你们一定要救回可雅，进入战役击败克洛。	Merry describes the scene and believes the mysterious person is Kuro. She begs you guys to rescue Kaya. You battle Kuro to save Kaya. 
可雅送了一艘黄金梅利号给你，此时已经可以上阵4个伙伴了。	Kaya gave you the Going Merry, and you can add the 4th crew member.
精英副本是出材料的好地方，去挑战一次吧。	Elite Instances are a great place to get materials, go challenge once.
将主角提升至31级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 31
与可雅小姐的交谈中得知了神奇的贝壳是由探索得到的，快试试探索贝壳吧。	Miss Kaya tells you that you can explore to obtain magical Dials, quickly go try it.
梅利说有了大船就可以去更大的海域冒险了，不过在海上没有厨师可万万不行，推荐你们去海上餐厅巴拉蒂。	With the large ship, you guys can continue the adventure. But Merry recommends you guys find a chef first; she recommends you guys to go to Baratie, the ocean-going restaurant.
山治为你们介绍了海上餐厅巴拉蒂的情况，得知你们是来寻找厨师伙伴后让你们去找老板哲普。	Sanji introduces the Baratie, and recommends you guys to go talk to Zeff about finding a chef as companion.
将主角提升至32级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 32
你们来到了老板哲普的房间，却发现哲普脸色沉重，原来餐厅最近遇到了麻烦，经常被海军捣乱骚扰。	You guys reach Zeff and discover that Zeff is worried about the troublemaking marines.
哲普老板对于海军无故骚扰餐厅的行为感到耿耿于怀，决定让你们去询问山治究竟是怎么回事。	Zeff is still holding a grudge against the troublemaking marines, so he asks you guys to go ask Sanji about more details.
事情的真相竟然是山治的好色得罪了海军的高层，才导致海军无故来捣乱，明白了整件事情的你准备告诉哲普真相。	The truth is Sanji's amorous action might have annoyed a high level marine officer, which led to the marine creating trouble for Baratie. You decides to tell the truth to Zeff.
将主角提升至33级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 33
哲普老板对于事情的真相也无可奈何，此时甲板上来了捣乱海军的队长正在叫嚣着要教训打伤海军的人。	Zeff feels helpless toward the truth. At this time, the Troublemaking Marine's Captain comes aboard and wants to revenge.
击败了捣乱的海军，哲普老板开怀大笑并教导了你们每日必做的东西，同时让你们将好消息带给山治。	After defeating the marine, Zeff is very happy and teaches you guys about Daily Must. He also wants you to tell Sanji about the news.
击退了捣乱的海军，山治也表示十分开心，正当你们闲聊时，餐厅的帕迪似乎遇上了麻烦。	Sanji is also happy to hear about you defeating the marines. While you guys are chatting, you hear Patty is having some problem.
来到餐厅与帕迪交谈后发现餐厅中的海军吃饭不付钱，这也是导致餐厅开不下去的原因，你决定帮助餐厅。	You chat with Patty and Patty tells you that there are marines not paying for the food. You decide to teach those marines a lesson.
将主角提升至34级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 34
教训了霸王餐的海军后，餐厅另外一边突然传出了争吵的声音，你决定前去一探究竟。	You hear fighting noises coming from another part of the restaurant, so you decide to go check it out.
争吵声是山治发出来的，原来山治与铁拳“赫波迪”起了冲突，铁拳赫波迪侮辱了山治的厨艺，山治大打出手。	It is from Sanji arguing with Ironfist Fullbody. Ironfist Fullbody insulted Sanji's cooking, so Sanji wants to fight against Fullbody.
将主角提升至35级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 35
餐厅的鱼卖完了，山治教会了你们钓鱼的方法，需要你们去钓几条鱼来补充餐厅的库存。	The restaurant is out of fish. Sanji teaches you guys about fishing, and asks you guys to go catch some fish.
山治用你钓来的鱼做了鱼汤，十分美味，正当你们寒暄的时候，餐厅外有动静，决定找哲普询问情况。	Sanji uses the fish you caught to make delicious fish soup. While you guys are chatting, you hear noises coming in from outside. So you decide to ask Zeff about the situation.
哲普老板似乎发现了什么，脸色越来越沉重了，询问后哲普告诉你有一些逃跑的海贼来到巴拉蒂了。	Zeff looks serious and tells you that a group of Escaping Pirates came to Baratie.
将主角提升至36级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 36
听逃跑海贼的描述中发现鹰眼出现了，索隆听说鹰眼之后，为了大剑豪的梦想，忍不住和鹰眼较量一番。	It seems that Hawk Eyes is among the escaping pirates. Zoro hears about Hawk Eyes being the Greatest Swordsman in the world and decides to challenge Hawk Eyes.
虽然战斗中索隆被鹰眼打得毫无还手之力，但是索隆却得到了鹰眼的认可，同时帕迪在餐厅又遇到了麻烦。	Even though Zoro completely lost to Hawk Eyes, yet he receives Hawk Eyes' affirmation. At the same time, Patty seems to have some troubles.
餐厅来了许多不速之客，这些不速之客来到餐厅让餐厅准备一百人份的食物，帕迪认出了这些人是克利克的手下。	Many unexpected guests arrive at the restaurant and order food for 100 people. Patty recognizes these people are part of Krieg Pirates. 
将主角提升至37级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 37
帕迪说克利克是个狡诈的家伙，为达目的会不择手段，如果喂饱了克利克餐厅就会迎来克利克的怒火。	Patty says Krieg is a cunning pirate who would use foul means to reach his goal. If Kreig is fed, Krieg will do something against the restaurant.
山治将一百人份的食物交给了克利克的前锋队长，帕迪对此十分不理解，决定去找山治询问清楚。	Sanji hands over food for 100 people to Krieg's Vanguard Captain, Patty doesn't agree with him and decides to ask Sanji.
山治只是想要给想吃饭的人饭，而克利克恩将仇报，派遣了手下来夺取巴拉蒂，愤慨的你们主动迎战克利克。	Sanji just wants to give food to those people who need food. But Krieg send his henchmen to take over Baratie, you guys decide to fight Krieg head on. 
山治感谢你们将克利克的手下打败，并决定将克利克来袭的消息通知帕迪。	Sanji thanks you for defeating Krieg Pirates and decides to notice Patty about the pirates attacking the restaurant.
帕迪得知克利克进攻巴拉蒂，为了阻止这一切的发生，帕鲁决定提前出击击败克利克海贼团的海贼们。	After learning the news, Patty decides to attack first to defeat the Krieg Pirates to stop all this.
虽然击败了来犯的克利海贼，但是克利克不是那么容易就会死心的，现在整个餐厅的情况十分不妙。	Even though you guys defeat the Krieg Pirates so far, but Krieg won't give up so easily, so the restaurant is still in danger.
将主角提升至38级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 38
哲普老板说甲板上来了一个全身带盾牌的家伙，是克利克海贼团的核心成员绰号铁壁，你决定留下来保护餐厅。	Zeff says a guy cover with iron plates just landed on deck. He's Krieg Pirates' commander and his nickname is Pearl the Ironwall. You decide to stay and protect the restaurant.
哲普对你们击退了克利克的第一波进攻表示十分感谢，担心山治因为对给予海贼食物，希望你们去看下山治。	Zeff thanks you guys for defeating the first wave of Krieg's attack, but worries about Sanji. He wants you to visit Sanji. 
山治表示自己并不后悔给海贼饭吃但不允许海贼想要抢走哲普的船，此时克利克的精英开始登船了，你迎了上去。	Sanji says he does not regret giving food to the pirates but he won't let anyone take Zeff's ship. At the same time the Krieg's Elite lands on the ship, you decide to join the fight.
将主角提升至39级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 39
克利克海贼团的战斗队长鬼人金出现在了甲板上，并打伤了许多厨师，厨师们挡不住鬼人金的进攻。	Krieg Pirates' Gin the "Man-Demon" appears on deck and hurts many chefs who cannot stop Gin's attack.
进过激烈的战斗，艰难的将鬼人金击败了，山治表示克利克十分狡猾，一定会对哲普老板不利，你决定去探望哲普老板。	You defeat Gin the "Man-Demon" but Sanji says Krieg is very crafty and might take other action against Zeff. You decide to check on Zeff.
来到哲普老板的房间却发现2个克利克的护卫将哲普带走了，临走前扬言要你们用船交换哲普，你决定与山治商量对策。	You went to Zeff's room and discovered 2 Krieg's Guards capturing Zeff and taking him away. The guards told you to use the ship to exchange for Zeff. You decide to find Sanji to figure out a plan.
听说哲普老板被克利克的手下抓走，山治十分愤怒，但这餐厅是哲普的全部，不能交给克利克，只能击败护卫营救哲普。	Hearing that Zeff is captured by Krieg Guards, Sanji is extremely angry. But he decides that he cannot hand over this restaurant to Krieg, so he has to defeat the Guards to rescue Zeff. 
营救出了哲普老板，可是克利克却突然发难发射了毒气弹，山治缺少防毒面具中毒，去找帕迪寻找解毒药。	After rescuing Zeff, Krieg suddenly released his poison gas bomb. Sanji doesn't have a mask and he's poisoned, so you go to Patty to find the antidote. 
从帕迪拿拿到了解毒药，可是这是解食物中毒的，不知道对毒气中毒是否有用，死马当活马医地喂山治吃下了解毒药。	You get the antidote from Patty and give to Sanji. But you're not sure if the antidote will work.
将主角提升至40级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 40
解毒药发挥了作用，山治的情况好了许多，对于克利克的所作所为你再也无法忍受，决定对克利克发起进攻。	Sanji recovers after taking the antidote. You decide you cannot stand Krieg anymore and will challenge Krieg directly.
经过苦战击败了克利克，在巴拉蒂的庆功宴上，山治要求加入小队，并讲述了自己的梦想，在离开前与哲普告别。	After defeating Krieg and while celebrating on Baratie, Sanji requested to join the team and talked about his dream. So you guys say good bye to Zeff.
山治决定追逐自己的梦想，一伙人告别哲普回到东方之星。	Sanji decides to follow his own dream and join your crew. You guys say goodbye to Zeff and return to Star of the East.
为了找回独自离开的娜美，一伙人来到了娜美的故乡可可西亚。	To find Nami, you guys go to Nami's hometown, Cocoyasi.
根据娜美的描述你们了解到可可西亚是娜美的故乡，但是这个城镇却遭受着鱼人的统治，此时镇长的警察阿健遇上了头疼的事情。	You guys find out that Cocoyasi Village is Nami's hometown, but this village is also controlled by the fishmen. The village police, Genzo, needs your help.
阿健说可可西亚四面环海，村民需要经常出海，但是这几天海域变得十分危险，冒出了许多海兽作乱，已经有许多村民出海遇难了。	Genzo says many sea monsters appear in the sea surrounding Cocoyasi and they're causing trouble.  He needs your help to get rid of them.
虽然击败了海兽，但是问题的源头是可以命令海兽的巨大生物海牛哞哞，帮人帮到底，你决定前去驯服海牛哞哞。	Even though you defeated the sea monsters, but Mohmoo the Sea Cow is the one controlling them. You decide to help by taming Mohmoo the Sea Cow. 
经过激烈的战斗，海牛哞哞被击败逃走了，阿健对你们强大的实力感到诧异，并对你们表示十分感谢。	After serious fighting, Mohmoo the Sea Cow lost and fled. Genzo is surprise at your power and truly thanks you. 
娜美对你们能够解决阿健的烦恼十分自信，你们刚从阿健那离开，娜美就迎了上来，不过娜美也遇到了麻烦。	Nami had full confidence that you guys could easily solve Genzo's problem. Just when you guys left Genzo, Nami comes to you to ask for help. 
藏宝图关系着娜美所有的财产，一定不能有失，娜美说是鱼人窃贼偷走了自己的藏宝图，你决定去找鱼人窃贼夺回藏宝图。	Treasure Map is hidden the location of all of Nami's treasure. Nami says Fishmen Thief stole her Treasure Map, so you decide to go after the Fishmen Thief to get back the Treasure Map. 
将主角提升至41级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 41
虽然击败了鱼人窃贼，但是并没有从鱼人窃贼的身上发现藏宝图的踪迹，而啾是这次带队的干部，娜美怀疑藏宝图在啾手上。	Even though you defeated the Fishmen Thief, but you cannot find the Treasure Map. Chew is the leader of this Fishmen Team, Nami suspects that Chew has the Treasure Map.
果然在啾的身上发现了娜美丢失的藏宝图，娜美终于长吁一口气，这时候阿健语气焦急的请求你们过去帮忙。	You find Nami's treasure map after defeating Chew. At very moment, Genzo comes to seek for your help.
阿健说鱼人又到村子里来收保护费了，而小女孩一家的钱却不够缴纳这次的保护费，鱼人要杀了小女孩，了解事情后你十分愤怒，对收保护费的鱼人大打出手。	Genzo says the fishmen came to the village to collect monthly fees. The little girl's family does not have enough money to pay the fee. The fishmen want to kill the girl's family. You are very angry and attack the Fee Collecting Fishmen.
将主角提升至42级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 42
你们救了小女孩一家，小女孩十分感谢你们，但小女孩的神色看上去却并不轻松，原来这次鱼人还有一个带队队长克罗欧比。	The little girl's family thanks you for rescuing them, but the girl is still worried about the leader of the fishmen team, Kuroobi. 
一番苦战后，克罗欧比被击败了，而小女孩却让你们赶紧离开村庄，整个村庄的人似乎都很惧怕鱼人，你决定向阿健询问事情缘由。	After defeating Kuroobi, the little girl suggests you escape from the village to avoid the fishmen. You decide to ask Genzo for the reason.
正当你寻找阿健的时候却发现阿健被几个鱼人围住了，原来小八的护卫发现了阿健藏有武器，打算把阿健杀了，你决定阻止这一切。	While you are looking for Genzo, you find Genzo is surrounding by a bunch of fishmen because Hatchan's Guard discovered that Genzo had hidden weapon so they wanted to kill him. You decide to stop all this.
将主角提升至43级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 43
击败了小八的护卫，小八出现了，据阿健描述，小八擅长的是六刀流，同样是用剑的，激起了索隆的斗志，决定前去迎战小八。	After defeating Hatchan's Guard, Hatchan appeared and he's a Six-Sword Style fishman. Zoro decides to challenge Hatchan with his sword fighting skills.
索隆的三刀流完胜了小八的六刀流，阿健再次对你们的实力表达了钦佩，并讲述了娜美的过去，希望你们可以帮到娜美。	Zoro's Santoryu completely win against Hatchan's Six-Sword Style. Genzo expresses his admiration for you and talks about Nami's past. He hopes you can help Nami. 
众人来到了娜美住的小屋，却发现一群海军正在挖娜美的宝藏，这些钱是娜美用来买村庄的，娜美请求你们击败夺金海军队长。	You guys reached Nami's place and found a bunch of marines digging for Nami's treasure. These beli are for Nami to purchase the village. Nami asks you guys to defeat Captain Nezumi. 
事出蹊跷，娜美有那么多钱海军是绝对不会知道的，这背后是阿龙在主使，娜美决定前往阿龙公园找阿龙把事情问清楚。	The marines must have received information from Arlong about Nami's treasure. Nami decides to go to Arlong Park and talk to Arlong about it.
激烈的战斗后成功击败鱼人看守进入阿龙公园，可是战斗动静太大，已经让鱼人看守队长觉察到有人闯入阿龙公园。	You guys successfully defeat Fishmen Guard and enter Arlong Park, but the fighting attracts the attention of Fishmen Guard Captain. 
击败鱼人看守队长后听到港口一声巨响，港口的位置正是阿健所在的地方，担心阿健出意外，你决定先赶往港口。	You hear a loud noise coming from the harbor and are worried about Genzo, you decide to go to the harbor first. 
阿健和村民向海军发出了求救信，可是救援的海军却被阿龙干部击败，阿健与村民隐忍了多年的努力白费，一时间大家都很沮丧，你决定帮助他们。	Genzo and the villagers sent letters to the marine to ask for help, but the marines were defeated by Arlong Pirates. Genzo and the villagers are all very depressed, you decide to help them.
将主角提升至44级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 44
没有费多大功夫就轻松击败了阿龙精英，阿健提议这次带队的啾已经落单了，这时候击败他是打击阿龙的好机会。	You easily defeat the Arlong Elite. Genzo mentions now that Chew is by himself, it'll be easy to defeat him and deal a blow to Arlong.
正当大家为击败阿龙干部啾高兴的时候，娜美的哭声使得大家的开心的心情消失了，自从娜美从阿龙那边回来就一直哭泣，你决定赶上前了解情况。	You guys hear Nami crying and she's been crying since returning from Arlong Park, you decide to ask her about the situation.
原来阿龙为了让娜美一直为他画海图而串谋海军夺走了娜美的买下村子的贝利，阿健和村民再也忍受不了，纷纷拿出武器反抗阿龙，娜美向你求救。	Arlong collaborated with the marine to take Nami's Beli. Genzo and the villagers decide to rebel against Arlong, so Nami asks for your help.
将主角提升至45级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 45
再次来到阿龙公园，阿龙公园的守备力量比起之前强大了许多，守在门口的就是阿龙的得下手下小八，不过能击败小八一次就能击败他第二次。	Coming to Arlong Park again, you realize there are more guards than before including Hatchan standing at the gate. But you believe you guys can easily defeat him again.
经过一番苦战艰难的击败了小八，发现在有水的区域鱼人的战斗力会提升，为了更好的面对接下来的敌人，阿健决定告诉你一些秘密。	Through fighting against Hatchan, you discover that the fishmen's battle power increases in water. To help you better prepare for the oncoming battle, Genzo teaches you some secret.
在阿健的指导下，你很快就学会了船只改造，由此战斗力提升了许多，正好来了一批鱼人，你决定拿他们练练手。	You quickly learn Ship Retrofit from Genzo and increase your battle power significantly. Just then a group of fishmen attacks, so you decide to challenge them.
将主角提升至46级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 46
克罗欧比出现了，这家伙极为擅长鱼人空手道，不过你已经知道了鱼人的弱点，就不怕被他拖入水中战斗了。	Kuroobi appears and he's an expert at Fishmen Karate, but you know of his weakness already and are confident to defeat him.
不出意外地击败了克罗欧比，阿健却传来消息小女孩不见了，娜美推测可能是被阿龙的手下抓走了，你决定去询问阿健了解情况。	Genzo sends message to tell you that the little girl is missing. Nami guesses that Arlong Pirates might have her. You go to Genzo to find out more information.
阿健告诉你们，小女孩被阿龙的护卫抓走了，你决定先击败阿龙的护卫救出小女孩。	Genzo tells you that Arlong Guard took the little girl. So you decide to defeat Arlong Guard first to rescue the little girl.
成功从阿龙护卫的手中救出了小女孩，还没来得及松口气小女孩说刚才见到娜美浑身战栗，希望你可以去看下娜美。	You rescue the little girl and even before you rest, the little girl says Nami is shaking in anger and wishes you to go and check on Nami. 
阿龙的所作所为让娜美痛苦不堪，村民们也再也无法忍受阿龙了，只有击败阿龙才能够改变这一切。	Nami is suffering from Arlong's action and the villagers cannot stand him anymore. Only by defeating Arlong, then entire village can be saved.
打倒了阿龙，可可西亚村也解放了，在众人的依依不舍下离开了可可西亚回到东方之星。	With Arlong defeated, the village is saved. You guys leave Cocoyasi and return to Star of the East.
历练归来后，实力已经足以进入伟大航路，做好准备准备想伟大航路出发！	Your battle power is enough to enter the Grand Line, so you guys prepare before leaving for the Grand Line!
一伙人做好准备，准备前往距离伟大航路最近的罗格镇，那是一个海贼世界开始的城镇！	You guys are prepared and decide to leave for Loguetown, the island closest to the entrance of Grand Line.
罗格镇镇长十分欢迎你们的到来，罗格镇最年轻的上士达斯琪女士遇上了不小的麻烦，你决定询问发生了什么。	Loguetown Mayor welcomes your arrival. Loguetown's Master Chief Petty Officer Tashigi needs help and you decide to ask her about the situation.
经过一番询问后才知道达斯琪烦恼的是因为最近镇上来了许多捣乱的海贼，导致治安混乱，思索后你决定帮助达斯琪。	Tashigi is worried about the Troublemaking Pirates creating unrest in town. You decide to help Tashigi. 
将主角提升至47级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 47
不出所料，你两三下就轻松的收拾了捣乱的海贼，背后的狮吼声引起了你的注意，这声音好熟悉，似乎在哪里听过。	You easily get rid of the Troublemaking Pirates yet the lion's roar behind you sounds familiar, as if you heard of it before.
原来又是狮子利基，真是冤家路窄，达斯琪十分感谢你解决了狮子利基，突然听到小女孩的哭声，赶紧过去看看吧。	The lion was Richie the Lion and you defeated him easily. Tashigi thanks you for getting rid of Richie the Lion but suddenly you hear a little girl crying, so you decide to check on the little girl. 
好不容易挤开了围观的人来到小女孩身边，海贼碰到了小女孩把冰淇淋弄地上了，几个海贼不但不道歉还恶语威胁，实在看不下你决定好好教训他们。	You reach the little girl and discover the pirates had bump the little girl and knocked her ice cream on the floor. In addition to not apologizing, the pirates were also threatening her. You decide to teach the pirates a lesson. 
十分英勇的打跑了作乱海贼，小女孩顿时破涕为笑了，事情刚解决，达斯琪就赶到了，十分称赞你的行为同时有任务需要你的协助。	The little girl smiles her tears away. Tashigi arrives and praises you for your action, at the same time asking you for help.
有市民透露曾看到几个海贼密谋在广场上引爆炸弹，这次的任务十分艰巨，要赶在炸弹爆炸前阻止这一切。	A citizen sends message about some pirates planning to explode a bomb at the plaza. The task this time is to stop all this to prevent the explosion.
将主角提升至48级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 48
险之又险地阻止了广场上的爆炸，却发现有几个行踪诡异的人一闪而过，跟上去竟然发现是在橘子镇交过手的卡巴吉。	You prevent the explosion yet discover a few strange acting pirates passing by. You follow them and discover Cabaji, whom you met before in Orange Town, among the pirates.
将抓捕到的卡巴吉交给达斯琪，正好看到镇长向你走来，一问之下来知道镇长发现了一些不同寻常的地方。	You capture Cabaji and hand him over to Tashigi, at the same time the Mayor comes to find you. He heard some strange information from the citizens. 
原来镇上来了一个十分漂亮的大美女，据说这美女从前可是一个十分丑的肥婆，一些爱美的市民正在向她讨教变美的方法。	A great beauty appeared in town and she used to be a fat ugly lady, so some of the citizens are asking her about how to turn into a beauty like herself.
亚尔丽塔变美的原因竟然是吃了滑滑果实，这让一些爱美的镇民感到失望，而达斯琪从这些天反常的行为中发现了蹊跷。	Alvida lost weight and became beautiful because she ate the Smooth-Smooth Fruit which led to the citizens feeling disappointed. Yet Tashigi discovered something strange in all these news.
将主角提升至49级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 49
达斯琪审问了抓捕的卡巴吉，发现这些天的行为都是一个叫巴基的海贼策划的，而且巴基已经在广场现身了，快去抓捕他吧。	Tashigi interrogated Cabaji and discovered all these actions were plotted by a pirate name Buggy. Buggy appears at the plaza, go capture him.
一切都是巴基为了抓你的阴谋，苦战后终于逃脱巴基的追击，斯摩格上校召集海军，达斯琪来不及打招呼就走了，而镇长急匆匆地跑来找你。	Buggy plotted all these events to capture Luffy, you guys defeat Buggy and escape. Captain Smoker summons all marines, so Tashigi left. Then the Mayor quickly comes to find you.
罗格镇镇长告诉你看到摩奇为了阻止你们逃跑去港口烧船了，为了保护梅利号你必须赶在摩奇之前到达港口。	Loguetown Mayor tells you that Mohji went to the harbor to burn your ship. To protect Going Merry, you have to reach the harbor before Mohji.
一路狂奔到达港口阻止了摩奇的烧船行为，却发现有追击你们的海军出现，只能硬着头皮进行战斗了。	You rush to the harbor to stop Mohji yet meet the marines along the way, so you have no choice but to fight the marines.
将主角提升至50级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 50
罗格镇镇长过来告诉你这一切是斯摩格上校召集了所有海军并下令不惜一切代价抓捕草帽一伙，连达斯琪也无能违背命令。	Loguetown Mayor tells you that Captain Smoker summons all marines to capture the Straw Hat Pirates and even Tashigi cannot violate the orders.
斯摩格上校骑着自己摩托车亲自追了上来，这次战斗已经避无可避了，想要离开罗格镇就必须打败斯摩格。	Captain Smoker rides his motorcycle to chase after you guys. You have no choice but to defeat Smoker if you want to leave Loguetown.
斯摩格的最后一击被神秘人阻拦了，趁机你们乘上了梅利号告别镇长离开了罗格镇，前方就是伟大航路了。	Smoker's final strike was blocked by a mysterious man. You guys escape and get on Going Merry, say good bye to the Mayor and leave Loguetown. Next stop is the Grand Line.
梅利号突然间开始摇晃起来，天气出乎意料地迎来了暴风雨，更雪上加霜的是遭到了海兽的袭击，没想到刚进入伟大航路就遇到如此麻烦。	Going Merry suddenly starts shaking as you guys sail through a thunderstorm. It is also attacked by the Sea Monsters. 
将主角提升至51级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 51
击败了海兽，海面终于恢复了平静，而梅利号被海兽撞击偏离了原来的航道，而你们的底下就是一只海王类。	After defeating the Sea Monsters, the sea finally calms down. Yet Going Merry deviates the original sailing route and a Sea King is right under the ship.
出了海王类的巢穴，意外的发现梅利号上多了一个小女孩，竟然神不知鬼不觉的来到了梅利号上，快去问问她究竟是何方神圣吧。	After leaving the Sea King's den, you suddenly discover a new girl on the Going Merry, so you decide to talk to her.
经过一番盘问后了解到小女孩叫阿碧丝，是唯一知道龙骨消息的人，但有一群海军败类为了龙骨的消息正在追捕她。	You find out that the little girl's name is Apis and she's the only one who knows the location of the Thousand Year Dragon. But a group of Marine Scums who are after the dragon bones are trying to capture her.
经过一番思索你决定帮助阿碧丝护送龙爷前往龙穴，却没发现海军败类首领一直尾随你们，直到到达龙穴，海军败类首领才露出真面目。	You guys decide to help Apis escort Sennenryu to the dragon's den, yet you are not aware that Marine Scums Leader following after you guys. Only until you reach the den, the Marine Scums Leader shows up. 
解决了海军的麻烦后，龙穴恢复了平静，阿碧丝坚持留下来守护龙爷，依依不舍的告别阿碧丝你们来到了伟大航路的入口--颠倒山。	After dealing with the Marines, the dragon's den back to normal. Apis insists on staying to guard Sennenryu. You guys say good bye to Apis and reach the Grand Line's entrance - Reverse Mountain. 
伟大航路就在眼前了，顺利地冲上了水门，正当大家以为到达伟大航路时，冒出了几个装备精良的守卫阻拦你们进入伟大航路。	Grand Line is right in front and your ship successfully reaches the water gate. Just as everybody thinks they have reached the Grand Line, a few well equipped guards block your entrance to the Grand Line. 
将主角提升至52级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 52
激烈的战斗后成功翻越山顶，大家都欢呼进入了伟大航路，可是前面怎么一片黑黑的？是一座大山，哦不！是一只鲸鱼！	After furious fighting, your ship climbs over the mountain top. Everybody is joyful at entering the Grand Line, but why is it black in front? Is it a mountain? Oh no! It's a whale!
鲸鱼拉布愤怒地将众人吞进肚内，正当大家绝望时却发现鲸鱼肚内别有洞天，还有一个花大叔坐在岛上，初来乍到，赶紧去打个招呼。	The whale, Laboon, swallows everyone into his stomach. You guys discover a different world inside the whale, and an old man Crocus sitting on an island. You guys go to say hi.
你们的来临惊吓了花大叔正在抓捕的海兽，惹得花大叔十分不开心，只能去捕捉几只海兽来补偿花大叔。	Your arrival scared the sea monsters that Crocus wanted to catch, which made him quite mad. You have to capture a few sea monsters to compensate Crocus. 
将主角提升至53级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 53

花大叔在给拉布打针的时候发现了几个鬼鬼祟祟的踪影，你决定前去打探这些家伙的底细，没想到这些家伙二话不说直接开炮。	Crocus discovers a few sneaky people and you decide to go investigate, yet these people shoot cannons at you guys before you have a chance to talk.

果然没错，Mr.9就是来猎杀拉布的，幸好及时发下了他并组织了他的行为，开心地去向花大叔汇报结果了。	The guy in green is Mr. 9 who came to hunt Laboon, luckily you guys stopped him in time. You happily go to Crocus to report the result.
赶走了猎杀鲸鱼的家伙，可是花大叔的眉毛依然没有舒展开，原来还有另外一只猎鲸小队已经进入了岛内。	Crocus is still worried as another Whale-hunting Team already landed on the island.

据伊卡莱姆所说，最近镇长来了一群捣乱的海贼，为祸乡里，想到村民迎接的热情加上正义感，决定帮助伊卡莱姆。	According to Mayor Igaram, a group of Troublemaking Pirates arrived in town recently. You decide to help Igaram. 
这群捣乱的海贼轻而易举就被击败了，而伊卡莱姆似乎提前就知道你们会击败捣乱的海贼马上迎了上来，并在酒吧设下了宴会邀请你参加。	Igaram seems to know you guys will defeat the Troublemaking Pirates, so he already sets up a banquet at the tavern and invites you guys to join.
盛情难却，来到了酒吧，村民们不停地给你们灌酒，没过多久，索隆第一个醉倒了，你扶着索隆出去发现索隆似乎有什么话想说。	At the tavern, the villagers keep toasting you to make you drink more wine. Soon, Zoro is the first person to become drunk. You help Zoro leave and discover Zoro has something to say.
索隆剑客的直觉告诉他这个小镇十分古怪，而此时酒吧内的伙伴都喝醉了，而村民也扯下伪装的面具露出了真实的身份--巴洛克工作室。	Zoro's swordsman instinct tells him that there is something strange about this town. When all the crew members in tavern became drunk, the villagers show their true identity - Baroque Works.

薇薇是王国的公主，两人一起潜伏在巴洛克当卧底，没想到被巴洛克的人发现了，既然接受了伊卡莱姆的请求就帮到底。	Vivi is the Kingdom's Princess. The two of them are spying on Baroque Works but discovered by other Baroque members. Since you already answered to Igaram's request, you decide to help them to deal with BW.

将主角提升至59级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 59

只听“嗖”的一身，大恐龙被一把巨剑斩成了两半，东利出现了，热情地邀请你们去他家，带着小花园的疑问你们前往东利的家。	The dinosaur is suddenly cut in half and Dorry the Giant appears. He warmly invites you guys to his home. You guys agree to visit Dorry's place with the goal of asking questions regarding to Little Garden.

你做的努力却并没有阻止决斗，布洛基击败了东利，正当布洛基喜极而泣的时候幕后黑手出现并抓住了两个巨人，愤怒的你对他们发起了进攻。	The duel continues and Brogy defeats Dorry. Just as Brogy starts celebrating the win, the mastermind appears and captures the two giants. You angrily decide to attack them.

询问布洛基得知Mr.3有个搭档十分也厉害，会调配不同的颜色产生不同的效果，令人防不胜防。	Brogy tells you Mr. 3 has a partner who uses color to create different attacks that are hard to defend.

布洛基以为东利已经死了嚎啕大哭，而东利竟然在布洛基的泪水中站了起来，原来由于长久的决斗，巨人的武器已变得十分残破。	Brogy cries because he thought Dorry is dead, yet Dorry actually stands up in the midst of the tears. It is because both giants' weapons are too dull to kill anyone.

击败Mr.2后，Miss.双手指来阻拦你们前进，进入战役击败Miss.双手指。	Miss Doublefinger comes to block your progress, enter Battle and defeat Miss Doublefinger. 
马上就要接近最后的房间了，巴洛克男性成员中仅次于Mr.0的Mr.1拦住了你们，进入战役击败Mr.0。	You guys are going to reach the final room, Baroque's Mr. 1 blocks your path, enter Battle and defeat Mr.0. 
即将面对巴洛克工作室最高级的2位人物了，薇薇有发现，与薇薇对话。	You guys will be facing off the two highest members of Baroque Works. Vivi discovered something and wants to tell you.
妮可罗宾已经见到了记载冥王的碑文了，但是她却什么也没有说，进入战役击败妮可罗宾。	Nico Robin already saw the Poneglyph which record info about Pluton, yet she didn't tell anything to Crocodile, enter Battle and defeat Nico Robin. 
将主角提升至80级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 80
只剩下克洛克达尔了，没有找到人间兵器“冥王”,克洛克达尔恼羞成怒要杀掉所有人，进入战役击败克洛克达尔。	Crocodile becomes really angry when he couldn't find "Pluton" and wants to kill everyone. Go defeat Crocodile. 
薇薇成功阻止了内乱，为了感谢你们准备了丰富的晚餐，吃完后海军也要来了，你决定与薇薇对话离开。	Vivi successfully stopped the rebellion and prepared a feast to thank you guys. After the feast, you guys realize the Marines are coming soon. You guys decide to say good bye to Vivi.
你们要离开了，薇薇决定不和你们一起走，经过一番对话，妮可罗宾加入船员日志，前往加雅岛屿娜美对话。	You guys will leave and Vivi decides to not join you guys. After chatting with Nico Robin, she decides to join you guys. You guys leave for Jaya Island.
航行半年终于快到加亚岛了，却发现海底有动静，决定先去探查。	After sailing for a long time, you guys will almost reach Jaya Island yet you discover something in the seabed, so you went to investigate.
潜入海底才发现原来是一群打捞沉船的海贼，正准备撤退时被海底打捞王发现了。	Diving into the sea, you guys discovered a group of pirates salvaging sunken ships, when you want to leave, the Salvage King saw you guys.
抵达加亚岛，却发现记录指针一直指向天空，决定找人去问问。	You guys arrived at Jaya Island yet you find out that the Log Pose continue to point to the sky, so you decide to ask people for clues.
找到酒吧老板娘了解记录指针的缘由，去岸边了解情况。	You find the Tavern Owner and find out why the Log Pose points to the sky, then you went to the coast to find more info.
在岸边与海底探险王的手下起了冲突，只好去会一会海底探险王。	You got in a fight with the Adventure King's henchmen, so you decide to challenge the Adventure King.
回来后却被告知娜美遇到了麻烦，赶紧去娜美的地方。	When you return, you found out Nami is in trouble, so you went to find Nami.
原来娜美在港口与其他海贼起了冲突，你决定先解决这些海贼。	Nami got in trouble with some pirates at the Harbor, so you decide to deal with these Pirates first.
将主角提升至81级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 81.
在镇上徘徊了一阵子，决定还是要找酒吧老板娘去了解空岛的线索。	After wandering in the town for a while, you decide to find the Tavern Owner for clues about Skypiea.
刚赶到酒吧老板娘的住处，却发现酒吧老板娘也遭遇到了麻烦。	Just as you reach the Tavern, you discover the Tavern Owner is also having some problems.
帮酒吧老板娘赶走了旅店恶霸，没想到恶霸的头领萨奇斯赶了过来。	After helping the Tavern Owner chased away the Hotel Bullies, the leader of those bullies, Sarkies, arrived.
无奈与贝拉米海贼团起了冲突，只好去击败贝拉米。	Since you already fight against the Bellamy Pirates, you have no choice but to defeat Bellamy .
在酒吧老板娘的指引下，了解到了住在岛另一端的文布兰・库力克可能了解一些空岛的线索。	Under the Tavern Owner's direction, you find out that Montblanc Cricket who live at the other side of the island might know some clues about Skypiea.
将主角提升至82级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 82.
文布兰・库力克要求你证明自己的实力。	Montblanc Cricket wants you to prove your power.
没想到海底探险王是文布兰・库力克的另一个小弟，只能击败他再次证明实力。	You guys didn't expect that Adventure King is also Montblanc Cricket's henchman, defeat him to prove your own power.
击败两小弟后，文布兰・库力克决定亲自试试你的身手。	Montblanc Cricket decides to personally challenge you.
告知想要去空岛需要有上冲气流的帮助，而下次上冲气流爆发的时间就在明天。	Mountblanc Cricket tells you guys that you need to get on the Knock-up Stream to reach Skypiea, and the next Knock-up Stream explosion time is tomorrow.
与娜美汇合准备前往空岛，却被一群奇怪的海贼拦截了。	You guys met up with Nami to prepare to leave for Skypiea but was blocked by a group of strange pirates.
原来这群海贼是贝拉米海贼团的，这次又来找麻烦了。	These pirates are part of Bellamy Pirates and they are here to create trouble.
上升气流马上就要开启了，而萨奇斯挡住了去路。	Knock-up Stream will blow soon, yet Sarkies blocked your path.
将主角提升至83级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 83
上升气流就在前面了，可是贝拉米已经带人拦住了去路。	Knock-up Stream is right in front, but Bellamy already brought people with him to block your path.
终于赶上了上升气流到达了空岛，遇见了一个演奏竖琴的女孩。	You guys finally got on the Knock-up Stream and reached Skypiea, and you met a girl playing harp.
在空岛闲逛，遇见了热心的天空骑士――甘福尔。	While walking in Skypiea, you guys met the kind hearted Knight of the Sky, Gan Fall.
没想到进入空岛竟然要10亿的通行费，只能强闯了。	You guys didn't expect entering Skypiea costs 7 Billion Extol, so you can only forcefully enter..
拿不出10亿的通行费，惹恼了空岛的巡逻卫兵。	You guys could not pay the 7 Billion Extol and annoyed Skypiea's Patrol Team.
你的名单被空岛的警卫队长上了通缉榜，现在正到处统计你。	You guys' names are added to the Wanted List by Skypiea's Security Captain and they will try to capture you guys.
甘福尔想要和山迪亚联合对抗艾尼路，你决定找山迪亚的族长瓦帕谈一谈。	Gan Fall wants to find Shandia and work together to fight against Enel, you decide to go find Wiper, the leader of Shandia warriors, to talk about this.
想要和谈，必须要证明自己的实力，瓦帕让你与山迪亚的精英对决。	Wiper wants you to prove your power first by fighting against Shandia Elites.
将主角提升至84级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 84.
证明了自己，没想到空岛的麦金利因为没有缴纳通行费正在到处通缉你。	After proving yourself, you find out Skypiea's McKinley is still trying to capture you for not paying the entrance fees.
解决了空岛的麻烦，决定前往神之岛。	After solving the issue at Angel Island, you guys decide to go to Upper Yard.
听命于神的白贝雷军来抓捕你了，只好与白贝雷军发生战斗。	The White Berets came to capture you, so you had to fight against the White Berets.
一场恶战后击败了白贝雷军，决定找一个神之岛的向导。	You defeated the White Berets and wants to find a guide in Upper Yard.

将主角提升至85级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 85

将主角提升至86级	Upgrade Main Character to Level 86

经历一番恶战后终于成为了绳之试炼的优胜者，接下来面临的就是掌管绳之试炼的强大骑士修拉。	Through battling, you become the winner of Ordeal of String, and your last challenge is the Priest in charge of Ordeal of String, Sky Rider Shura.
原来神之岛是之前的神――甘福尔的住处，甘福尔一定熟悉神之岛的情况，决定先去找甘福尔。	Gan Fall, who was the former God, used to live at Upper Yard so he must know the Upper Yard quite well, you decide to go find Gan Fall.
在神之岛的边缘还有大蟒蛇的守护，想要前往神庙必须击败大蟒蛇。	There is also a Python guarding the path to the Gold City, so you must defeat the Python first.
将主角升至87级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 87.

艾尼路手下掌管沼之试炼的盖达兹阻拦了你的去路，想要前进必须打败他。	Gedatsu, who is in charge of Ordeal of Swamp, blocks your path so you must defeat him.
经过一番苦战击败盖达兹，	You finally are able to defeat Gedatsu.

艾尼路已经登上了海贼船，前往巨大蔓藤想追上艾尼路却遭遇了莎德利的阻拦。	Enel already went on the Ark Maxim, you got on the giant beanstalk to chase Enel yet met Satori along the way.
原来艾尼路的四大神官已经在巨大蔓藤上做好了埋伏，你决定先去寻找援手。	The 4 Priests already prepare to ambush you on the beanstalk, you go to look for help.
甘福尔听闻了艾尼路的所作所为，决定一同对抗艾尼路。	Gan Fall heard of Enel's action and decide you to fight against Enel.
四神官已经被打败了2个，甘福尔大叔也受伤了，接下来的就只能靠自己了。	2 of the Priests are defeated and Gan Fall is hurt, so the rest is up to you.
将主角升至89级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 89.

告别甘福尔后，准备也和瓦帕告别。	You say goodbye to Gan Fall and Wiper.

无奈输了比赛，乔巴输给了福克西，必须要赢得第二回合的比赛。	You lost the first round and lost Chopper to Foxy, so you must win the second round.
经过一番苦战赢回了乔巴，福克西提出最后的决战！	You won back Chopper and Foxy requested a final duel!
经过一番历练后回到起航之港与香克斯对话。	You return back to Set Sail Harbor to tell Shanks of your experiences.

将主角升至91级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 91.

钱已经被弗兰奇家族的老大弗兰奇带走了，你决定找弗兰奇理论。	Franky Family's leader, Franky, took the money away, you decide to go find Franky.
弗兰奇因为小弟被打伤也十分生气，命令摩兹前来对付你。	Franky was mad at you for hurting his family member, so he sent Mozu to deal with you.

将主角升至92级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 92.

真相是隐藏在重重迷雾中的，为了证明罗宾的清白，你决定抓获击败海军守卫引出CP9的成员。	The truth is hidden in the midst. To prove Robin's innocence, you decide to defeat Marine Guards to lure CP9 members.
CP9成员现身了，你决定前去会会他们。	CP9 members appeared, you decide to challenge them.

将主角升至93级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 93.
听冰山市长说罗宾现身在大街上了，你决定前去向罗宾询问清楚整件事情。	Iceburg tells you that Robin has appeared, you decide to go find Robin to talk to her.
据冰山市长推测一切都是因为冥王设计图，只有罗宾能解读设计图，为了追赶罗宾，开始寻找办法。	Iceburg guesses the goal is to get the Pluton's Blueprint, and only Robin can understand the Blueprint. You start thinking about methods to find Robin.

在海列车的车厢内遇到了拳击手杰利的阻拦，一场大战不可避免。	On the Sea Train, the first person you met is Jerry the Boxer, so you have to beat him.
原来罗宾是为了不影响大家才主动跟随CP9的成员出发，你决定救出罗宾。	Robin willingly followed CP9 members to save others, so you decide to rescue Robin.
在海之列车上遭遇了瓦杰的阻拦，必须击败他。	Next, you met Wanze on the Sea Train, you have to defeat him

将主角升至94级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 94.

解决了T骨上校后，终于追上了CP9，CP9的高级成员布鲁诺现身了。	After defeating Marine Captain T-Bone, you guys reached CP9 and Blueno appears.

将主角升至95级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 95.
冲过大门后就是司法岛了，后续的海军也赶来支援了，要先打败他们。	You passed the gate and enter Enies Lobby, and the Marines came to support the guards, defeat them first!
司法岛的审判长巴斯克维尔把守在了大门前，一鼓作气击败他！	Enies Lobby's Chief Justice Baskerville is guarding at the door, defeat him!
好不容易进入了司法岛本岛，却发现司法岛一半的守卫都聚集在主岛的前门。	You finally arrive on Enies Lobby Island, and discovered half of the guards of Enies Lobby are at the door.

与弗兰奇碰头一同营救罗宾。	You meet up with Franky to rescue Robin.

将主角升至97级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 97.

一番苦战后击败雄狮偎取登上了2楼，来到了卡莉法的房间。	You defeat Kumadori and reach Kalifa's room.
击败卡莉法后，来到了书房，遭遇了四到流的卡库。	You defeat Kalifa and go to the  study, where you met Yontoryu Kaku.
一番苦战后终于击败卡库来到了最后一个房间，房间的主人是加布拉。	You reached the final room and the owner is Jabra.
将主角升至98级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 98.
没想到罗宾被已经被带往正义之门，你决定抄捷径营救罗宾。	Robin is taken to Gates of Justice already, so you take the shortcut to rescue Robin.
猫头鹰重新出现在了踌躇之桥上，必须抓紧时间击败他。	Fukuro appears on the Bridge of Hesitation, you need to hurry up and defeat him.
雄狮偎取也赶来增援猫头鹰，需要抓紧时间击败他。	Kumadori comes to assist Fukuro, hurry up and defeat him also!
泡泡果实能力的卡莉法也来到了踌躇之桥，看来一切不好办了。	Kalifa, who has the Bubble-Bubble Fruit abilities, also arrives on the Bridge of Hesitation, it won't be easy to defeat her.
将主角升至99级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 99.
接下来要面对的是CP9中的最强者罗布・路奇，为了救出罗宾，拼了命也要打败他。	Next, you need to defeat Rob Lucci, the most powerful of the CP9, to rescue Robin.
一番苦战后终于击败罗布・路奇，来到了正义之门，罗宾还没进入。	You defeat Rob Lucci and reached Gates of Justice, but Robin hasn't arrived yet.
CP9的长官斯潘达姆囚禁着罗宾，必须击败他才能成功营救罗宾。	Chief of CP9, Spandam, is guarding Robin, you need to defeat him to rescue Robin.
将主角升至100级。	Upgrade Main Character to Level 100.
罗宾被成功救出，而斯潘达姆却启动了传说中的屠魔令，整个司法岛要被海军摧毁了。	Robin is successfully rescued, but Spandam starts the Buster Call and the entire Enies Lobby will be destroyed by the Marines.
在海军军舰迅速包围了整个司法岛，必须想办法突围。	The Marine Fleets quickly surrounded Enies Lobby, you guys need to breakthrough.
整个司法岛被摧毁了，只剩下踌躇之桥上还有幸存者，斯潘达姆派了罗布・路奇来阻止你的突围。	The entire Enies Lobby is destroyed and only the people on Bridge of Hesitation are alive. Spandam sends Rob Lucci to stop you guys.
一番大战后终于突围成功，逃出生天，与可可罗婆婆告别启程恐怖三桅帆船。	You guys successfully escape from Enies Lobby, so you say goodbye to Kokoro and leave for Thriller Bark.
强化装备能有效提高战斗力，并且可以获得丰厚奖励。	Enhance gear to effectively increase Battle Power, at the same time receive abundant rewards.
海贼试炼是一场能力的挑战，你将面对各种海贼的挑战，战胜可以获得丰厚奖励。	Pirate Trial is test of capabilities. You will end up meeting different types of pirates, and receive abundant rewards if you win.
全三星击败亚尔丽塔之战所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Battle vs. Alvida to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败斧手蒙卡之战的所有战役点即可获取丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Battle vs. Axe-Hand Morgan  to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败小丑巴基之战的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Battle vs. Buggy to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败克洛的阴谋的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Kuro's Plot to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败挑战世上最强男人的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Challenging Greatest Swordsman in the World to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败提督克利克之战的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Battle vs. Admiral Krieg to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败摧毁阿龙公园上的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Destroy Arlong Park I to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败摧毁阿龙公园下的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Destroy Arlong Park II to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败罗格镇之战的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Battle at Loguetown to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败翻越颠倒山的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Crossing Reverse Mountain to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败双子岬的拉布的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Twin Cape Lighthouse's Laboon to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败威士忌小镇的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Whiskey Peak to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败小花园之战上的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Little Garden I to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败小花园之战下的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Little Garden II to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败磁鼓岛之战的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Battle at Drum Island to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败登陆阿拉巴斯坦的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Aboard Alabasta to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败梦之城雨地的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within City of Dreams - Rainbase to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败决战阿鲁巴拿的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Showdown at Alubarna to receive abundant rewards.
全三星击败打倒七武海的所有战役点，即可获得丰厚奖励。	3 Stars Defeat all battles within Defeat the Shichibukai to receive abundant rewards.
招募船员成为你的伙伴，船员主要通过酒馆招募和精英副本掉落。	Recruit crew members to become your companion. You can recruit at the Tavern or through Elite Battle loots.
战船是航海的必备，提升战船还能获得丰厚奖励。	Battle Ship is necessary for sailing, and upgrading Battle Ships can receive abundant rewards.
提升主角等级，使自己更加强力。	Upgrade Main Character Level, and become more powerful.
宝石可以提升装备能力，收集宝石还能获得丰厚奖励。	Gems can increase gears' capabilities, and collecting gems can receive abundant rewards.
贝壳是空岛特有的产物，收集贝壳还能获得丰厚奖励。	All Dials come from Skypiea, and collecting Dials can receive abundant rewards.

黄金梅丽号	Going Merry
方舟箴言	Ark Maxim
万里阳光号	Thousand Sunny
九蛇号	Kuja Ship
金狮子号	Island Ship
雷德.佛斯号	Red Force
莫比迪克号	Moby Dick
方舟诺亚	Noah
奥罗・杰克逊号	Oro Jackson
草帽海贼团的第一艘正式海贼船，是一艘骨架结构、三角帆全都使用船尾中央掌舵法的“卡拉维尔帆船”。由乌索普好友可雅赠送，设计者是梅利管家。	The Going Merry was the first ship of the Straw Hat Pirates.It is a caravel class ship designed by Merry and given by Kaya. 
整艘船是由空岛之神艾尼路用山多拉的黄金打造而成，动力能源是雷电。能够浮在空中，也能够飞到月球！	Enel's electrical energy is its main power supply, he used the gold from the Shandora ruins as a conductor for his electricity.The Maxim is capable of flight, even in space!
草帽海贼团的第二艘海贼船，设计者为弗兰奇，整船由宝树亚当为材料制作而成。意义为“要像太阳一样，从容快乐的，穿越残酷的万里大海”。	The Thousand Sunny is the second ship of the Straw Hat Pirates, designed by Franky, built from Adam Wood. The name describes a ship as bright as the sun that will cheerfully sail through a thousand seas.
月光・莫利亚的船只，整艘船就是一座矗立在魔幻三角地带的岛屿，四周都被浓雾包围，专门捕捉路过的船只。墓地与森林是甲板，中央的城堡就是桅杆！	A giant ship located on the Florian Triangle and owned by Gekko Moriah. It preys on passing ships. Shrouded by mist, its deck is made up of forest and graveyard, its mast is the castle at the centre.
海贼女帝波雅・汉库克率领的九蛇海贼团的船。把有毒的蛇绑在船首上，借此保护船只。由于动力是蛇，故而可以自由的在无风带航行。	A ship owned by the Kuja Pirates led by Boa Hancock. Two poisonous serpents are tied to the front, where they steer and protect the ship.
传说中的三大海贼之一，飞空海贼团船长金狮子史基的船，主船船头是金色鬃毛狮子。全舰队共有几十艘船，全部可以飞天，是第一艘运用恶魔果实能力作为动力源的海贼船。	Befitting his title as the Flying Pirate, Shiki has a flying pirate ship. The figurehead is a massive golden Oriental looking lion. This is the second ship revealed that utilizes Devil Fruit powers to fly.
红发香克斯的海贼船，船头是一条龙头，船身为红色，给人的感觉盛气凌人，有压迫感。作为经历了几十年航行的战舰，已经经历了大规模的改造。	The current ship used by the Red Hair Pirates. The hull is painted in red, with a sense of aggression. It's been retrofitted entirely after dozens of years' voyage. 
世界名望最高的大海贼白胡子爱德华・纽盖特乘坐的海贼船队主船，船头是鲸鱼，无论是在容易搁浅的海口，或是中深层海域的海沟皆能自在航行。	A large battleship with a blue whale figurehead,under charge of Whitebeard known as "The Strongest Man in the World". The ship was coated with special resin, which allows her to submerge at any depth.
几百年前，由所有鱼人岛居民建造的巨大船只。传说指出这是岛上居民的梦想，人们托付给这艘船的思念到底是什么？	An enormous ship created during the Void Century by the people of Fishman Island. Noah's exact mission is unknown and will only be revealed the day it is raised from the bottom of sea.
海贼王罗杰所搭乘的海贼船！是一艘汤姆以宝树亚当为材料制造的船，也是世界上唯一成功航行[伟大航路]一周的船只。	A ship made from wood hewn from the treasure tree "Adam" by Tom for Gol D. Roger and the Roger Pirates.It is the only ship that has sailed to the end of the Grand Line.

对敌方全小队造成技力伤害，并有概率<font color="#00EC00">石化</font>1~3回合。	Hancock forms a heart shape beam, which can turn men into stone statues, to attack and deals Skill Power DMG to the whole enemy team with chance of <font color="#00EC00">Petrify</font> for 1 to 3 rounds.
对选定敌人造成普通伤害，并<font color="#00EC00">晕眩</font>2回合，技能可暴击。连续使用2次后会进入4回合冷却。	Deal normal DMG to target enemy and <font color="#00EC00">Stun</font> for 2 round, with a chance for Crit. Hit. 
对敌方当前目标造成双属性伤害	Deal normal and Skill Power DMG to the target enemy.
对敌方小队当前行的所有目标造成双属性伤害	Deal both normal and Skill Power DMG to the target horizontal row.
对敌方当前目标造成技力伤害并有一定概率<font color="#00EC00">晕眩</font>1回合	Deal Skill Power DMG to the target enemy, with a set chance to <font color="#00EC00">Stun</font> for 1 round.
对敌方全小队造成双属性伤害	Deal normal and Skill Power DMG to the target enemy.
对敌方当前目标造成双属性伤害并吸收至多40怒气，同时有一定概率<font color="#00EC00">晕眩</font>1回合	Deal normal and Skill Power DMG to the target enemy and absorb 40 Fury at most, with a set chance to <font color="#00EC00">Stun</font> for 1 round.
随机攻击一个敌人造成普通伤害，并使其<font color="#00EC00">睡眠</font>1回合	Deal normal DMG to an enemy randomly and cast <font color="#00EC00">Hypnotize</font> debuff, lasting for 1 round.
驱散双方全阵营船员身上的所有<font color="#00EC00">护盾</font>和<font color="#00EC00">有益状态</font>。再次使用将释放“阿修罗・魔九闪”，对敌方阵营至多9个目标造成双属性伤害，无视格挡。目标生命过低时将造成<font color="#00EC00">致命一击</font>，产生大量伤害。	Dispel all <font color="#00EC00">Shield</font> and <font color="#00EC00">All Buffs</font> for all members of ally and enemy team. When Asura: Makyusen is activated again, deal normal and Skill Power DMG to at most 7 enemies while ignoring Block. Use <font color="#00EC00">Deadly Strike</font> to deal massive DMG to low HP enemy.
对敌方阵营至多9个目标造成双属性伤害，无视格挡。目标生命过低时将造成<font color="#00EC00">致命一击</font>，产生大量伤害。	Deal normal and Skill Power DMG to at most 7 enemies ignoring Block. Use <font color="#00EC00">Deadly Strike</font> to deal massive DMG to low HP enemy.

When the Crit. Hit is activated, Ogi skill CD time can be reduced by 1 round.

Then <font color="#00EC00">Immune to All Debuffs</font> until the round ends.
对敌方阵营至多12个目标造成双属性伤害	Deal normal and Skill Power DMG to at most 12 target enemies.

When casting, skill can’t be <font color="#00EC00">Interrupted</font>.

If the target enemy is <font color="#00EC00">Hypnotized</font>, dealing normal damage to at most 7 target enemies with <font color="#00EC00">Burning</font> debuff for 1 round.
对正面的敌人造成普通和技力伤害。	Deal both normal and Skill Power damage to the enemy in front.

香克斯大叔才不是懦夫，你不能这么侮辱他，快向他道歉！	Don't you dare to underestimate Shanks! He's no coward! Go apologize to him!
哈哈哈哈，你要我向那个胆小鬼海贼道歉？真是白日做梦！                          	You want me to apologize to that chicken pirate? You are daydreaming! Ha-ha.                  
混蛋！快向香克斯道歉，不然我对你不客气了。                                                                                    	Damn! Apologize now, or else…
小鬼，你惹恼了本大爷，还是让我亲手杀了你吧！                                                                        	Little Brat! Since you make me so angry, I'm going to kill you without mercy!                                                                 
不好！路飞你离山贼太近了！小心！	Luffy, be careful!
哈哈，你这个白痴小鬼，我已经杀了56个惹恼我的人了，你就是第57个！	You idiot! I have already killed 56 people who messed with me before, you'll be No. 57!
嗯？这……这是什么怪物？	Where did it come from?
河……河马！！好大的河马，来人啊，救命啊。	So…so huge. Help! Somebody help me!
山贼被吃掉了……路飞！危险！快跑！	That guy got eaten. Luffy,  it's dangerous! Run! Now!
救……救命！	Help…Me!
幸好还来得及，我都听玛姬说了，谢谢你们，剩下的就交给我吧。	Thanks,  Luffy! Makino told me everything. Thanks for sticking up!
给我滚！	Get lost!
呜哇哇哇哇哇哇哇，香克斯你的手……	Uwawawawa…Shanks,  your arm…
小意思而已，只不过是一只手，你们没事就好！	It's nothing,  it's just an arm,  as long as you are alive.
呜呜呜呜呜~香克斯……以后我也要成为像你这样强大的海贼。	Sob...Shanks,  I'm going to become a great pirate like you.
呵呵，那样你们可要加油了哦。	Then you'll have to work harder.
你是谁，怎么会在这里？	Who are you? And why are you here?
我叫克比，我想要当海军，有一天我准备去钓鱼结果上了亚尔丽塔海贼船，为了保命我只能在船上当导航员兼杂务工。	I'm Coby. I want to be a Marine. One day,  I was only fishing but I accidentally walked onto this ship. And I had become the caretaker of this ship for 2 years to just to stay alive…
我为了逃走造了艘小船，可是却没有逃跑的勇气，看来我要一辈子做杂务工了……	I built this ship because I was gonna run away in this but I don't have the guts to do it…looks like I'm gonna be a caretaker my whole life…
这样啊，克比，你带我们去找吃的，我们带你逃走。	You can help me find food,  we'll help you escape.
不行不行，逃走一定会被亚尔丽塔发现的，一想到亚尔丽塔我的腿就发软。	No no no…it'll never work! Whenever I think of Alvida-sama finding out,  my legs turn all mushy!!!
你可真是又笨又没用啊，{#}，我们去帮克比把海贼打跑。	You are pretty stupid and useless. {#},  let's go help Coby chase away the pirates.
总算到了谢兹尔村了，这边看起来挺高级的嘛！	Finally,  we're at Shells Town. It looks quite nice!
这边可是有海军基地的，是海军在东海的一个分部，不过我怎么觉得这边有点怪呢。	This village has a Marine Base which is under the Marine's East Blue region. But why does it look a bit strange?
嘿嘿，这样的话，克比你可以去当海军了哦。	Coby,  you can go and become a marine.
这可是我期待已久的，我一定会成为海军的！你也要加油哦。	This is what I always wanted. I'm going to become a great Marine!
嗯？那边怎么有个小女孩哭哭啼啼的。	Why is that girl crying over there?
要在这个世界立足首先要有对应强大的实力，我们去帮助那个小女孩！	If you want to help others, you need to become powerful first. Let's go help the little girl!
明白了，自身的强大实力才是帮助别人的保障，可不能让小姑娘一个人在那边哭。	Yes, I have to be strong enough first before I can help others.
小姑娘，发生了什么，怎么一个人在这边哭？	Little girl,  why are you crying?
呜呜呜呜呜，索隆大哥哥被抓起来了。	Sob…Zoro is captured.
索隆……难道是那个著名的海贼猎人索隆？让我去瞧瞧他长什么样。	Zoro…Is it that famous Pirate Hunter Zoro? I want to see how he looks like.
索隆大哥哥现在被关押在海军基地的校场，那边守卫十分森严，我给索隆大哥哥做的饭团也被守卫拦下了。	Zoro is being held at the Marine Base. It is heavily guarded. I wanted to deliver rice rolls to Zoro but I was blocked by the guards.
放心吧，我才不会输给那些海军。	Don't worry,  I won't lose to those marines.
还不错嘛，外面的海军都被你轻松干掉了。	You're not bad. You managed to kill those pirates.
我在寻找和我一起当海贼的伙伴。	I'm looking for pirates to join my team.
我已经被绑了9天了，实在太饿了，你能帮我弄点食物过来吗？我会答谢你的。	I have been tied up for 9 days and I'm really hungry. Could you find me something to eat first?
没问题，交给我吧。	No problem.
干得不错，这饭团可真好吃，不过海军小队长被你们打败了，肯定跑去找援兵了。	These rice rolls are good. But the Marine captain is defeated by you,  he must be looking for reinforcements.
我才不怕那些海军呢，来几个就再打跑几个！	I'm not afraid of those Marines.
不过路飞的等级已经有些跟不上了，使用经验书可以快速提升伙伴等级。	Luffy's level is low. Use the EXP Book to quickly upgrade crew member's level.
原来如此，这样伙伴的等级就再也不用愁了。	I see. Then I don't have to worry about crew member's level.
哇，现在路飞的等级跟你一样高了呢。	Luffy is the same level as you now. Yeah!
看来经验书的确很有用，路飞的等级飞速提高了，索隆真的是传说中的恶人吗？怎么感觉不太像啊。	This EXP Book is really useful. Is Zoro really as bad as the legend says? It doesn't feel that way.
当然不是了，索隆大哥哥什么坏事都没有做，他是为了救我才被抓的。	Brother Zoro didn't do anything wrong,  he got arrested because of me.
蒙卡上校的儿子贝鲁梅伯养了一条为非作歹的狼，那天那只狼扑向了我，索隆大哥哥为了救我就把狼给杀了！然后……然后他们就把索隆大哥哥抓了。	He killed Helmeppo's pet wolf because Helmeppo let his pet wolf run around and everyone got scared. It even wanted to attack me. So…
这么说，索隆被抓是因为杀了贝鲁梅伯的狼？	Zoro was captured because of killing Helmeppo's wolf?
没错，贝鲁梅伯可是出了名的跋扈，你能帮助索隆大哥哥吗？不过贝鲁梅伯实力强大，需要做好打算再去解救索隆大哥哥。	Helmeppo is the son of Marine Lieutenant Morgan. Can you help Zoro? But Helmeppo is bad and strong. You should make plans before rescuing Zoro.
没想到事情的真相竟然是这样，索隆并不像传闻中那样无恶不作，我决定了，一定要将索隆纳为我的伙伴！	Zoro is not as bad as the rumor said. I've decided I want Zoro on my team!
原来你们2个是莉莉安的朋友啊，索隆可真是倒霉，刚好碰上贝鲁梅伯这个蛮不讲理的官二代。	So you guys are Rika's friends. Zoro has such bad luck to run into Helmeppo.
我们正在想办法救出索隆的呢。	We're trying to rescue Zoro.
看来索隆的朋友还不少啊，不过我刚才看到贝鲁梅伯带着海军到校场去了呢。	So Zoro has many friends. But I just saw Helmeppo taking marines with him to the Marine Base.
不好，一定是那群逃跑的海军将贝鲁梅伯找来了，索隆有危险！	Those marines whom we defeated brought Helmeppo over,  Zoro is in danger!
索隆，你没事吧，我听说贝鲁梅伯来了。	Zoro,  you okay? I heard Helmeppo came.
（伤痕累累）咳咳咳……	(Wounded) Cough…
