咻咻的主人是这家宠物食品店的老板，有一天得了重病要去医院，托付咻咻照看店铺，可是他再也没有回来。	Chouchou's master was the owner of this shop. One day,  he became sick and left for the doctor,  and entrusted his pet shop to Chouchou; but he never came back.
难道说，从那以后咻咻就一直在这里，等待着店主伯伯回来？	So since then, Chouchou has remained unmoving,  waiting for the owner to come back?
咻咻是只聪明的狗，它肯定也知道主人已经死了，可这家店铺是咻咻最爱的主人的遗物，所以它才一直守护着这家店，为了保护店铺一步也不离开。	Chouchou is a smart dog. Deep down,  he must realize that his master died already. But this shop was the favorite legacy of Chouchou's master, so that's why he's always guarding this shop and not willing to leave.
没想到竟然是这样，加油啊，咻咻！	What a moving story! Keep going, Chouchou!
恩，咻咻十分坚持呢……娜美有事找你呢，你快过去吧。	Chouchou will remain steadfast…Nami is looking for you. Go quickly!
{#}，你刚才跑哪里去了？	{#},  where did you go just now?
刚才帮镇长把摩奇给打败了，还救了小狗咻咻。	I helped the Mayor defeat Mohji and rescue Chouchou.
什么！你把摩奇打败了？不好，摩奇可是巴基海贼团的副船长，巴基一定会派更强大的人过来复仇。	What! You defeated Mohji? Oh no, Mohji is Buggy Pirates' First Mate, Buggy will send someone even more powerful to revenge.
交给我吧，这种破坏别人村镇的坏蛋，一定要揍飞他。	Leave it to me. I'll send him flying for damaging this village.
听说巴基海贼团的参谋长卡巴吉为了给摩奇报仇也来到了镇上。	I heard Buggy Pirates' Second Mate, Cabaji, also came to the village to revenge for Mohji.
卡巴吉？那家伙厉害吗？	Cabaji? Is that guy good?
卡巴吉是个诡计多端的家伙，骑着单轮车使用杂技剑术，战斗的时候喜欢盯着对方的弱点打。	Cabaji is a serious minded, mysterious, and somewhat formidable opponent. He rides the unicycle while acrobatic fighting skills to attack, especially focusing on enemy's weakness.
卑鄙的家伙，交给我吧。	Despicable! Leave him to me.
虽然把摩奇和卡巴吉打败了，但是巴基可不是那么好对付的，我也是为了躲避巴基才躲在这边的。	Even though you defeated Mohji and Cabaji, but Buggy is not an easy opponent. I'm hiding here to avoid Buggy,
巴基真的有传说那么可怕吗？	Buggy is really as crazy as the legend claims?
巴基这个人，因为爱用大炮而闻名，听说某个镇上的孩子取笑他的鼻子，他就用大炮把整个村镇都轰掉了。	Buggy is famous for his bombs. I heard that because some kids in a town made fun of his red nose, so he destroyed the entire town with bombs.
因为一个小孩的取笑就把整个村镇都毁了。这真是太无情了。	He destroyed a town because of some kids' insult? That's terrible.
镇长好像有事找你，快去看看他怎么了。	Mayor seems to be looking for you, go quickly.
镇长，有什么事需要我帮忙吗？	Mayor, do you need any help?
巴基带领着他的小弟亲自来到了橘子镇，橘子镇是我的心血我绝对不允许巴基来破坏它。	Buggy led his pirates team and arrived at Orange Town. We worked so hard to build up Orange Town, I won't allow Buggy to destroy it.
什么？巴基也来了，这个大坏蛋我一定会揍飞他吧。	What? Buggy is here. I'll knock him flying for sure.
巴基有2个护卫一直贴身保护着，想要击败巴基就必须先想办法把他2个护卫打败。	Buggy has 2 bodyguards. You need to defeat them before reaching Buggy.
好样的！现在是巴基最虚弱的时候了。	Great! Now Buggy is at his weakest.
镇长你打算怎么办呢？	Mayor, what do you plan to do?
橘子镇是我的宝物，不能保护它还能算什么镇长，我要去战斗到最后！	Orange Town is my treasure. If I can't protect it, I'm not worthy to be the Mayor. I'll fight till the end!
等一下，镇长你这样去什么也做不了，太鲁莽了。	Wait! You won't be able to accomplish anything this way, too rash.
我知道我很鲁莽，但是为了整个村子的安危，我不能逃避！	I know I'm rash, but for the safety of the town, I can't give up!
走吧，我们不能让镇长一个人面临巴基。	Let's go help Mayor defeat Buggy.
恩，我们走，一定要把巴基揍飞。	Let's go, we have to knock down Buggy.
小丑巴基，给我滚出来，我要挑战你！	Buggy the Clown, come out! I want to challenge you!
喂！你为什么要向我挑战？难道是为了出名？	You want to challenge me? You want to be famous?
混蛋！我是为了保护这个镇，保护我的宝物。	Screw you! I just want to protect this town, protect my treasure.
你可真是一个蠢货，宝物指的是金银财宝才对，这个镇是宝物？别开玩笑了！！！	You are such an idiot. Treasure should be gold or silver, not this town. Don't be so silly! 
我可没想过你这种人会理解我，给我滚出来！	I didn't expect people like you to understand. Come out!
哼，别自以为是了，既然小镇对你如此重要，那我就用大炮让你和小镇一起消失，再见了！	Since this town is so important for you, let me use my Buggy Balls to destroy you and your village. Bye bye!
慢着！	Wait!
橡皮，橡皮，你的对手是我们。	Gomu, gomu, your opponent is us.

哈哈哈哈，就凭你们几个？真是说大话，有本事就来吧！	Just the few of you? Try your best!!
看招，我们不会让你得逞的！	We won't let you win.
哈哈，我们赢了。	Ha-ha, we won!

嘻嘻，过奖~过奖。	Ha-ha, thanks for the complement.
我本来要拼命的，绝望中的我只想一死了之。	I was willing to sacrifice my life for this.
镇长爷爷，别这么说，巴基已经被我们打败了。	Mayor, we already defeated Buggy.
不知道该说什么，谢谢你了，全村人都感激你。	Thank you so much. The whole village owes you our thanks.
别放在心上，巴基的这种行为只要有正义感的人都会帮助你们的。	Don't worry too much, anyone who cares for justice would not tolerate Buggy's actions.
不管怎么说都要感谢你为村子的付出，娜美偷了巴基的宝藏，正在找你呢。	Anyway, thank you for rescuing the village. Nami stole Buggy's treasure and was looking for you.
你总算来了！	You are finally here!
娜美，有什么事呢？	Nami, what's up?
在你们打败巴基的时候，那些巴基的手下都四散跑了，没来得及把巴基的宝藏带走，身为海盗专偷的我就顺手全拿走了。	When you guys defeated Buggy, the pirates all left and did not take any treasure, so I got my hands on all of them.
看在你在击败巴基的事情出了不少力，我也不会亏待你，巴基的宝藏就分你们一半，这些宝石你拿着。	You put in a lot of effort to defeat Buggy, so I'm sharing half of Buggy's treasure with you. You can take these gems.
这些宝石好漂亮！	These gems are beautiful!
看来你已经学会镶嵌宝石了，怎么样？对自己的提升还不赖吧。	It seems you learned to embed gems. Did your battle power increase?
恩，镶嵌宝石后我觉得我更强力了，在遇到巴基就不用那么狼狈了。	Yes, after embedding gems, I feel I'm more powerful now. In the future it'll be even easier to defeat Buggy.
你还挺自信的嘛，看来普通的敌人已经满足不了你了。	You are pretty confident. 
那当然了，我的自信可是源于我的实力。	Of course, I'm confident because of my capabilities.
前方的道路并不是那么一帆风顺，大海中有强大而又邪恶的海贼，希望之后的你不会被这些海贼所击倒。	There are many more powerful and evil pirates waiting for you as you travel. I hope you won't be defeated by them.
可不要得意哦，虽然你已经很强大了，但这只是无尽大海中最弱的东海。	Don't get cocky. Even though you are pretty good, we're still in East Blue which is considered as the weakest of all the seas.
我会走出东海，迈向伟大航路，成为闻名的大海贼的！	I'll leave East Blue and conquer Grand Line, to become a world famous pirate!
那你可要好好努力了，成为闻名的大海贼可不是嘴上说说的事。	Then you'll have to try hard. Boasting is not going to get you to your goal!
为了大叔的约定，我会证明我一定会成为大海贼，称霸伟大航路！	We have made a commitment with Shanks. I'll prove that I can become a great pirate and dominate Grand Line!
嘻嘻，祝你好运，希望以后有机会我们还能再见，一路顺风！	Good luck. Hope we have a chance to meet again!

我一定会让小镇恢复往日的繁荣，下次再见的时候，定会让你尝尝美味的橘子。	I'll make sure this town become prosperous again. You'll for sure get to eat oranges next time.
就那么说定啦！再见，镇长。	Great! Good bye, Mayor!
站住！哼哼哼哼~你们来这里干嘛，我可是拥有8000万手下的大海盗团首领乌索普，我劝你们还是快点放弃进攻这个村子吧，不然我的手下会把你们全部干掉。	Stop! What are you doing here? I'm Captain Usopp with a team of 8000 pirates. I advice you guys to abandon attacking this village, or else we will defeat you all.
吹牛，你要有那么多手下我怎么一个都没看到。	Lies! I don't see any of them at all.
啊，穿帮了！！！好聪明的女人。	Ah!!! Clever woman.
哈哈哈哈，你可真有意思，不过我们可不是来进攻村子的，我们是来找伙伴和大船的。	You're funny, but I'm not here to attack the village. We're looking for companions and ship.
原来如此，你们是来自大海的冒险者啊，不过虽说不是什么大帆船，只有住在豪宅的可雅小姐才有船，不过她是一个非常可怜的少女，体弱多病。	So you guys are adventuring in the sea. Only Miss Kaya who lives in the mansion owns a ship, but she's sick and has to stay in bed all day.
为什么豪宅的主人会是一个女孩呢？	Why does a little girl live in a mansion?
大约一年前，她的双亲因病去世了，留下了巨额财产，豪宅和十几个佣人，你们想要船可以去问下可雅小姐，不过豪宅外有护卫看守，那些护卫都不准任何人接近豪宅。	Kaya's parents died last year, and they left her with a huge mansion plus lots of servants. You can go ask Miss Kaya if she has any ships. But her mansion has guards who won't allow anyone to get near the mansion.
我去找可雅小姐，那些门卫可拦不住我。	I'm going to find Miss Kaya. Those guards can't stop me.
你是谁？怎么擅闯别人房子，来人啊！！！	Who are you? Why are you breaking into my house?
可雅小姐别怕，我可不是什么坏人，我是乌索普的朋友。	Miss Kaya, I'm not an evil person. I'm Usopp's friend.
没想到乌索普还有你这样的朋友，有一段时间没有见乌索普了，好想见他啊，能帮我转告乌索普我想见他吗？	I didn't expect Usopp to have friends like you. I haven't seen him for a while and I miss him. Can you tell Usopp that I want to see him?
我这就去乌索普，他听到一定会很开心呢。	I'll go tell Usopp now, he'll be very happy to hear this.
乌索普，可雅小姐说十分想见你呢。	Usopp, Miss Kaya says she misses you.
真的啊？哈哈，我也十分想念可雅小姐呢，这些宝石就作为你们告诉我消息的报酬，有了这些宝石可以合成更高级的宝石！	Really? I miss Miss Kaya very much also. These gems are my payment to you for telling me this info. With this gem, you can synthesize for higher level gem!
嘿嘿，想不到你吹牛大王的魅力还挺大的嘛~	So the King of Lies is also quite popular...

那我就不客气的收下了。	Then I'll accept them.

多谢你了，想不到你这个吹牛大王会的还挺多。	Thank you for teaching me.
时间不早了，我们快去见可雅小姐，可别让可雅小姐等急了。	Let's go meet Miss Kaya, don't make Miss Kaya wait for us.

今天嘛……就讲我五岁的时候，那时候在男孩碰到了一只大金鱼，它令人惊异的巨大无比的粪便，我还以为是陆地，就上去了……	Today…When I was five years old, I met a giant gold fish. The gold fish's poop was so giant, I thought it was land and I walked on it…
哈哈哈~，你可真搞笑。	Hahah! You're funny!

不好，是管家克洛！	No, it's the butler, Kuro!

恩，没什么大碍。	Yes, I'm fine.
呵，你只是一个卑鄙的海盗的儿子，你干什么我都不会干涉，但是请你不要接近小姐，你和我家小姐不是一个世界的人，想要钱是吧？要多少，开个价吧！	You are just the son of a humble pirate, please stay away from Miss Kaya. You and Miss Kaya are not from the same world. Do you want money? Name the price.

不许你侮辱我老爸！我老爸是勇敢的海上战士，我为我老爸感到自豪。	Don't insult my dad! He is a brave sea warrior, and I'm proud of my dad.

大海贼红发香克斯！哈哈，原来老爸那么棒，在这无边无际的大海上，勇敢生活着的老爸令我感到自豪，可是那个可恶的管家竟然那么讲，真令人讨厌！	Great Pirate Red Hair Shanks! Wow, so my dad is that good. I'm proud for my dad's bravery. But that damn butler is so annoying.

坏了……大事不妙了！可雅小姐会被杀掉，整个村子会被扫荡，真的不好了！	Bad news! Miss Kaya will be killed and the whole village will be wiped out, really bad!

那倒也是，那个坏管家看起来想一个阴谋家。	That butler does look like a schemer.

你们两个慌慌张张的干嘛呢？	Why are you guys in panic? What happened?

请相信我，快逃吧，不然大家都会被杀死的！！	Please Believe me. Run for your life!

可恶，我得去告诉可雅小姐，免得可雅小姐遭到毒手。	Damn, I need to tell Miss Kaya to protect her.
太好了，乌索普，我还以为你不来了呢！	Usopp, you're here! I thought you weren't coming back!
可雅，你被骗了，那个管家其实是一个海贼。	Kaya, you've been duped. The butler is actually a pirate.
你开什么玩笑！克洛怎么会是海贼？	You must be joking! How can Kuro be a pirate?
不是开玩笑，我亲耳听到的，那个管家是为了夺取你的财产，从3年前就假扮管家潜伏在你身边，算计着你的财产。	I'm not joking, I heard him. He wanted to steal your wealth so for 3 years he pretended to be your butler so he can plot against you.
乌索普，你说什么？	Usopp, what are you talking about?
明天早晨他的同伙就会来偷袭你，他们说要杀了你啊！那家伙是大坏蛋，快逃命吧！	He and his crew are going to attack you and kill you tomorrow morning! Please leave here! I'm begging you!
请你适可而止吧！我看错你了，乌索普，没想到你竟然是这种人，竟然说克洛是海贼来报复他，你真差劲。	Please stop! I misjudged you. I can't Believe you would go so low to say Kuro is a pirate to revenge against him.
既然如此，只好强行拉走你了，只要过了今天，一切真相就都知道了。	In this case, I have no other choice but to get you out of here by force. After today, you'll know the truth.
放开小姐！	Let go of Miss Kaya!
（可雅小姐伸手打了乌索普）你才是大坏蛋，我不会跟你走的！	(Miss Kaya hits Usopp)  You're the bad guy. I'm not leaving with you!
可恶，为什么没人肯相信我！	Damn, how come no one Believes me?!
我喜欢撒谎，所以大家打心底就不相信我，我太天真了。	Yes, I was a big liar before, so no wonder nobody would Believe me now. I was just too na?ve to hope that they might Believe me again.
别说这些，事实就是事实，明天海贼应该会来吧。	This is the truth and the pirates will be coming tomorrow.

所以，我要去海边迎战入侵的海贼，决不能让海贼踏入村子半步，让谎言变成事实。	So I'm going to fight against the pirates tomorrow. I cannot allow the pirates to step into the village.
呵，你这么爱村子，我来帮助你一起抵抗海贼。	You do love the village. Then I'll help you fight against the pirates.

一个胖子的兄弟竟然这么瘦，真的好奇怪	Why does a fatso have such a skinny brother? So strange.

嘿嘿，我可是最强的，不过现在升级速度可真慢。	I'm the best. But upgrading is so slow.
到了这个时候升级的速度就会变慢了，想要更快的升级就需要做日常任务。	By this time upgrading is going to be slower. If you want to upgrade faster, you need to do Daily Tasks.
日常任务？	Daily Tasks?
日常任务可以获得经验和物品的奖励，当升级遇到困难时不妨去试试日常任务。	Completing Daily Tasks can obtain EXP and item rewards. When you are having trouble upgrading, try the Daily Tasks.
完成日常任务，果然升级了，日常任务的奖励真的很丰富。	After completing Daily Tasks, I did upgrade faster. Daily Tasks' rewards are really good.
嘿嘿，以后遇到升级困难就可以做日常任务，不过日常任务一天的上限是20个，当完成20个日常任务时还有额外奖励哦。	In the future, just complete Daily Tasks if you want to upgrade. But Daily Tasks are limited to 20 per day. If you completed 20 tasks, you also can get extra reward.
现在的我更加强大了，遇到之前的海贼应付也能更加自如了。	Now I'm more confident that I can deal with those pirates easily.
你还挺自信的呢，不过克洛还没有出现，克洛的计划一定还在继续，也不知道可雅小姐如何了，请帮我去照看一下可雅小姐。	Kuro still hasn't showed up and he must be working on his plot. I wonder how's Miss Kaya. Please go and check on Miss Kaya for me.

伙伴？那可不行，我对这个餐厅可是倾注了感情，不会离开这个餐厅。	No, I love this restaurant and I won't leave.

咦？那边发生了什么，好像是山治再跟别人吵架。	It seems that Sanji is arguing with someone.
不好！一定是山治那个混小子跟别人起冲突了！	Oh no, Sanji is arguing with other people.

是么，我觉得山治先生厨艺也应该很好。	I thought Sanji's cooking was quite good.

山治先生好强大的杀气啊~	Sanji looks murderous….

看来山治先生真如帕迪先生说的那样喜欢打架呢，那个海军上尉要到大霉了！	It seems Sanji is just like what Patty said, he likes to fight and that marine lieutenant is in big trouble!

嘿嘿，这群家伙可被山治先生教训的惨了。	You were really good.

美味的鱼汤，好期待啊！	Delicious fish soup…I'm so hungry!
咳咳咳……不好意思，刚才我去厨房发现餐厅的鱼竟然卖完了。	Sorry, but I just discovered we sold out of fish.
那就尝不到山治先生的美味鱼汤了，好可惜。	Then I can't try the fish soup, so sad.
也不会啦，我把钓鱼的方法传授给你们，你们去钓几条过来，我再煮鱼汤给你们。	I'll teach you how to fish and you guys can go fishing. Then I'll make the fish soup.
什么嘛，山治先生好不靠谱。	What? You sure about this?
山治先生，这是我钓的鱼。	This is the fish I caught.

听大叔的口气好像去过伟大航路呢？	You sound like you've been to Grand Line?
呵呵，那都是以前的事了，现在我只是这个餐厅的老板。	That was many years ago. Now I'm just the owner of this ship.
听逃跑的海贼讲，他们在伟大航路第七天碰到了一个男人，那个男人的眼神像鹰一样尖锐，就凭一人就消灭了50艘船的舰队。	According to the pirates who ran away, on the 7th day at the Grand Line, they met a man whose eyes were like hawk, and he destroyed 50 ships alone by himself.
什么？眼神像鹰一样，莫非是他……	What? Eyes like hawk, could it be him…
能够凭借一个人灭了整个舰队，眼神又长的跟鹰一样，应该就是鹰眼男了。	If he can destroy a whole fleet by himself, and he has eyes like hawk, then he must be Hawk Eyes.
鹰眼？那是谁呢？	Hawk Eyes? Who is that?
那可是我一直在苦苦寻找的男人，自从把成为天下第一剑客作为奋斗目标后，鹰眼就是我要挑战的人物。	I've been searching for him. Ever since I decided to become the No. 1 Swordsman in the world, I always wanted to challenge Hawk Eyes.
听说鹰眼就在这附近，克利克还真倒霉啊，说不定是因为打搅了鹰眼睡午觉才引来船队的覆灭。	I heard Hawk Eyes should be nearby. Krieg has such bad luck. He might have annoyed Hawk Eyes' napping which resulted his whole fleet getting destroyed.
就在这附近？呵呵呵，我的血开始沸腾了，忍不住要与他一战了。	Nearby? I can't wait to battle him.
真是期待已久啊，最强的剑客，跟我一绝高下吧！	I've been waiting for this a long time ago. Greatest Swordsman in the World, duel against me!
可悲的弱者，你这么弱，竟然敢向我挑战，你的勇气究竟是来自于你的志气还是你的无知呢？	Weakling, you are so weak yet you dare to challenge me. Does your bravery come from your ambition or your ignorance?
这是我的梦想，我和一个挚友的约定，来吧，让我看看你究竟有多强。	This is my dream and an agreement with my friend. Let me see how powerful you truly are.
你为什么不后退？	Why don't you back down?
呵，谁知道呢，我感觉只要后退一步就是失败，很多重要的东西以及誓言都会被破坏。	I don't know. I only know that backing up one step is failure, and many important things and promises will be broken.
是的，后退就是失败。	Yes, backing up is defeated.
那样我就更加不能后退了，哪怕赔上自己的小命！	Then I truly cannot back up, even if I die!

罗罗诺亚・索隆！	Roronoa Zoro!

可恶！	Damn!
什么！！你说臭老头被克利克的人抓走了？	You say Krieg's guard captured Zeff?

山治，你整天喊大叔臭老头，为什么感觉大叔对你这么重要呢。	Sanji, you always call him "Old Geezer", why is it that you seem to care for him deeply?
说来话长，9年前臭老头的双脚还在，我只是个小厨师，臭老头的海贼团洗劫了我的海贼船，结果一场暴风雨来临了，所有人都遇难了，只有臭老头和我在一个岛上活了下来，我们在岛上生活了85天，臭老头吃掉了自己的腿，把所有的食物都留给了我，让我活了下来。（山治哽咽）	9 years ago when Old Geezer still had his right leg, I was just a kitchen boy, his Pirates Team attacked my Pirates Team. But then a fierce storm came and wiped out everyone, except for the Old Geezer and I, and we ended up on an island. We lived on the island for 85 days. He ate his own leg while giving me all his food so that I can live. (Sanji choked up) 
山治！	Sanji!
餐厅不能交给他们，我也不会让臭老头被他们杀掉，他是一个为了微不足道的小鬼而付出巨大牺牲的笨家伙，若我连死这种事都做不到的话，怎么能报答臭老头的大恩呢！！	We cannot give them the restaurant. I'll not allow Old Geezer get killed. He suffered greatly for a small boy like me. If I cannot die for him, how can I repay him?!
说得好，我们去打败那些护卫，救回哲普大叔。	Let's go defeat those guards and rescue Zeff.
你们这群没用的东西，看我来结束这一切，M・H・5，受死吧，这可是效果超强的毒气弹。	You bunch of useless morons. Let me finish it all. MH5, this is super powerful poison gas bomb.
不好，这里有3个人，可是从海贼那抢来的防毒面具只有2个……	Oh no, there are 3 of us, but we only have 2 masks…
可恶！！(山治将一个防毒面具给了你，一个给哲普带上，自己倒在了地上)	Damn!! (Sanji gave the mask to you and one to Zeff, while he fainted and fell on the floor.) 
山治……	Sanji……
山治那小子竟然为了救我，自己被毒倒了。	To save me, Sanji would rather die…

帕迪那边有解药，快去那边取解药吧。	Patty has antidote, go get it now.

什么！山治中了克利克的M・H・5剧毒了？	What! Sanji is poisoned by Krieg's MH5?

解药有是有，可我的解药是解食物中毒的啊，会有效果吗？	My antidote is for food poisoning. Will it work?
里面多少含有一些解毒剂的，快去拿来吧，山治要坚持不住了。	It includes some antidote which should work. Go get it now, Sanji won't be able to last long.
等等，我马上就去拿。	I'll go now.
山治，你可千万不能死啊。	Sanji, don't you dare to die before me.
大叔你放心吧，吃了解毒药后山治的脸色开始红润了。	Don't worry. After taking the antidote, Sanji looks much better.
咳咳咳……{#}，谢谢你救了我啊。	Cough...{#}, thank you for rescuing me.
终于恢复过来了。	Finally I'm fine.
吓了我一跳，山治先生终于康复了。	You shocked me. It's good that you're fine now.
克利克这个混蛋，不能让他再这样继续下去了，必须想个办法打败他。	We can't let Krieg keep going like this. We should find a way to defeat him.
这家伙就交给我来收拾，我会将他打败的。	Let me handle it. I'll defeat him.
哈哈，笨蛋，没有比情绪激动的敌人更容易对付的了。	Idiot, it is easy to defeat an emotional enemy.
你这卑鄙的家伙，只会用这些下三滥的手段。	You are such a scum to use such despicable means.
我对你们这种天真的情和义最讨厌了，战斗就是以胜利为目标的，不管用什么手段，只要获胜就好。	The goal for battle is to win, doesn't matter what method, as long as you win.
我一定会把你揍扁的。	I'm going to smash you to pieces.
哈哈哈哈，无知的小鬼，真是说大话，有种就放马过来吧，过来吃我的枪子。	Ha-ha! What a boastful little kid! Try your best. 
多亏了你啊，克利克被赶走了，臭老头的船也保住了，他们在餐厅为你准备了庆功的晚餐。	Thank you for chasing away Krieg and protecting the ship. They prepared a feast for you inside the restaurant.
有好吃的，那我们这就快去吧，我都等不及了，哈哈。	Good food! Let's go, I can't wait.
小鬼，把山治带走吧，去伟大航路可是他的目标，他已经被我开除了。	Take Sanji with you. Going to Grand Line is his dream. I already fired him.
开除我？有没有搞错！我还没有偿还你的恩情呢。（山治十分愤怒）	Fired me? I still haven't repaid you my debt of  gratitude. I can't leave yet. (Sanji is extremely angry) 
老夫可不需要你偿还什么恩情，去追寻你的梦想，年轻人梦想才是最重要的。	I don't need you to do anything for me. Go chase after your dreams.
（山治泪流满面）臭老头……这就是你为我考虑的吗？好吧，我会尊重你，等我实现我的梦想再来偿还你的恩情。	(Sanji crying)  Old Geezer…you think this is best for me? Okay, I respect you. I'll fulfill my dream then come back to repay you.
我也去伟大航路，带上我吧。（山治转过头对着你）	I'm going to Grand Line, take me with you.(Sanji turns to look at you)

我去伟大航路的目的可不是陪你去成为海贼王，而是为了我的梦想All Blue！你船上的厨师由我担当，可不可以？	I'm going to Grand Line not to become the Pirate King, but for my dream of finding All Blue! Can I be the chef for your ship?
可以！！太棒了，我们终于有厨师伙伴了。	Yes! Great, we finally have a chef.
你的等级已经达到了40级，可以上阵第5个伙伴了，试着拖动第5个伙伴上阵吧！	You've reached Lv 40 and can add the 5th crew member into your formation. Try dragging the 5th crew member in the formation!

放心吧，哲普大叔，我会照顾好山治的，出发吧。	Don't worry. I'll take care of Sanji. Let's go.
你们怎么也跑到这儿来了，这边是我的故乡，充满了热带气息的可可西亚。	Why are you here? This is my hometown, Cocoyasi.
原来这里就是你的故乡，真美丽啊。	So this is your hometown. This place is so beautiful.
美丽么？呵，要是没有那个家伙就真的美丽了。	Beautiful? If that guy isn't around, this place would be truly beautiful.
那个家伙？	What guy?
呵，先不管那些了，阿健先生的样子十分焦急，不知道遇到了什么麻烦，快去瞧瞧吧。	Don't worry. Genzo looks worried, maybe he needs help. Go check on him.
原来娜美已经回来了，你是娜美的朋友吧？	You're Nami's friend?
恩，娜美可是我的伙伴，听娜美说你这边好像遇到了不小的麻烦呢。	Yes, Nami is my companion. I heard Nami said that you seemed to be having some problem.
可可西亚是一个四面环海的小岛，村民们经常出海捕鱼，可是最近有几只海兽海现在了村口，村民损失重大。	Cocoyasi is a small island where the villagers go fishing frequently. But recently some sea monsters appeared and causing major damage.
几只海兽么？交给我吧，我会把他们赶走的。	Just some sea monsters? I'll chase them away.
多谢你们几个赶走了那些海兽，不过仅仅赶走海兽村民还是不敢出海。	Thank you for chasing away the sea monsters. But the villagers are still afraid.
海兽都没有了，大家为什么不敢出海呢？	Why are people still afraid?
因为那些海兽都是听命于阿龙手下海牛哞哞，有海牛哞哞在，大家都不敢出去。	Those sea monsters all listen to Arlong's Mohmoo the Sea Cow. With Mohmoo the Sea Cow around, everyone is still afraid.
原来如此，我会帮你们解决这个麻烦的。	So that's why. I'll help you deal with it.
真是厉害，外来的冒险者，海牛哞哞被赶走了，这下大家出海就安全了，真是太感谢你了。	You're very good! Mohmoo the Sea Cow is gone. Now people can go fishing safely, thank you so much.
没关系呢，助人为乐可是我最喜欢干的事情呢。	My pleasure, I love helping other people.
可可西亚也是一个美丽的村子，你帮助了我们，就是我们的朋友，可可西亚欢迎你！可以在村子里随便逛逛哦！	Cocoyasi is a beautiful village. You help us which means you are our friends also. We welcome you to walk around the village and enjoy the view!
我正想好好认识一下娜美的故乡呢。	I want to get to know Nami's hometown.
这么快就回来了，怎么样，可可西亚是个美丽的地方吧？	What did you think of Cocoyasi Village? Isn't it beautiful?
恩，从来没有见过比可可西亚更安静和谐的地方了呢，不过旁边的小镇为何被破坏了！	Cocoyasi is very quiet and peaceful. But why did the nearby town got damaged?
一切说来话长，都是鱼人干的！不过我看娜美遇到了麻烦呢，快去帮助她吧！	It's a long story, all done by the Fishmen! But I see Nami is having some problem, go help her!
好的，我就这就去娜美那边。	Okay, I'll go now.

（娜美十分着急）我的藏宝图不见了，我找了好久都没有找到，肯定是被鱼人给偷走了。	(Nami really anxious)  My treasure map is missing. The fishmen must have stolen them.
鱼人？这村子里还有鱼人吗？	Fishmen? This village has fishmen?
这边被阿龙统治了，他的手下都是鱼人，而且每个月都会向村里收保护费，弄得村里民不聊生，刚才有个鱼人鬼鬼祟祟的，一定是他偷走了我的藏宝图。	This place is ruled by Arlong and his henchmen are all fishmen. （娜美十分着急）没有……没有！怎么可能会没有？	(Nami really anxious)  Not here! Why is it not here?

可是……藏宝图不在鱼人身上，会去哪了呢?	If the treasure map is not on the fishmen, where would it be?

那还等什么，我们快去把啾给找出来吧。	Let's go find Chew then.

那是当然了，这些干部也不过如此。	Of course, they are just so so…
不过在村子里与鱼人作对是没有好下场的，谢谢你救了我，快趁着阿龙到来之前逃跑吧。	But resisting against fishmen in the village usually results in death. You should try to escape before Arlong comes.
阿龙有那么恐怖吗？	Arlong is truly that terrifying?
阿龙是典型的种族主义者，根本就没把杀人当一回事，你快跑吧！	Arlong is very racist and think nothing of killing human. 
不行，我得去找阿健问清楚事实。	I'll go find Genzo and ask for details.
没想到你们几个竟然打败了2个阿龙的干部。	I can't Believe you guys manage to defeat Arlong's officers.
健先生，这个村子到底是怎么回事，为什么人们都那么惧怕阿龙？	Genzo, why is everyone so afraid of Arlong in this village?
说来话长，十年前阿龙来到了村子，并宣告他统治了这里，要求我们每个月交上供奉，如果交不起供奉，就等于叛乱，村子就会被阿龙铲平，阿龙的目标是在东海建立阿龙帝国。	This is a long story. 10 years ago Arlong came to the village and announced that he's in control of here and demanded that we had to pay monthly fee. If we do not pay fee, it would be regarded as rebellion and our village would be destroyed. Arlong's goal is to establish a Fishmen Empire on the East Blue.
阿龙帝国？那个家伙想要创立国家吗？为了自己的计划逼迫村庄的村民每月缴纳供奉，怪不得大家都这么怕阿龙。	Fishmen Empire? That dude wants to create a new country? Forcing everyone to pay fees to accomplish his purpose, no wonder everyone is afraid of Arlong.
没办法，可可西亚村也在其中，我们现在只能默默忍受等待机会。	We have no choice but to wait for a chance in the future.

武器？难道村民连武器都不能拥有吗？	The villagers cannot own any weapons?
恩，因为对阿龙来说，持有武器是破坏安定的重要因素，是严重的叛乱行为，要被杀死的。	Yes, because to Arlong, weapons are viewed as possible chance for rebellion, so he'll kill you for keeping weapons.
仅仅因为持有武器就要杀人，真是太过分了，我去教训他们。	This is too much! I'll go deal with them.
多亏了你的帮忙，不然这些鱼人将是一场灾难。	Thank you for your help, or else it would be a disaster for us.

可是阿龙的实力对于我们来说实在太过强大，我们只能忍气吞声等待时机反抗。	But Arlong's power is too great for us, we can only wait until the time is right.
可恶的阿龙，为了一己私欲祸害这么多村子，一定不能放过他。	Damn Arlong, I won't let him get away.
虽然你们打败了鱼人，但这次带队的是六刀流小八，他可不好对付。	Even though you defeated the previous fishmen, the leader this time is Six-Sword Style Hatchan, he's not easy to deal with.
六刀流，竟然有六刀流？难道他有六只手吗？	Six-Sword Style? Does he have six arms?
没错，小八是一只八爪鱼，除了两条腿以外，六只手各持一把刀，自称鱼人岛第二剑客。	Right, Hatchan is an octopus. Except for his 2 legs, he carries one sword in each hand. He claims he is the Number 2 Swordsman at Arlong Park.
刀可不是越多越厉害，索隆的三刀流一定比小八厉害！	It doesn't mean more powerful with more swords, but Zoro's Santoryu is definitely more powerful than Hatchan's six swords!
索隆的三刀流可真厉害呢，小八完全不是对手。	Zoro's Santoryu is amazing, Hatchan cannot fight back at all.
那当然了，索隆的目标可是天下第一剑客。	Of course, Zoro's goal is to be the Number 1 Swordsman in the World.
原来如此，有如此远大的目标的男人是值得敬佩的。	With such an amazing goal, Zoro is worthy of respect.
健先生，你了解娜美吗？	Genzo, can you tell me about Nami?
小娜啊，她是被贝鲁梅尔收养的小孩，小时候也是十分快乐，可是阿龙的到来改变了这一切，贝鲁梅尔为了自己的2个孩子牺牲了自己。	Nami was adopted by Bell-mère and she was very happy as a small child. But Arlong's arrival changed everything. Bell-mère sacrificed herself for the 2 kids.
而娜美为了拯救整个村子，加入了阿龙海贼团，并与阿龙约定攒足一亿贝利买下整个村子，让村民脱离阿龙的控制。	To save the whole village, Nami joined the Arlong Pirates, and made an agreement with Arlong to pay him 100,000,000 Beli to buy the entire village, so that the villagers will be free of Arlong's control.
没想到竟然是这样，原来这就是娜美贪财的原因，娜美竟然为了救村子不惜投靠亲手杀死自己亲人的家伙……	So this is why Nami is so greedy because she wants to buy the village. For the village, Nami even joined someone who killed her family…
娜美做这一切可都是为了村子，我们心里都默默感激娜美的努力，你们去看下娜美吧，她这些年一定很累。	Nami did all for the village. We are internally grateful for her effort. You guys can visit Nami. She must be tired after all these years.
虽然很漫长，但是距离一亿贝利的目标只差700万贝利，对现在的我来说，只要再出海一次就一定能攒够钱了。	Even though it's a long road, but I'm only 7,000,000 Beli from reaching the goal of 100,000,000 Beli. If I can go on the sea one more time, I'll be able to get it.
嘿嘿，村子马上就能解脱了呢，我也替娜美开心呢。	The village will be freed soon. I'm happy for Nami also.
所有的努力都能得到回报，大家都能从阿龙那里得到解脱，贝鲁梅尔阿姨知道一定会打从心底里笑出来吧，嘻嘻。	All my effort will have results when everyone is freed from Arlong. Aunt Bell-mère will be very happy if she knows about this.
吱吱吱吱。我是海军第16分部的上校老鼠，你就是罪犯娜美吧？	Squeak. Squeak…I'm Captain Nezumi of the Marine 16th división. You are the criminal, Nami?
罪犯？也是，因为我是个海贼嘛，当然是罪犯了，但我是阿龙一伙的，你应该明白，如果对我出手，阿龙可不会袖手旁观，这样的话你还找我有事吗？	Criminal? I'm part of Arlong Pirates; you should know if you take action, Arlong will not let it go. So why are you looking for me?
吱吱吱吱，我可不管你是不是海贼，我接到了你是小偷的情报，听说你在海贼那边偷了不少财宝，全部交出来吧，从海贼那偷来的东西理所当然都是海军的，来人啊，给我搜，把那1亿的宝藏全部找出来。	Squeak…squeak…I don't care if you are a pirate or not. I receive report that you are a thief and have stolen many treasure from the pirates. Pirates treasure should belong to the Marine. Search this place, and find the 100,000,000 Beli worth of treasure.

没事的，我是阿龙的干部，阿龙不会为难我，阿健那边又遇到了麻烦，你先去帮助阿健吧。	No problem, I'm an officer within Arlong Pirates so they won't cause trouble. You can go help Genzo first.
健先生……好的，我明白了。	Genzo…Okay, I'll go.

刚才我路过街道时看到这些海贼跟卡巴吉有过接触，卡巴吉一定跟这件事有关。	I saw the pirates getting in contact with Cabaji, Cabaji must be related to this incident.
卡巴吉也是巴基的手下，难道巴基来到了这里，那家伙可是最爱大炮的恐怖分子。	Cabaji is also from Buggy Pirates. Is Buggy at Loguetown? He's a terrorist who loves giant bombs and cannons.
巴基？我好像听过他，他可是一个不折不扣的坏蛋。	Buggy? I heard of him before. They say he is a terrorist.
既然发现了卡巴吉的踪迹，那就先去阻止卡巴吉！	Since we already discovered Cabaji, let's go capture him first.
干得不错，卡巴吉就交给我吧。	Great job! I'll put Cabaji in prison.
那就辛苦达斯琪上士了。	Alright, he's all yours now.
镇长那边好像遇到了什么麻烦，我现在要押送卡巴吉去海军基地，你们几个去镇长那看看吧。	Mayor is having some troubles. I'm going to escort Cabaji to Marine Base. You  can go find the mayor.
好的，我们会帮镇长解决麻烦的。	Sure, I'm going now.
{#}，最近我总是心神不宁，感觉要发生什么大事。	{#}, I feel uneasy recently as if something major is going to happen.
镇长你别担心，有什么事告诉我，我帮你解决。	Don't worry! Tell me the problem and I'll solve it for you.
最近镇长来了不少来历不明的人物，为首的还是一个拿大铁锤的女子，听说是东海著名的海贼，真怕他们惹出什么麻烦。	Recently an unknown female carrying an Iron Mace arrived at town. We heard she's a famous pirate at East Blue. I hope they don't cause trouble.
大铁锤，难道是亚尔丽塔那个胖女人?	Iron Mace, is it Alvida the fat lady?
胖女人，不……不，我见过她，她可一点也不胖。	Fat lady? She isn't fat at all.
那就奇怪了，不过镇长你就放心吧，我会收拾这些海贼的。	That's strange. But don't worry, I'll deal with those pirates.
镇长，这些海贼已经被我打败了，她就是亚尔丽塔，不过是吃了滑滑果实才变成这样的。	Mayor, I already defeated the pirates. She is Alvida but she ate the Smooth-Smooth Fruit to become skinny.
原来如此，早就听说恶魔果实的神奇之处了，今天还是第一次见到呢。	I've heard of the power of Devil Fruits, but this is the first time I actually see one.
哈哈，镇长，我可是橡皮人哦，你看我的手！（路飞将手伸长，吓了镇长一跳）	Ha-ha, I'm a Rubber Human, look at my arms! (Luffy extends his arms which surprises the Mayor) 
真是神奇，吓了我一跳呢，不过这些海贼你们还是尽快交给达斯琪处理吧，决不能让他们危害了罗格镇的安宁。	So magical! But you guys should hand the pirates over to Tashigi so that they won't disturb Loguetown's peace.
明白了，镇长，我这就带着这些海贼去见达斯琪。	Yes, I'll bring them to Tashigi.
原来你们抓了亚尔丽塔，真是帮了我一个大忙，亚尔丽塔就交给我吧。	So you guys managed to capture Alvida. Thanks for the great help, you can hand her over to me now.
那就麻烦达斯琪上士了。	Then I'll let you handle her.
我会将亚尔丽塔关进监狱的，决不让他们继续为非作歹，至于这次行动的幕后黑手，我也绝对不会放过的。	I'll put all of them into jail. With regard to the mastermind of this event, I'll not let him get away.
那就等待达斯琪上士的好消息了。	Then I'll wait for the good news from you.
我已经调查过了，这些海贼的首领就是巴基，真是太可恶了。	These pirates' leader is Buggy, damn!
我就猜到是巴基，那家伙可不是省油的灯。	I knew it was Buggy, that dude is not easy to deal with.
有消息称巴基在广场上现身了，我们需要抓捕巴基。	Buggy is at the Plaza. We need to capture Buggy.
好的，我们马上出发。	Yes, let's go.
哈哈哈哈哈，这次我会把你们全部干掉！	Hahaha, this time I'll kill all of you!
你在说什么呢，我们已经把你们包围了！	What are you talking about? We've surrounded you!
哈哈哈哈，包围？你仔细看看周围可都是我的手下，这些都是计谋，我的手下只是假装被你们抓取而已！	Surrounded? Look around and you'll realize they are all my henchmen. They just pretended to be captured by you earlier!
什么？！！！	What?!!!
不好了，趁我们来抓巴基的时候，亚尔丽塔和巴基的手下已经打晕了海军全部逃出来了。	Bad news! While we came to capture Buggy, Alvida and Buggy Pirates defeated the Marines and all escaped.
……	……
哈哈哈，该死的家伙，中计了吧，现在是你被我们包围了。	Hahaha! You are surrounded by us!
受死吧，橘子镇的仇我现在来报了！	I'm here to revenge for what you did to me at Orange Town! You're doomed!
哈哈哈哈，终于到了报仇的时刻了，你们因为冒犯了本大爷的罪，判处极刑。	Hahaha! Because you have offended me, you will be executed.
要死了么……再见了，大家。	I'm going to die…Good bye, everyone.
（天空中劈出一道闪电集中了巴基）哈哈哈哈，活下来了啊，捡了个便宜。	(A bolt of lightening appears and hits Buggy)  Hahaha! I'm alive.
没想到巴基变得这么厉害了，还和亚尔丽塔联合起来了，不过这道闪电可真关键啊。	I didn't expect Buggy to become so powerful and forming an alliance with Alvida. But this bolt of lightening was godsend.
海军也开始行动了呢，不过好像我们也变成了敌人，我们快会镇上看看吧。	Marine also started taking action. Yet, we are pirates, the enemy of marine. Anyway, let's go back to town.
恩，先去跟达斯琪看看了解下情况	Let's go ask Tashigi for more information.
真是不好意思，因为海军的疏忽让你们陷入了危机。	I'm so sorry, because of the Marine's negligence, you guys were in great danger.
没关系，最后我们还是安然无恙就好了。	It's okay, we're all fine now.
不好意思啊，斯摩格上校因为广场上的事开始召集海军了，我得马上过去。	Captain Smoker has summoned all the Marines because of what happened at the Plaza. I need to go now.
竟然走的这么急，发生了什么大事，我还是去找镇长了解下情况。	Why is she in such a hurry? Let's go ask Mayor for more information.
镇长，你知道斯摩格上校召集海军想要做什么吗？	Mayor, do you know why Captain Smoker is summoning the Marines?
因为广场上的事，斯摩格上校开始召集所有海军开始抓捕所有在罗格镇的海贼了。	Captain Smoker is summoning the Marines to start capturing all pirates at Loguetown.
竟然是这样，看来我们也得跑路了，不然就被海军抓了。	Then we should also leave so that we won't be captured.
你们几个是好人，快跑吧，不过我刚才看到摩奇去港口嚷嚷着要烧了你们的船。	You guys should leave. But I just saw Mohji shouting about burning your ship.
梅利号，不好，我得马上去港口阻止摩奇。	Going Merry, oh no, we have to stop Mohji now.
年轻人，看来你们已经成功阻止了摩奇。	It seems you guys successfully stopped Mohji.
真是好险，要是让摩奇烧了梅利号我们就不能继续出海冒险了。	That was close. If Mohji burned the Going Merry, then we couldn't sail anymore.
不过斯摩格上校的部下已经开始行动了，现在去港口的路布满了海军，这次的指挥官可是斯摩格上校。	Captain Smoker's subordinates have already started taking actions, so there are Marines stationed along the road to the harbor. Captain Smoker is in charge of this operation.
看来只能突围了。	We can only break through by force then.
能够从海军的层层包围圈中突围成功看，斯摩格上校可从来不会放过任何海贼，看来你们的实力非常强大啊。	Captain Smoker has never allowed any pirates to successfully pass through the Marine's encirclement. You guys must be very powerful then.
那是当然了，我们是绝对不会束手就擒的。	Of course, we're not going to give in without a fight.
你们快走吧，快点离开罗格镇，如果遇到斯摩格上校那就可不好办了。	You guys should leave Loguetown now.
谢谢村长的提醒，我们会注意的。	Thank you for the warning. We'll be careful.
（村长长叹一口气）哎，这下事情可不好办了啊。	(The mayor sighs)  Sigh…things just got tougher.
发生了什么？海军已经来了吗？	What happened? Marine arrived already?
不止海军来了，连达斯琪上士也接到了斯摩格的命令要逮捕你们，看来你们凶多吉少啊。	Not only the regular marines, even Master Chief Petty Officer Tashigi received Smoker's order to capture you guys.
只要有一线希望，我们就不会放弃。	Even if there is very little hope, we'll not give up.
没想到你们几个竟然也是海贼！	I didn't know you guys were actually pirates.
达斯琪小姐，我们可从来没说过我们不是啊。	Miss Tashigi, we never lied about our identity.
那你们为什么还要帮助我逮捕那些破坏治安的海贼？	Then why did you guys help me capture those troublemaking pirates?
海贼也分好坏，有些只是单纯想在海上冒险，根本就没有想过危害无辜的人。	There are good and bad pirates. We just want to sail the sea and not hurt anyone innocent.
是这样么？但是上面的命令我不能违背，念在你们帮助过我的份上，我不会使出全力的。	Really? But I cannot violate the orders. Considering the help you guys provided, I won't fight you with full strength.
没想到你们竟然连达斯琪上士都能突破。	You guys even manage to defeat Master Chief Petty Officer Tashigi.
达斯琪上士是个善良的姑娘。	Master Chief Petty Officer Tashigi is a kind-hearted girl.
突破这儿之后，穿过这条小路就能快速到达港口了，你们要赶在斯摩格追击来之前逃走啊，不然可就麻烦了。	You guys can reach the harbor through this small road. You guys should leave now before Smoker arrives.
明白了，镇长。	Thank you, Mayor.
港口就在眼前了，我们加快速度。	The harbor is in front. Let's move!
前面有人！！又来了！	There is someone in front!
来了啊，草帽路飞，{#}，我可等你们好久了。	Straw Hat Luffy, {#}, I've been waiting for you here.
你是什么人？	Who are you?
我叫烟鬼，是海军总部的上校，我是绝对不会让你们逃出海的。	I'm Captain Smoker of the Marines. I'll not let you pirates escape.
摆脱了海军，那就赶快上船离开罗格镇吧，不然下一批海军又要来了。	Since you guys manage to pass through, leave Loguetown now.
离开罗格镇之后，再往前行就是伟大航路的入口了，希望你们可以一路顺风。	After leaving Loguetown, you guys will reach the entrance to the Grand Line. I wish good luck!
谢谢镇长，我们出发了，伟大航路，我们来了！	Thank you. We're leaving now. Grand Line, we're coming!
前面那座大山就是隔绝伟大航路跟东海的屏障。	That huge mountain is a natural border between Grand Line and East Blue.
只要穿过那座大山就能进入伟大航路了，都有点迫不及待想要进去了呢。	We have to cross that mountain to enter Grand Line. I can't wait.
（突然间，船体开始摇晃起来）不好，有海兽攻击我们的船只，想要进入伟大航路就要先把那些海兽击败。	(Suddenly, the boat starts to shake) Bad news, the Sea Monsters are attacking our ship. We need to defeat them to enter the Grand Line.
好的，我这就去解决他们。	Okay, I'll get rid of them.
干得不错，这样我们就可以继续前进了。	Good job, we can keep sailing.
接下来就可以进入伟大航线了吗？	Then we can enter the Grand Line?
由于海兽的袭击，我们的船好像偏离了原本的路线，现在我们迷路了，我们得花点时间重新规划路线。	Because of the attack, our boat seems to leave the original course. Now we're lost and need to spend some time to recalculate the route.
看来也只能这样了。	That seems to be the only way.
经过娜美的计算，我们朝着东南方一直行驶就能回到原来的路线了。	After Nami's calculation, we can keep sailing toward the south-east direction to reach the original route.
那么，我们快点调转方向，朝着东南方前进！	Then let's change direction and set sail.
不过我们这里是海王类的巢穴，要出去可没有那么容易啊！	But this is the Sea Kings' nest, we're trapped!
那就从这边打出去，什么都不能阻止我们进入伟大航路。	Then let's fight our way out, we have to reach the Grand Line.
干得不错，我们成功从海王类巢穴中出来了。	Great job, we're out of the Sea Kings' nest.
那些海王类还真是凶猛啊，肯定是饿了好久。	Those Sea Kings are so ferocious. They must be quite hungry.
刚才在突围海王类的时候，我发现了一个迷路的小女孩，昏倒在甲板上漂流，我就把她救了上来。	While fighting the Sea Kings, I found a lost little girl who fainted and was floating in the sea. So I rescued her.
在这大海上孤单一人，肯定十分危险，我去瞧瞧她。	I'm going to check on her.
唔~这是哪？我怎么会出现在这里？	Where am I?
你醒啦，这边是我们的梅利号，索隆发现你昏迷在海上就救了你，为什么你会独自一人在海上？	You're awake. This is the Going Merry. Zoro discovered you while you were floating in the sea. Why are you all alone?
原来是你们救了我，谢谢你们，我是为了逃避海军的追击一个人从海军基地跑出来了。	Thank you for rescuing me. I was running away from the Marines and I escaped from the Marine Base by myself.
海军？你和海军有什么瓜葛吗？	Marine? Why are they after you?
我和一头老千年龙是朋友，传说龙骨是可以制作长生不死药的，那些海军想要得到龙骨就把我抓去了，我拼死才从那边逃出来，没想到在海上迷路了。	I'm friends with an old Thousand Year Dragon. The legend says the bones from the dragon can be made into medicine. Those Marines want to get the bones so they captured me. I escaped but got lost.
那些混蛋海军，这世上怎么可能有真的长生不死。	Those annoying marines!
可是那些海军就是想要知道千年龙的下落，我绝对不会告诉他们的，不好！那些海军发现了我，追上来了。	They tried so hard to get the information of the Thousand Year Dragon. Of course, I will never tell them. Bad news! They spot me and now behind us!
别怕，我会把他们全部揍飞。	Don't be afraid. I'll deal with them for you.
嘻嘻，那些海军三两下就被打跑了，这是我从厨房拿材料做的饭菜。（一团黑乎乎的饭菜展现在你的面前）	He-he! You've defeated those Marines so easily. I made this food for you. (A black ball of rice appears in front of you) 
唔，这些可能就是卖相差了些，说不定味道不错呢，（咔吧咔吧）啊！这是什么味道，怎么那么辣！！	They look terrible, maybe they'll taste good. (Eating…)  Ah! Why is this so spicy!!
这么难吃吗？我也吃下，（小女孩夹起菜吃了一口）啊！我放错调料，呜呜呜呜~不好意思，下次我一定改进。	Is it bad? Let me try. (Little girl picked up the food and took a bite)  Ah! I put the wrong condiments…sob…sorry, I'll be careful next time.
……不要啊，我想吃山治做的饭菜。	…ah, please don't, I just want to eat Sanji's food.
呜呜，那我就做给龙爷吃，虽然赶走了那些海军，可是海军一定不会放过龙爷的，求你们保护龙爷好吗？	(Sob…) I'll give it to Sennenryu then. Even though you chased away those Marines, but they would not easily let Sennenryu go, please protect Sennenryu.
没问题的，有们在那些海军休想伤害龙爷。	No problem, we'll make sure those Marines cannot hurt Sennenryu.
谢谢你赶走了海军，这下龙爷安全了。	Thank you, this way Sennenryu will be safe.
马上就要进入伟大航路了，你也一起吗？	We're going to enter the Grand Line, do you want to come along?
不了，现在已经到龙穴了，我要留下来陪伴龙爷，这里没有海军可以到来，对于龙爷来讲很安全。	No, thanks. We've reached Senneryu's nest. I want to stay with Sennenry. There are no Marines around this area, so it's safe for Sennenryu.
原来是这样，龙爷有你这样的朋友一定会很开心呢。	Sennenryu must be very happy to have a friend like you.
索隆已经在伟大航路的水门前等你了，快去找他吧。	Zoro is waiting for you at the Grand Line's Water Gate, go find him.
恩，我这就去，再见了。	Yes, I'm going. Good bye!
现在我们已经进入水门了，只要翻过水门我们就能进入伟大航路了。	We're entering the Water Gate. We just need to cross the Reverse Mountain and we can enter the Grand Line.
哇，终于要进入伟大航路了，实在是太紧张了。	Finally, we're entering Grand Line, I'm so nervous.
前方出现了颠倒山的精英守卫，看来要打倒他们才行了，做好战斗准备吧，我的刀已经饥渴难耐了。	In front of us are the Reverse Mountains' Elite Guards. We have to beat them. I can't wait.
我的浑身开始颤抖了，战斗吧，伟大航路就在眼前了。	Let's go. Grand Line is right in front. 
哈哈，真是酣畅淋漓的一战。	That was a great fight.
我们终于要进入伟大航路了，与香克斯的约定又近了一步。	We're finally entering Grand Line, and one step closer to reaching the agreement with Shanks.
翻过这座山，就能进入伟大航路了。	Crossing this mountain and we can enter the Grand Line.
好期待啊……	So anxious…
终于到达伟大航路了！	We're here at the Grand Line!
不好，前方怎么会有一座黑色的大山，这个在地图上没有标注，过了颠倒山就应该是一望无际的海洋啊！	Bad news! There is black mountain right in front of us. This is not marked on the map. After crossing Reverse Mountain we should see the endless ocean!
不！那不是山，是鲸鱼，竟然有这么大个的鲸鱼，左满舵，趁着它没发现我们，快绕开它。	No! That's not a mountain but a whale. Hard to port, before it discovers us, let's go around it.
它已经发现了我们，必须战斗了。	It saw us. We have to fight now. 
终于把这个大家伙打败了。	We finally manage to defeat the giant whale.
不好，那鲸鱼朝我们扑过来了！	The whale is charging toward us!
哇阿阿阿阿阿，大家要被吃掉了么？我还不想死啊。	Aaaah!!! We're going to be eaten alive?! I don't want to die.
大家快抓住船上能抓住的东西。	Hold onto anything you can find on the ship.
阿阿阿阿阿……	Aaaah….
醒醒！醒醒。	Wake up! Wake up!
嗯？我不是被鲸鱼吞了么，这是在做梦么?	Am I dreaming?
我们还活着，这边应该是鲸鱼的胃里面。	We're still alive. We must be inside the whale's stomach.
竟然被鲸鱼吞了，我们的冒险就要到此结束了么……	Swallowed by the whale, are we going to be stuck here forever?
那边有个看报纸的老头，说不定知道些什么呢，我们去问下。	There is an old man reading newspaper, maybe he know something. I'm going to ask.
我是克罗卡斯，是双子岬的看守，今年71岁，双子座，AB型血。	I'm Crocus, the guard of Twin Capes Lighthouse. I'm 71 years old, a Gemini, and my blood type is AB.
大爷，这边是哪里啊？	Old man, what is this place?
还问我这是什么地方？你们闯进我的私人度假胜地，还以为是在老鼠的肚子里吗？	How dare you to ask so? You're interrupting my private vacation, you think you are in a mouse's stomach?
果然，我们被鲸鱼吃掉了，该怎么办，大爷，有办法可以离开这里吗?	We're swallowed by the whale. Old man, is there anyway to get out?
你们几个刚才进来惊吓了我正在捕捉的海兽，想这么轻松就离开这里吗？去把那海兽捉回来我就告诉你们办法。	You scared away the sea monster I was about to catch. If you want to leave, go catch the sea monster and I'll point you the way out.
明白了，大叔，我们一定会把海兽抓回来的。	Alright, old man. We'll catch the sea monster for you.
干得不错，这些海兽我收下了，出口就在那边，你们随时可以出去。	Good job. The exit is over there, you could leave anytime you like.
那个门就是出口？，可为什么鲸鱼的肚子里会有门……	That door is the exit? Why is there a door like this inside the whale's stomach…
哪来那么多为什么，想出去就现在出去，这边是我的私人地方。	Stop asking me questions. If you want to leave, then get out now. This is my private place.
知道了，我们这就离开。	Yes, we'll leave now.
怎么回事？怎么开始摇晃起来了。	What happened? Why the ship is shaking?
又开始了，是这条鲸鱼，它开始用头撞红土大陆了，我要去给它打镇定剂，但是水中会有海兽袭击，希望你们能够帮忙。	This whale is charging toward the Red Line. I'm going to give it a shot of sedative, but the sea monster might attack. I hope you can help.
交给我们吧，我们会掩护你的。	Leave it to us. We'll cover you.
谢谢你们击败了海兽王，我才能成功给拉布注射镇定剂。	Thank you for defeating the Sea Kings so I can give Laboon the sedative.
大叔你给鲸鱼注射镇定剂是为了慢慢杀死鲸鱼么？	Why are you giving the whale medicine? Do you want to kill it slowly?
混蛋，你说什么呢！	Damn, what the heck are you talking about?!
{#}，快看，从天空中掉下一批人。	{#}, look, a group of people is falling from above.
不好！那批人用大炮向鲸鱼发射炮弹了，什么！花大叔用身体挡住了炮弹，难道他是在保护鲸鱼！	Bad news! Those people are shooting bazookas at the whale! What! Crocus used his own body to block the bazookas, he's protecting the whale!
咳咳咳……可恶，决不能让他们伤害拉布。	Cough…Damn, I…I can't let them hurt Laboon.
这群家伙这么可恶，我忍不住要揍他们了。	They are so despicable. I want to beat them up.
这些家伙是谁啊？为什么想要猎杀鲸鱼？	Why do they want to hurt the whale?
这些家伙是附近城镇的无赖……他们正打拉布的主意，因为拉布的肉够他们整个小镇吃3年。	They are from nearby towns. They want to kill Laboon because Laboon's meat is enough to eat for 3 years.
这些混蛋，我绝不会放过他们的。	I won't let them get away with it.
刚才我看到的身影不止这几个被打败的，一定还有其他的人潜伏在角落中，去问下酒吧老板娘看他是否有见过这些人。	I saw not just these few people. Go ask the Tavern Owner if she's seen more people like them around here.
这附近有出现过什么可疑人物吗？	Did anyone suspicious show up around this area recently?
哦？发生了什么事情？	What happened?
有几个可疑的人物来到了这里准备猎杀鲸鱼拉布，克罗卡斯让我们来问下线索。	There were some suspicious people who wanted to kill Laboon, Crocus sent us to ask for clues.
猎杀鲸鱼拉布的可疑人物？唔……这得让我好好想想。	Suspicious people who want to kill Laboon? Hmmm…I need to think about it first.
我想到了，不久前我见过一个鬼鬼祟祟的家伙出现在房子附近，以前可从来没见过他呢。	I remember a sneaky guy appearing around this area recently, I've never seen him before.
他有什么特征吗？	What does he look like?
让我想想……他全身穿着绿色的服装，头上戴着一个皇冠，还扛着一个大炮，这家伙应该就是你们想要找的人。	He dressed in green, wearing a crown and carrying a large bazooka. He's probably the guy you are looking for.
没错，应该就是他了，必须阻止他。	Yes, it must be him. We have to stop him.
谢谢你们了，这些猎杀鲸鱼的坏蛋都被打败了。	Thank you for defeating the whale hunters.
克罗卡斯好像很在意鲸鱼呢。	Crocus seems to care a lot about the whale.
那是当然，他们在一起相处都50年了呢，当年拉布可还是个小不点。	Of course, they've been together for 50 years. Back then, Laboon was still a small baby.
原来花大叔跟鲸鱼之间竟然有这么深厚的感情。	So between Crocus and Laboon, there's a deep bond.
快回去看看克罗卡斯，他一定非常着急。	Go check on Crocus, he must be very worried.
明白了，我这就去见大叔。	Yes, I'll go now.
花大叔，我已经将猎杀鲸鱼的家伙打败了。	Crocus, we've already killed the whale hunters.
干得不错，不过又有一批新的家伙出现了。	Good job, but another group just appeared.
什么！！他们竟然又来了一批人。	What!! Another group?!
在我有生之年，绝对不会允许他们动拉布一根指头，我不会让他们得逞的。	While I'm alive, I won't let them hurt Laboon.
我们会阻止他们的。	We'll help you block them.
干得不错，不过他们的首领还没打败。	You still need to defeat the leader.
还有漏网之鱼吗？	Somebody escaped?
这次带领他们的是一个女子，她是Mr.9的搭档，这两个无赖可是垂涎拉布很久了。	There leader is a girl who's Mr. 9's partner. These two scumbags have been after Laboon for a long time.
他们竟然是一个组合，我们会保护鲸鱼的。	There a duo. We'll protect the whale.
谢谢你们阻止了这两个无赖的阴谋，要是早几十年，我早就收拾他们了。	Thank you for defeating those two scumbags. If I'm younger, I would have got rid of them already.
花大叔，为什么你对拉布如此在意呢？	Why do you care so much about Laboon?
拉布是有故事的，很久以前，有一伙和气的海贼来到了这里，有一只小鲸鱼跟着他们，岛鲸是一种群居生物，但是对于拉布来说，那些海贼就是它的同伴，他们的船出了故障在这边停留了几个月，我也因此和他们成为了好友。	Years ago, Laboon as a baby whale followed a group of pirates to here, and the pirates stopped by the lighthouse in order to repair their ship. As for Laboon, those pirates were his companions. I was there then and became friend with them. 
后来呢？大叔！	Then what happened?
有一天船长拜托我照看拉布，与拉布约定环游伟大航路一周后再来接拉布，拉布也明白这一切和我一直在这等候，但这已经是50年前的事了，我告诉他同伴不会再来了可是拉布不相信，所以它不停地仰天长啸，还用身体去撞红土大陆导致自己伤痕累累。	Out of fear for the whale's safety the pirates told Laboon to stay behind with me, promising they would return someday. The pirates apparently fled the Grand Line later and never came back for Laboon, who continues to wait for them though it has been over fifty years. The reason his head is scarred is that Laboon Believes he can break through the mountain to reach his friends. Despite me already telling Laboon the truth, he still continues to run into the mountain as it is the only hope Laboon has.
原来如此，拉布真的好可怜。	Poor Laboon!
不行，拉布又开始发狂了！	Laboon is going crazy again!
这家伙再发狂下去会出大事的！	If he continues like this, he's going to be in danger!
它头上的伤已经那么恐怖了，要是它继续这样没理性的撞下去一定会死的，我不能见死不救。	He's already seriously injured. If he continues, he's going to die. 
要想办法阻止它。	We have to think of a way to stop him.
我有办法了，就交给我们吧！	I know a way, let me deal with him.
这次我和你没能分出胜负来，所以一定要再打一场，你的同伴死了，但我还是你的对手，等我们绕伟大航路航行一周后，再回来见你！到时候，我们再打一架吧！	This time is a tie, so we need to fight again. When we return from the Grand Line, we'll have a rematch! Wait for me here!
说的好！路飞。	Well said, Luffy!
看来拉布已经稳定下来了，真了不起啊。	It seems Laboon is calmer now.
没想到你们能够让拉布稳定下来不再继续疯狂的行为了。	I didn't expect you guys to be able to calm Laboon down. 
嘿嘿，这都多亏路飞那小子相处的办法。	All thanks to Luffy's way of dealing with friends.
你们即将进入伟大航路，在伟大航路上冒险，没有记录指针可不行，作为报答，我的记录指针给你们。	You'll be entering Grand Line. While adventuring on the Grand Line, you need a log pose. As my gift, I'm giving you my log pose.
再见，花大叔，谢谢你的记录指针。	Good bye, thank you for the log pose.
再见了，不过刚才被你们打败的Miss.星期三好像有事要求助你们。	Good bye. But it seems that Miss Wednesday needs your help.
哦？竟然有事求助？我去瞧瞧。	Needs my help? Let me go see.
听花大叔说你有事情求助我们？说来听听，不过想让我帮你去猎杀拉布那是不可能的。	You need our help? Tell me what you need, but I won't help you kill Laboon.
才没那回事，但是因为我们的船没了，想请你们带我们回到威士忌小镇里。	We lost our ship, so we hope you can take us to Whiskey Peak.
你想的可真美啊，刚才你们还想杀掉那条鲸鱼呢，你们到底是什么人？	You people wanted to kill that whale. Who the heck are you guys anyway?
我们也不想干这种偷偷摸摸的事，可是我们公司的规矩是神秘，所以什么都不能说，我们是相信各位的人格，才请求各位的。	I don't want to do these strange things, but our company's rule is to remain mysterious, so I can't say anything. I Believe you guys so that's why I'm asking you guys.
好吧，那你们上船吧，我们前往威士忌小镇。	Alright, you can get on the ship. We're going to Whiskey Peak.
欢迎……咳咳！玛-玛-玛-玛-玛，我的名字叫伊卡莱姆，是威士忌小镇的镇长。	Welcome…(Cough!)  Mi...mi...mi... My name is Igaram. I'm Whiskey Peak's Mayor.
哇，大叔，你的头发好卷啊。	Sir, your hair is so curly.

交给我们，我们会把捣乱的海贼赶走。	Leave it to us, we'll deal with them.

美酒，我可最喜欢喝酒了，哈哈哈哈。	I love wine, hahaha!
请允许我们准备好宴席为诸位接风洗尘并报答赶走捣乱者，不知各位可否赏脸？	Please allow us to invite you to the feast as our thanks for your help, would you be interested?
愿意，非常愿意！。	Of course.
这几个笨蛋，话说回来，这个岛要多久才能储备满记录指针？	You guys who only care about food. So how long does it take to record on the Log Pose?
记录？先别说这些死板的事情了，旅途劳顿，先休息一下吧，来，大家准备宴会，歌唱冒险家之歌，宴会开始！	Log pose? Let's not talk such serious stuff. Let's rest and enjoy the feast first!

嘻嘻，您说的我都不好意思了。	Ha-ha, that was nothing.

你可真没用啊，才喝了那么点就醉了。	You are such a wimpy drinker! Ha-ha.
身为一个剑客，无论何时都不会让自己被酒精控制住的，我只是装醉而已。	As a swordsman, you should never let your body be controlled by alcohol. I'm just pretending.
嗯，你发现了什么吗？	Did you discover anything suspicious?
从遇到Mr.9之后我就觉得这些名字很耳熟，到了村子里，他们实在是太好客了，这非常奇怪，让我记起了巴洛克工作室。	When meeting Mr. 9, his name sounded so familiar to me. After arriving at this town, they act way too hospitable, which is also weird. Both of these things remind me of Baroque Works.
巴洛克工作室？那是什么组织？	Baroque Works? What type of organization is that?
巴洛克工作室就是……不好！Mr.9往我们这边过来了，看来他们发现了什么，我们必须战斗了。	Baroque Works is… Ah! Mr. 9 is coming this way. It seems they are suspicious also, so time for us to battle.
没想到这些好客的村民竟然真是巴洛克工作室的，不过巴洛克工作室到底什么组织？	So these friendly villagers are all part of Baroque Works, but what type of organization is Baroque Works?
巴洛克工作室是一个邪恶的犯罪组织，彼此成员间用代号相称，看来村子里有不少巴洛克工作室的成员啊。	Baroque Works is an evil criminal organization, and all the main agents are given a code name which they address each other by. This village has Baroque Works members.
难怪村子里那么多人都是有代号的，莫非他们全都是巴洛克工作室的成员？	So all these people with code names are Baroque Works members?
看来这个村庄是赏金猎人的巢穴了，他们专占那些洋洋得意刚进入伟大航路海贼的便宜，这个村子大概有100个赏金猎人，今天是个战斗的夜晚了。	This village must be a bounty hunters' den. They capture those pirates who just entered Grand Line. This village probably has over 100 bounty hunters. We'll be fighting the whole night.
干得不错，这些巴洛克的喽还真是缠人。	Good job. These Baroque Minions are so annoying.

是巴洛克又怎么样，这个镇子已经缺少粮食了，我们去捕捉鲸鱼缓解镇子的粮食危机，可惜被你们发现了。	This village has food shortage. We went to catch the whale to solve the food issue, but you guys stopped us.
只是因为这样就能残害拉布吗？，没粮食可以想其他的办法。	If you have food shortage, you could think of other solutions.

我们才不会束手就擒。	We won't give up easily.
没想到巴洛克的成员越打越多，这样下去我们可坚持不了多久，我们得想办法尽快离开这。	There are more people charging toward us. We should try to escape as soon as possible.
不好，梅利号被人上锁了，整个船被锁在了港口无法行动。	Going Merry is locked and we cannot move the boat from the harbor.
可恶，我们必须要找到钥匙才行，可有谁会知道钥匙却又会告诉我们呢。	Damn, we need to find the keys. Who would have the keys and be able to tell us?
酒吧老板娘好像不是巴洛克工作室的成员，我们去找她了解下情况吧。	Tavern Owner is not a Baroque Works member. Let's go ask her.
你们不是刚走吗？怎么么这么快就回来了，是不是刚才没有喝够？	Why did you guys come back? Do you want more wine?

什么！难道他们都是巴洛克的人？我是前些日子刚搬到镇上来的，没想到居然是这样。	What? They are all part of Baroque Work? I just moved here lately, never expected this.
我们的船被锁了，现在想要走却走不了，您知道是谁有钥匙吗？	Our ship is locked. Do you know who would have the key?
钥匙应该是在伊卡莱姆的手中，他毕竟是这个镇的镇长，就算不在他手中他也知道具体在哪。	Probably Igaram, since he's the Mayor. 
必须要找到伊卡莱姆才能得到钥匙了。	Then we have to find Igaram to get the key.

我们已经被巴洛克工作室的成员包围了，现在必须要突破出去才行。	We're surrounded by Baroque Works members. We have to breakthrough.
干得不错，现在我们已经成功突围出来了。	Good job, we've managed to breakthrough already.
但是我们好像惊动了修女，现在那个修女已经往我们这边来了。	We seem to have alerted that nun over there and she's charging toward us.
我听说过这家伙，这家伙应该就是巴洛克工作室的Miss.星期一了，她浑身肌肉发达，是一个十足的男人婆	I heard of her before. She's Baroque Works' Miss Monday. She's full of muscles and a tomboy.
噗~这个修女竟然是男人婆，哈哈，我去会一会他。	A nun is a tomboy? Hahaha! I'm going to battle her just to see.

那是当然，我要好好教训一下这个可恶的家伙。	Of course, we'll kick his ass really bad for sure.

原来如此，怪不得他的头发那么有型呢！	So that's why he has such unique hairstyle.
你们几个竟然能够突出重围来到我的面前，真了不起啊，不过没有钥匙开不了船是不是很难受呢？	You guys are quite amazing for making it this far. But without a key to unlock the ship is really bad, right?
废话少说，快交出钥匙，如果不交我们就打得你交出来。	Stop with the nonsense and hand over the key now, or else!

收拾妥当了，吁，夜晚终于变得平静美好了。	We're done, and the night is finally peaceful again.
天快亮了，我们该离开这了。	The sun is almost up, let's leave here.
为什么有种奇怪的感觉，是我神经过敏了吗？	I have strange feeling. Am I too sensitive?
不管那么多啦，我们还是先去问出钥匙的下落要紧。	Let's get the key and don't worry about anything else.
快交出钥匙，不然我可对你不客气了。	Hand over the key, or else die here.
我怎么能死在这里……我还肩负着重要的使命！决不能在这边倒下。	How can I die here? I have an important mission to accomplish.
你在说什么呢？我们要的是钥匙。	What are you talking about? We just want the key.
我的真实身份是阿拉巴斯坦的护卫长，薇薇是公主，巴洛克工作室的Mr.5和Miss.情人节已经来到了镇上，我们的身份一定露馅了。	I'm the Captain of the Royal Guards at Alabasta Kingdom, Vivi is the Princess. Baroque Works' Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine came to the village because they discovered our identity.
见识到你们的实力之后，我有个请求！那两个人都是有特殊能力的人，我拦不住他们，因此，请你们带着公主离开这里，钥匙我等会拿给你们，求你们了，而且带着公主到达王国，就能获得巨额奖赏。	I have a request. Please protect the Princess to leave here safely. I'll give you guys the key. I beg you. When you reach our Kingdom, you'll also get major reward for bringing the Princess to the Kingdom.
你这话我感兴趣，10亿贝利如何，一个王国的命运才10亿可是很便宜的。	I'm interested. How about 1,000,000,000 Beli? A kingdom's future for 1,000,000,000 Beli is not expansive.
……我只是一个小兵，怎么敢答应这么高的数额，如果你们将公主护送回王国，再找公主商量吧。	…I'm just a guard, I can't make a deal with you like this. Please escort Princess back to the Kingdom and she'll decide.
也就是说，叫我们先救公主了，好的，我们答应你。	So we shall rescue the Princess first. Okay, we'll help you.
我为袭击你们的事情感到抱歉，这是梅利号的钥匙，交给你们吧。	I'm sorry for sneak attacking you guys. This is the Going Merry's key, here you are.
这到底是怎么一回事？	What's happening?
公主和我发现了巴洛克工作室的秘密，所以我们逃出了王国，潜伏在了这个小镇上，可恶，如果我变得更强就能够保护好公主了，如果公主有个三长两短，王国可就完蛋了啊。	The Princess and I discovered Baroque Works' secrets, so we escaped from the Kingdom and hid within this town to find more info. Damn, if I was more powerful I could at least protect the Princess. 
放心吧，我们会保护好公主的，就娜美那个性可舍弃不了这巨额奖金。	Don't worry, we'll protect the Princess. Nami will not give up on the reward.
混蛋，你说什么呢！快去战斗！	What the heck are you talking about?! Go fight!
这是一间秘密犯罪的公司，没有一个职员知道老板的长相和性命，主要做间谍、暗杀、盗窃和赏金猎人，全体人员依老板的指令行事。	This is a secret crime organization and no one knows the Boss' name or appearance. Our main duty is to spy, assassinate, steal and bounty hunting. All members just follow the Boss' order.
连老板的身份都不知道，大家为什么还那么听他的话？	Without knowing the Boss' identity, why are you guys willing to listen to him?
巴洛克工作室的最终目的是建立一个理想国，老板答应大家，现在在公司立过功的人将来在他创立的理想国中就可以身居要职。	Baroque Works' ultimate goal is to create an utopia. The Boss says all the important members of the company will receive prominent position within the utopia country he will establish.
原来如此。	So that's why.
老板的代号就是Mr.0，代号越接近0就代表越强大，代号5以内的人都特别厉害，这次来的就是Mr.5，不多说了，我来殿后，你快带着薇薇公主逃跑！	The Boss' code is Mr. 0, the closer your code is to 0, the more powerful you are. The person who is charging toward us is Mr. 5. I'll block him, you guys help Princess Vivi escape! Go!
什么！敌人那么强大怎么能让你一个人殿后呢？	What?! How can you block him by yourself?
公主的安危才是最重要的，快去！带着公主走，公主是王国最后的希望了，绝对不能出事。	The Princess' safety is the most important thing. Go Now! Help the Princess! She's our Kingdom's last hope, nothing can happen to her.
什么！伊卡莱姆竟然独自去面对Mr.5和Miss.情人节了？	What! Igaram is facing Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine by himself?
卷发大叔十分担心你，不想你出事，让我先带着你藏起来。	He's worried about you and wants me to help you hide first.
你的身手那么厉害，Mr.武士道先生更是鼎鼎有名的赏金猎人，求求你们救救伊卡莱姆！	You are so good, and Zoro is a famous bounty hunter. I beg you guys to rescue Igaram!
看来也只能答应你了……放心吧，你藏好，我会去援助卷发大叔的！	It seems I have to agree…Don't worry and hide yourself. I'll go help Igaram!
Miss.情人节就在前面，伊卡莱姆要坚持不住了！	Miss Valentine is in front and Igaram seems to be losing!
既然答应了你，就不会袖手旁观的，那个家伙有什么能力？	Since I agreed to help already, I'll try my best. What's her ability?
Miss.情人节是Mr.5的搭档，她是轻重果实的能力者，可以随意控制自己的体重。	Miss Valentine is Mr. 5's partner. She's Kilo-Kilo Fruit user and can randomly control her own weight.
还有这么神奇的能力，不过我们不会输的，交给我们吧。	That's strange. But don't worry, we'll win.
谢谢你们击败了Miss.情人节，现在只剩下Mr.5了。	Thank you for defeating Miss Valentine, now there's Mr. 5.
那家伙有什么特点，竟然能排在5？	What's his specialty?
Mr.5是爆爆果实能力者，可以领一切东西爆炸，连扔出的鼻屎吹出的空气也能爆炸，	Mr. 5 is Bomb-Bomb Fruit user, and can make everything explode. He likes to throw his boogers out and they explode in air.
扔出的鼻屎也能爆炸？！这家伙是怪物吗？	The boogers he throws can also explode??! Is this guy a monster?
请求你们打败Mr.5，伊卡莱姆坚持不了那么久，会被杀死的。	Please defeat Mr. 5, Igaram will not be able to win and he'll be killed.
交给我吧，我们会保证所有人的安全。	Leave it to us, we'll make sure everyone is safe.
请你们听好了，只要你们的消息传到巴洛克工作室的信息网中，马上就会有追兵出现，加上Mr.5和Miss.情人节也败在你们的手中，事态就更加严重了。	Please listen carefully, as soon as your info is added to the Baroque Works' information network, there will be more people coming after you guys. With you guys defeating both Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine, the situation is quite serious.
另外巴洛克工作室的老大鳄鱼是七武海，过去的悬赏金是8000万贝利。不过护送公主返回阿拉巴斯坦的事情……	In addition, the head of Baroque Works is Crocodile who is a Shichibukai. His bounty is 80,000,000 Beli. About escorting Princess to Alabasta Kingdom…
把薇薇送回阿拉巴斯坦的事就交给我们吧，我们答应过就不会后悔！	We'll be responsible to send Vivi back to Alabasta Kingdom. We have a deal and we'll do it.
谢谢你们了，现在开始我假扮公主，去引开巴洛克工作室的追兵，这是记录阿拉巴斯坦的永久指针，你们从另外一条路前往阿拉巴斯坦，希望我们能够平安无事的在王国会面，那么公主就拜托你们了。	Thank you. I'll pretend to be the Princess and attract the Baroque Works' minions. This Eternal Pose records Alabasta Kingdom's location. You can take another route to Alabasta Kingdom. Hope we can all safely arrive at the Kingdom.
没想到这大叔到最后这么有趣、重情重义啊。	He is funny and loyal.
是啊，所以我一直都很信任他。	So I've always trusted him.
我们出发吧，别辜负了大叔的一番好意。	Let's go now.
这边就是我们进入伟大航路后的第二个岛了！	This is the second island we reach after entering the Grand Line!
……要小心，我有种不详的感觉。	…be careful, I have bad feelings about this…
这就是小花园……可是怎么看都不像是拥有这么可爱名字的土地啊！什么东西都好大，哪里小了。	This is the Little Garden…everything here is gigantic, why does it have such a cute name?
啊！你们看，那边来了一只巨大的野兽，小心啊！	Look! A giant monster is over there! Be careful!
别怕，我去解决这些怪兽。	Don't be afraid, I'll kill them.
干得不错，没有你们可真不知道怎么办了。	Great job. 
这里的感觉还像是恐龙时代。	It seems we're still in dinosaur age at this island.
伟大航路上的岛屿，由于航海十分困难，岛与岛之间没有任何交流，所以每个岛都有自己独特的文化，所以这个岛还处于恐龙时代，就是这样。	Due to sailing difficulty, the islands on the Grand Line do not interact with each other and each island is unique. This island is still in the age of dinosaurs.
等一下……我记得好像在哪本书上读到过小花园，就是前几天读过的，我去找找。	Wait…I read about Little Garden a few days ago in a book, let me go find it.
有发现吗？娜美！	Nami, did you discover anything?
不是这本。不是这本。是哪本呢？全忘掉了，明明就看过啊。	Which one is it? Damn, I forgot everything even though I just read it.

啊，这个岛上有座火山，还有几个巨大的洞穴，真想在这里吃便当啊。	There is a volcano plus many huge caves on this island. I think this is a good location to eat our bento.
小心，这边的生物都这么巨大，引来了生物被吃掉就不好了。	What if the bento attracts more giant monsters?!
先别说这些了，那边有好几个大洞穴呢。	Let's not worry about that. Look at those huge caves.
不好了！！！有巨人过来了了，妈呀妈呀，快跑吧！	Bad news! There is a giant coming toward us. Ah…let's run!
嘎哈哈哈哈哈哈哈，好久没有人来到这里了，你们好有活力，是我久违的客人，欢迎来到小花园，我请你们去我家做客吧。	Gegyagyagyagya! We haven't had visitors for a long time. Welcome to Little Garden. I invite you to come to my home.
唔，这个巨人好像是这边的人，我们去打探一下。	This giant might know something. Let's go ask him.
巨人大叔，你就一个人住在这里吗？这没有村庄吗？	Can you tell us about this island?
村庄是有的，是个名叫埃鲁巴夫的战士之村，但是村里有个规矩，一旦发生了纠纷，就要与对方决斗，正确的人会在战神的保护下胜利并活下来，但是经过了100年，我们还是没有分出胜负。	I've been living on this island for more than 100 years. According to our Elbaf tradition, when there is a dispute, you find another island to battle until there is result, as the gods will protect the one who is righteous and let him live. But after more than 100 years, there is still no results.
什么！你们已经打了100年了？	What?! You guys have been fighting for over 100 years?

包在我身上就行了。	Don't worry, I'll bring back the meat.
哈哈哈，你们找来肉了吗？我已经准备好火堆了，就等肉来了。	Did you get some meat? I finish setting up the fire pit and waiting for the meat.
大叔，你看我们打的肉，这些够吗？	Is this enough meat?

那好吧，我再去附近转转有没有更大的猎物。	Alright, I'll try to go find bigger monsters.
不错不错，这下肉够吃了，等我烤一会就能请你们吃肉了。	This is enough. Please wait while I barbeque meat for you guys.

这个好鲜美啊，巨人大叔的厨艺真赞。	This is great. Your cooking skill is awesome.
不过有肉没酒可不行，该去哪里找些酒来呢？	But we need some wine to go along with the meat. Where can we find wine?
我们的船上有，不过船上的酒是薇薇放的，得去问薇薇才能知道具体在哪。	We have some wine on our ship. But I need to ask Vivi where she stores them.
薇薇，你知道船上的酒放在哪里吗？	Vivi, do you know where the wine bottles are stored on the ship?

得了胜利，高兴得哭了啊？单细胞生物还真快乐，算了~总之，先对你说一声辛苦了。	You cry of happiness, just for one victory? Simple-minded organisms live so happily. Anyway, I want to say you did a good job.
你说我高兴得哭了？你们知道什么啊！你们是什么人？	What do you know of us? Who are you?
我是Mr.3，请原谅我用代号称呼自己，我是一个造型艺术家，还有你已经被我们逮捕了。(布洛基的脚部出现大量蜡烛）	I'm Mr. 3, please forgive me for calling myself with my code. I'm an artist and you are captured by us. (Massive amounts of wax wraps around Brogy's feet) 
什么？这是什么！混蛋！（布洛基想要挣扎出去）	What's this! Damn! (Brogy struggles to escape.) 
哈哈哈，不用挣扎了，我的蜡皮的强度可是和铁想媲美的，就算是巨人族的蛮力也无能为力，沉迷于胜利的你放松了警惕！！都了这么久今天终于一分高下了，这不是挺好的嘛，就算胜利是在别人的帮助下取得的。	Hahaha, you don't need to struggle. My wax's strength can match iron, even giants like yourself cannot escape. You were too focus on the victory that you relaxed!! Isn't it great to win after dueling for so many years?! But you did get some help today.
你……莫非（布洛基想到了刚才东利的不对劲）	You…did what? (Brogy suddenly realizes previously Dorry wasn't acting himself)

混蛋，你们的目的竟然是这个！！！	Damn, your goal is to get the bounty!!!

是巴洛克的精英，这些人应该都是Mr.3的手下。	Those are the Baroque Elites, they must be Mr. 3's henchmen.

可恶，有巴洛克的精英队长发现了我们，看来我们又要陷入苦战了。	Damn, Baroque Elite Captain discovered us. It seems time to battle again.
他们来了，交给我吧，我会把他们全部打倒。	Leave it to me, I'll defeat them all.

为什么这么说，有什么发现吗？	Why did you say so? Did you discover anything?

吵什么吵啊，乔巴！（魔女用手指对着娜美的头部）38度，看来你的烧已经退了，小姑娘。	Why are you so noisy, Chopper! (Dr. Kureha points her finger at Nami's head) 38 degrees, so your fever is gone.
那匹有着蓝鼻子又会讲话的驯鹿娃娃是什么啊？	What is that blue nose Reindeer?
他怎么了吗？他的名字叫乔巴，是一批驯鹿，只不过吃了人人果实拥有了人类的能力罢了。	His name is Chopper, he was a reindeer but he ate the Human Human Fruit, that's why he can talk like human.
你们是海贼吗……有骷髅的旗子吗？	You guys are pirates? Do you have a Pirate Flag with skull?
有啊，挂在船上呢，你对海有兴趣吗？那么……我们一起出海吧！	Yes, it's hanging on our ship. Are you interested in the ocean? Then come sailing with us!
有两下子嘛，小女孩，竟然未经我许可就想诱拐驯鹿？	You want to take my reindeer away without my permission, huh? Little girl.
呵呵，勾引男人……需要许可吗？	Hehe…do I need permission to talk to a guy?
看来娜美已经没事了，总算没有白费力气。	It seems Nami is okay now, so our efforts are worthy.
丽娜医娘，发现有敌人！	Dr. Kureha, there are enemies!
里面的人注意了，本大王已经回来了，快点交出城堡！	People inside the castle, listen up! I'm your king and I'm back, hand over the castle!
没想到他竟然回来了，这下不好办了啊！	I didn't expect him to come back, that'll be trouble!
他就是这个王国以前的国王吗？	He's the former King of this country?
没错，他还带了2个护卫，那个爆炸头的叫克罗马利蒙，是以前的王国护卫军头领，头上的毛球可以发射出去，实力强劲要小心了。	Yes, and he brought 2 guards. The one with black afro is called Kuromarimo, and a magistrate under Wapol's ruling. His afro can shoot out darts, so be careful.
瓦尔波的护卫实力也不过如此。	Wapol's guard is just so so.
看来你们几个实力非常强劲嘛。	It seems you people are quite powerful. 
不过这只是瓦尔波其中一个护卫，另外一个拿着弓箭的家伙是另外一个护卫，他最擅长的就是在雪地中利用地利环境的掩护暗箭伤人。	The other guard used to be the Minister of Defense under Wapol's ruling. He's a skilled archer and expert at hiding and shooting.
又是一个卑鄙的家伙。	Another despicable guy!
为什么瓦尔波那家伙这么在意这个城堡。	Why does Wapol want this castle back?
瓦尔波在意的并不是城堡，他在意的是城堡内的兵器库，一旦让他拿到兵器再吞下去，他的实力会变得十分恐怖。	This castle has an armory which stores many strong weapons. If he gets his hands on them and swallows them, he's going to be very powerful.
原来这就是他要夺回城堡的原因。	So that's why he wants the castle.
一定不能让瓦尔波进来，否贼这个国家又要完了。	We cannot let Wapol enter, or else this kingdom will be gone.
Dr.古蕾娃，给我出来，你这个“剿灭医生”的漏网之鱼，这次我不会再放过你了！	Dr.Kureha, come out, I won't let you get away this time!
磁鼓国已经灭亡了，这里不是你们这种混蛋该来的地方，从这个国家滚出去！	Drum Kingdom is destroyed already. You should not come here. Get out of this country!
哈哈哈，本大王可是这个国家的国王，你们竟然敢对磁鼓国的一国之主撒野，该滚出去的是你们！	Hahaha, I'm the King of this Kingdom and you guys dare to disobey me. I shall expel you brats!
可恶的家伙，我去教训他。	Such a vicious monster, I'm going to teach him a lesson!
我……不想揍你！你快滚出这个国家！！	I don't want to fight! You leave quickly!
你说什么呀！乔巴！！你以为他会讲道理吗？	Chopper!! Do you think he'll reason with you?!
可是……医生说过……	But…the Doctor said…
哼！（瓦尔波一炮将乔巴打倒在地）	Bang! (Wapol shoots and knocks Chopper to the ground) 
谎话连篇，胆小如鼠的你们！！根本就不懂海贼旗的意义！你这个废物！（路飞举着海贼旗）	Scaredy cats like you guys do not understand the meaning of the pirate flag! You worthless scum! (Luffy raises the pirate flag) 
哼！这是老子的王国，看我怎么折断你那破旗帜！（瓦尔波向海贼旗开炮）	I'm going to destroy your flag! (Wapol shoots at the pirate flag) 
我怎么可能让你把它折断，骷髅旗是“信念”的象征！是折不断的！我虽然不知道这是谁的海贼旗，但是这使用生命捍卫的旗帜，所以不是随随便便插在地上的！不是你们轻易就可以折断的！！	I will not let you break it. The jolly roger is a symbol of our "will"! It can never be broken! Even though I don't know who owns this flag, but I will use my life to guard it! 
这就是海贼吗？……好厉害……	This is how pirates act? So good!
呵，路飞这家伙可真热血啊。	Luffy gets excited easily.
让你们见识下什么叫做真正的恐怖，瓦尔波狼吞虎咽工厂！	Time for you to witness true terror, Wapol's Munch-Munch Factory!
终于把瓦尔波击败了，谢谢你们，是你们拯救了整个磁鼓国。	You defeated Wapol and saved the entire Drum Kingdom.
刚才那个飞出去的人就是瓦尔波了？	You sent Wapol flying?
瓦尔波已经被我打飞了，再也不会危害这个国家了。	Wapol is sent to another island and will not endanger this Kingdom anymore.
那其他2个家伙呢？	What about the other 2 guys?
其他2个家伙都被驯鹿打败了呢，想不到驯鹿还挺厉害的！	The reindeer defeated the other two guys. I didn't expect him to be so good.
嘿嘿。这样夸我，我会不好意思的。	He-he, thanks, but I wasn't that good.
蓝鼻子……（多尔顿仔细回忆）你就是那时候跟随庸医的野人？	Blue nose… (Dalton starts remembering) You’re the strange creature who followed the quack doctor?
啊！！（乔巴快速逃离现场）	Ah!! (Chopper quickly escapes) 
加入我们吧，乔巴，我们需要你这样的船医伙伴。	Join us, Chopper, our ship needs a doctor like you.
我很感谢你们，可是我是驯鹿啊，我长着角，有蹄子，还有蓝鼻子！	Thank you for the offer, but I'm a reindeer with horns, hoof, and blue nose!
我是很想做海贼，可是我不是人类的伙伴，我是怪物，我做不了你们的伙伴！	I want to be a pirate, but I'm a monster and cannot be friends with humans!
少嗦！！！跟我们走吧！！	Just follow us!
……你们。	…you guys…
乔巴。哭哭啼啼的算什么！要像个男子汉！	Chopper, stop crying and act like a man!!

哈哈，这才对嘛，以后我们就是伙伴了！	That's right. From now on, we'll be companions!
谢谢你们，磁鼓国一定会获得新生的！！	Thank you. Drum Kingdom will be reborn!!
（天空中绽放了粉红色的樱花）哇，好美……粉红色的雪。	(Pink sakura explodes in the sky) Wow, so beautiful…pink snow…
呜呜呜呜……医生……丽娜医娘……这就是医生30年得出的结果！	Sob...Dr. Kureha…this took Dr. Hiluluk's 30 years to develop!
路线没有问题，应该快到了。	The route is right, we should arrive soon.
恩，穿过这条海岸，我们应该就能到阿拉巴斯坦的边缘了！	After passing through this area, we'll reach the edge of Alabasta Kingdom!
哈哈，兜了这么大一个圈子终于快到了，薇薇你放心吧，我们会帮助你拯救国家的。	We'll finally get there. Vivi, don't worry, we'll help you save your kingdom.
谢谢你们，不过这一带听说海兽泛滥，经常传出海兽袭击过往船只的消息，你们要小心了	Thank you. But I heard that many sea monsters lived in this area and attacked passing ships. Be careful.
来得正好，饿了4天，海兽来了正好当食物。	Good, we can catch the sea monsters as our food.
干得不错，这些食物够我们继续吃3天的了。	Good job, you've caught enough for 3 days already.
刚好肚子饿就遇上海兽，运气真不错啊，山治的厨艺还是那么赞。	We were hungry and we met the sea monsters, quite lucky. Sanji's cooking is still amazing.
那是当然，我可是海上第一流的厨师！	Of course, I'm the best chef on the sea.
嘻嘻，山治先生的厨艺可是我见过最好的。	Sanji's cooking is the best that I have ever tasted.
怎么还没有到，都已经3天了，这条海岸究竟有多远啊？快要饿死了，咕咕咕咕咕~（肚子饿的声音）	We've been travelling for 3 days yet still haven't arrived yet. I'm so hungry (Stomach growls in hunger) 
（咕咕咕咕咕~）我想应该快到了，再过1天吧。	I think maybe 1 more day and we'll reach it.
啊！出现怪物了！！！是巨大的海兽啊！	A giant sea monster!
海猫！！	Sea Cat!!
饿了三天，总算有东西吃了！我的食物！	My food! Finally, after 3 days' starving!
哇，它想逃走啊~	It's going to escape!
别让它逃了，一定要抓住它！！	We have to catch it!!
（将所有人打倒在地）住手！！！（海猫逃跑了）	(Vivi knocks everyone to the ground) Stop!!! (Sea Cat escapes) 
为……为什么啊，薇薇？食物，逃跑了……	Why? Our food…
不能吃它！！因为在阿拉巴斯坦，海猫是神圣的动物！	Don't eat it!! In Alabasta Kingdom, Sea Cat is considered to be holy creature!
原来是这样……	Oh…I see.
你们快看，前方出现了城市！	Look, a city just appears ahead!
那么，上岸吧，朝着饭馆前进！！	Let's land and find a restaurant!!
原来你们是远道而来的冒险者啊，这些饭菜是我刚做的，你们尝尝看。	To welcome faraway adventurers, I cooked some food for you guys, come and try.
（狼吞虎咽吃完了所有的饭菜）谢谢你的款待！	(Wolf down all the food) Thank you for the treat!
嘻嘻~不客气~，你们是外来的冒险者，我可要提醒你们在沙漠里可是危机重重的，无知会丧命的，最近沙漠中好像又多了一些奇怪的生物，好多冒险者都遇害了。	You're welcome. Since you guys are new here, I want to remind you guys that there are many strange creatures in the sand and they might be the one who killed all the missing adventurers.
竟然有这样的事，我们会去解决这些生物的，就当这些饭菜的报酬吧~	We'll get rid of these creatures as a way to repay for the food.
你们量力而行，那些生物据说十分强大，如果不行马上退回来，生命才是最重要的。	You guys shouldn't go overboard. If you cannot defeat them, then retreat immediately. Don't put your life in danger.
知道了，多谢老板娘的提醒。	Yes, thank you for the reminder.
虽然你们很强力，但是要对付那些沙漠中的生物还是很勉强吧。	You guys are good, but was it hard to defeat those creatures?
虽然麻烦了一些，不过我们还是打败了那些生物！	It was, but we still defeated them.
那我可镇小看了你们，既然你们这么强力，那件事可能就有办法了……	Since you guys are so powerful, then you'll be able to deal with that problem…
什么事？	What problem?
最近村外老是听到一些奇怪的声音，麻烦你们去调查一下。	We frequently hear strange noises coming from outside the village. Can you go investigate?
放心吧，交给我们就行了。	No problem.
原来……那只是一群学功夫的海牛。	It was just a group of Kung-fu dugongs who want to learn Kong Fu.
不过路飞打败了那群海牛，那群海牛拼命要拜路飞为师。	Luffy defeated those dugongs, so they really want to be Luffy's apprentices.
嘻嘻~原来那些海牛那么可爱。，真也想一只当宠物啊。薇薇好像有发现，正在找你们，你们快去吧。	Ha-ha…the dugongs are very cute, I wish I can keep one as pet. Vivi discovered something and she's looking for you. Go quickly.
薇薇？难道她出什么事了吗，？我们会赶到她面前的。	Vivi? Did something happen to her? We'll go now.
薇薇，有什么发现吗？	Vivi, did you discover something?
我发现港口巡逻的海军数量有些超乎平常，以前这边可没有这么多海军。	I discovered that there were more marines than usual at the harbor.
难道……是他们发现了我们，来抓我们的吗？	Did they spot us and want to capture us?
也不排除这个可能，总之我们要注意这些巡逻的海军。	Maybe, so we should pay attention to the Patrolling Marines.
为什么这群海军会攻击我们！难道克洛克达尔连海军也能控制了吗！如果是这样就太可怕了。	Why would these Marines attack us?! Are they under Crocodile's control also? 
看来这些海军的目标就是我们了，不管原因是什么，我们必须逃出海军的追捕。	It seems these Marines' target is us. Don’t know why, but we must escape.
如果被海军抓住，我的国家可就完了啊。	If we're captured by the Marines, then my country can be saved.
放心吧，薇薇，我们不会被抓住的。	Don't worry! We won't be captured.
看，那个海军的小头目在那边巡逻。	The Marine Captain is patrolling over there.
这家伙看起来好像是这群海军的首领。	He looks like the leader of this group.
恩，看他的样子在发号施令，只要击败他应该就能知道些原因了吧。	Let's defeat him and find out why.
他过来了，一定是发现了我们，准备战斗！	He's coming over! Prepare to battle!
终于成功从海军中突围出来了，这群海军还真是阴魂不散！	We finally manage to escape from the Marines.
看这群海军的服装，不像是阿拉巴斯坦的海军啊。	Looking at the Marine's uniform, they are not from Alabasta Kingdom.
得找个人去问问情况才能了解一切。	We need to find someone to ask for more info.
村长，这附近为什么出现了大量的海军一直在巡逻？	Mayor, why are there so many Marines patrolling nearby?
你们一定是刚到此地吧，这些海军是几天前刚登陆这边的，来自罗格镇，据说是来抓捕草帽一伙的。	You guys must have just arrived. These marines came from Loguetown to capture the Straw Hat Pirates.
什么！竟然是罗格镇的海军！	They are the Loguetown's Marine?!
对啊，只是他们千里迢迢进入伟大航线只是为了抓捕草帽一伙，看来这个草帽不一般啊。	Yes, they enter the Grand Line just to capture the Straw Hat Pirates, so it seems the Straw Hat Pirates are really special.
没想到你们就是草帽一伙，旁边那个女孩为什么我觉得这么眼熟。	So you guys are the Straw Hat pirates, why does that girl look so familiar?
你好，村长，我是奈菲鲁塔丽・薇薇。	Hello, I'm Nefertari Vivi.
什么！公……公主殿下……拜见公主。	Princess Nefertari! Y…your majesty...You humble me with your presence!
免礼了，这些人是我的朋友，他们救了我，那些海军是什么情况？	These people are my friends and they rescued me. What's the situation with the Marines?
原来如此，那些海军是由一名叫做达斯琪的年轻上士带领的，这次来的目的是抓捕草帽一伙。	Those marines are led by a young Master Chief Petty Officer name Tashigi and their purpose is to catch the Straw Hat Pirates.
竟然是达斯琪……看来麻烦了。	So Tashigi is here…this will be troublesome…
达斯琪上士也被打败了，他们一定会发动更多的海军来追捕你们的。	Master Chief Petty Officer Tashigi is defeated by you. They'll send more marines to capture you.
没关系，我们才不怕海军。	No problem, we're not afraid of the Marine.
薇薇公主正在港口等着你们，你们快去找她吧，路上一定要保护好公主。	Princess Vivi is waiting for you at the harbor. Go and find her. Remember to protect the Princess.
明白了，我们会保护薇薇的。	Yes, we'll protect Vivi.
这些罗格镇的海军到底是怎么一回事？	Why are the marines from Loguetown chasing after you guys?
罗格镇是我们到达伟大航路前的最后一站，我们在那遭到了海军上校斯摩格的追捕，被神秘人帮助逃脱了追捕，没想到他们竟然追进了伟大航路。	Loguetown was our last stop before entering the Grand Line. Marine Captain Smoker was trying to capture us, but a mysterious person helped us to escape. I didn't expect them to enter the Grand Line just to capture us.
原来是这样，这群海军还真是不放弃啊。	So the marines won't give up easily.
不好，海军又来了，我去解决他们。	The marines are after us again. Let me deal with them.
海军都被解决了，我们该离开这了。	We should leave here soon.
趁早离开这，我可不想碰到其他的海军了。	Yes, we should leave soon, I don't want to meet other marines.
怎么啦？那些海军很强大吗？	Are those marines really powerful?
那个叫斯摩格的烟鬼可是十分恐怖的，以前可是打的我们毫无还手之力呢。	Smoker the Hunter is really amazing, previously we could not defend against him at all.
听说这次带队就是斯摩格。	The rumor says the leader this time is Smoker.
等等……这次带队的是斯摩格上校，达斯琪已经出现了，斯摩格也一定在这附近。	The leader is Captain Smoker...Tashigi appeared already, Smoker must be near.
斯摩格上校有那么恐怖吗？	Captain Smoker is that terrifying?
那家伙在罗格镇可打得我们毫无还手之力，不过现在我们成长了，想轻松擒下我们可没那么容易了。	We lost to Smoker at Loguetown. But we've grown stronger since then and will not be captured so easily.
干得不错，追击的海军都已经被打败了。	Good job, you've defeated all the Marines.
那烟鬼果然还是那么强力，差点就被打败了。	Smoker is still amazing, I almost lost to him.
我们启程前往约巴，现在去和村长告别。	Let's go to Yuba, I'm going to say good bye to the Mayor.
恩，我们出发吧！	Yes, let's go.
村长，我们要走了，我现在要赶往约巴阻止叛乱军。	We're going to Yuba to stop the Rebel Army.
约巴……那个城市已经不存在了，3年前那边就断了水源，而且一直遭受沙尘暴的袭击，城市一点点被淹没，绿洲早就看不到了。	Yuba…due to the three year draught, it was deserted by everyone. It was destroyed even more by the sandstorm. 
那边的物资流通也停止了，叛乱军的持久战也没法继续下去，现在叛乱军将大本营迁往了卡特莱雅了，这些愚蠢的家伙，叛乱实在太愚蠢了，那些叛乱军……拜托了！！公主，请你制止他们。	Because of supplies shortage, the Rebels have moved to Katorea. Those Rebel Army are crazy…Please!! Princess, please stop them.
别担心，村长，我一定会制止他们的！	Don't worry, I'll stop them.
叛乱军竟然迁移了大本营，看来计划要改变了。	Rebel Army has moved its base, then our plan needs to change.
我们马上赶往阿鲁巴拿去阻止叛乱军吧！	Let's go to Alubarna to stop the Rebel Army!
制止了想叛乱的家伙后，能制止得了鳄鱼吗？就算去了那个城市，我们也无能为力，谁会来听海贼们的劝说呢？	After we stop the rebel, can we stop crocodile? Even if we do go to Rebel Army's Base, who would Believe a bunch of pirates?
……那个……	….but…
你不希望在这场战斗中……有任何人死去！！包括那些国民还是我们这些海贼！！可我们的对手是“七武海”的海贼，又是100万人的战斗，你却希望大家平安无事！！你也太天真了！！	In your mind, you think things will be just fine as long as nobody dies. The citizens, Rebels, even us. Even though you are up against one of the Royal Shichibukai, in the midst of civil war involving millions of people, you're still hoping for everyone to be alright! Don't you think that's naive?
这有什么不对？！我希望大家都不死，这有什么错？！（薇薇情绪十分激动）	So what if that's the case, what's exactly wrong with wishing no one would die?! (Vivi is very emotional) 
人是会死的！	…People die!
（愤怒的打了路飞）住嘴！！不许再说这种话！！你要再敢说的话，我饶不了你！！我们在不正是要去阻止这场悲剧吗？叛乱军也好！国王军也好，这个国家的人都没有错！！为什么一定要有人死去呢，这全是鳄鱼的错！！	(Angrily hits Luffy) Don't you ever say that to me again or I won't forgive you!! That's exactly what I'm trying so hard to prevent! The Rebels! The Royalist Forces and even the citizens! None of them did anything wrong, so why do they have to die? The only one at fault here is Crocodile!

Even I can tell from a single glance, about what needs to be done the most in this country!! You think risking your life alone is gonna be enough?!

这边是历史悠久的沙漠，有些大沙丘甚至超过300米高，而且沙漠中还有食人花，食人花长期潜伏在地底，一旦有人不小心踩到它的嘴里，就会迅速从地底出现吃掉旅客。	This is a historical desert with some sand dunes over 300 meters tall. The desert also has Man-Eating Plants which hide underground. If you accidentally step on it, it'll quickly come out and swallow you.

明白了，我会小心的。	Ok, I will be careful.

你们来了，薇薇公主你快前往皇宫去阻止内乱吧，寇杀的叛乱军就快到达阿鲁巴拿了。	Princess Vivi, please go to the Kingdom first. Rebel Army is coming to Alubama.

Mr.1是快斩果实的能力者，能够将全身变成坚硬如铁的刀刃，并能将接触到的所有东西都斩断！	Mr.1 has the power of Dice-Dice Fruit and capable of turning his body parts into steel blades that can cut off anything he touches.
他原本是西海的赏金猎人，不过现在被克洛克达尔招募成为手下，他能将所有东西都斩成灰尘，据说没有一位自称剑士的人能够伤害到他。	He was a bounty hunter from the West sea and now a Senior Officer under Crocodile. He is capable of smashing everything into dust. It is said that no Swordsman can hurt him. 
索隆的目标可是要成为世界第一剑豪，他一定可以斩断钢铁的。	Zoro will be the best Swordsman in the world. He can cut steel for sure.
