2017年7月	
纯物理伤害对水手和索隆无效，纯技力伤害对甚平无效，普攻对卡库无效，奥义对路飞无效。船员会复活。	Sailor and Zoro are immune to pure phy. DMG, Jinbe immune to pure SP DMG, Kaku immune to normal attack, Luffy immune to Ogi and crews can revive.
纯物理伤害对罗宾无效，纯技力伤害对汉库克无效，纯物理伤害和纯技力伤害对青雉无效，奥义对莫利亚无效，普攻对暗术士无效。	Robin is immune to pure phy. DMG, Hancock immune to pure SP DMG, Aokiji immune to both pure phy. DMG and pure SP DMG, Moria immune to Ogi and Dark Mage immune to normal attack.
纯物理伤害对多弗朗明哥无效，纯技力伤害对奥拉G无效，普攻对狙击手无效，弗兰奇有嘲讽能力。	Doflamingo is immune to pure phy. DMG, Lao G immune to pure SP DMG, Sniper immune to normal attack and Franky can Taunt.
纯物理伤害对船医无效，纯物理伤害和纯技力伤害对乔巴无效，普攻对于娜美和卡普无效，奥义对于白星无效。	Doctor is immune to pure phy. DMG, Chopper immune to both pure phy. DMG and pure SP DMG, Nami and Garp immune to normal attack while Shirahoshi immune to Ogi.
纯物理伤害对汉库克和佩罗娜无效，纯技力伤害对青雉和佩罗娜无效，普攻对甚平和青雉无效，奥义对于艾尼路无效.	Hancock and Perona are immune to pure phy. DMG, Aokiji and Perona immune to pure SP DMG,  Jinbe and Aokiji immune to normal attack while Enel immune to Ogi.
纯物理伤害对赤犬和艾斯无效，纯技力伤害对罗宾无效，普攻对于莫利亚无效，奥义对赤犬和白星无效。	Akainu and Ace are immune to pure phy. DMG, Robin immune to pure SP DMG, Moria immune to normal attack while Akainu and Shirahoshi immune to Ogi.
纯物理伤害对黄猿、弗兰奇和闪电无效，奥义对于闪电和乌索普无效，普攻对于黄猿无效。	Kizaru, Franky and Inazuma are immune to pure phy. DMG, Usopp and Inazuma immune to Ogi while Kizaru immune to normal attack.
纯物理伤害对乔兹、卡普和索隆无效，奥义对于山治索隆无效，普攻对卡普无效。	Jozu, Garp and Zoro are immune to pure phy. DMG, Sanji and Zoro immune to Ogi while Garp immune to normal attack.
纯物理伤害对战国、黄猿、卡库和鹰眼无效，纯技力伤害对维尔戈和卡库无效，奥义对黄猿无效，普攻对于战国和鹰眼无效。	Sengoku, Kizaru, Kaku and Mihawk are immune to pure phy. DMG, Vergo and Kaku immune to pure SP DMG, Kizaru immune to Ogi while Sengoku and Mihawk immune to normal attack.
纯物理伤害和纯技力伤害对赤犬、路飞和汉库克无效，普攻对黄猿、赤犬路飞无效。	Akainu, Luffy, Hancock are immune to pure phy. DMG and pure SP DMG while Kizaru, Akainu and Luffy are immune to normal attack.
纯物理伤害对狙击手和弗兰奇无效，纯技力伤害对汉库克无效，奥义对狙击手和乌索普无效，普攻对于狙击手无效，弗兰奇有嘲讽能力。	Sniper and Franky are immune to pure phy. DMG, Hancock immune to pure SP DMG, Usopp and Sniper immune to Ogi, Sniper immune to normal attack and Franky can Taunt.
纯物理伤害对于熊无效，纯技力伤害对于路飞无效，奥义对水手和鹰眼无效，普攻对熊无效，同时熊具有嘲讽能力。	Bartholomew Kuma is immune to pure phy. DMG, Luffy immune to pure SP DMG, Sailor and Mihawk immune to Ogi, Bartholomew Kuma immune to normal attack and he can Taunt.
纯物理伤害和奥义对于弗兰奇、乌索普和娜美无效，普攻对于罗宾和乔巴无效，纯技力伤害对乔巴无效。	Franky, Usopp, and Nami are immune to pure phy. DMG, Robin and Chopper immune to normal attack while Chopper immune to pure SP DMG.
纯物理伤害对布鲁克、多弗朗明哥和鹰眼无效，纯技力伤害对特拉法尔加・罗和鹰眼无效，奥义对多弗朗明哥无效，普攻对甚平无效。	Brook, Doflamingo and Mihawk are immune to pure phy. DMG, Trafalgar Law and Mihawk immune to pure SP DMG, Doflamingo immune to Ogi while Jinbe immune to normal attack.
纯物理伤害对黄猿、山治和乌索普无效，纯技力伤害布鲁克无效，奥义对黄猿和乌索普无效，普攻对山治无效。	Kizaru, Sanji and Usopp are immune to pure phy. DMG, Brook immune to pure SP DMG, Kizaru and Usopp immune to Ogi while Sanji immune to normal attack.。
纯物理伤害对于黄猿、罗宾、麦哲伦无效，奥义对黄猿、罗宾和莫利亚无效，普攻对于赤犬和麦哲伦无效。	Kizaru, Robin and Magellan are immune to pure phy. DMG. Kizaru, Robin and Moria are immune to Ogi while Akainu and Magellan are immune to normal attack.
纯物理伤害对所有船员都无效，奥义对卡普无效，普攻对于熊无效，熊有嘲讽能力。	All crews are immune to pure phy. DMG, Garp immune to Ogi, Bartholomew Kuma immune to normal attack and he can Taunt.
纯物理伤害对卡普、维尔戈和索隆无效，奥义对卡普无效，普攻对战国无效。	Vergo, Garp and Zoro are immune to pure phy. DMG, Garp immune to Ogi while Sengoku immune to normal attack.
纯物理伤害对青雉、黄猿、赤犬无效，纯技力伤害对赤犬和熊无效，奥义对青雉无效，普攻对黄猿和鹰眼无效。	Aokiji, Kizaru and Akainu are immune to pure phy. DMG, Akinu and Bartholomew Kuma immune to pure SP DMG, Aokiji immune to Ogi while Kizaru and Mihawk immune to normal attack.
纯物理伤害对于黄猿，战国和卡普无效，普攻对青雉、黄猿、战国无效，奥义对赤犬和卡普无效。	Kizaru, Sengoku and Garp are immune to pure phy. DMG. Aokiji，Kizaru and Sengoku are immune to normal attack. Akainu and Garp are immune to Ogi.
*每日登录游戏可免费领取一次奖励。每次奖励内容都包含5个宝库钥匙，仅限当天领取。<br />*你也可以以每次100钻石的价格来提前领取后续的奖励。	*Log in every day to claim rewards once for free. Each reward contains 5 Treasure House keys and can be claimed within the same day you log in only. <br />*You can spend 100 Diamonds each time to claim next rewards in advance.
*使用宝库钥匙开启宝库，宝库每次开启持续30分钟，若宝库钥匙不足可用20点券或钻石代替，时间结束后宝库自动关闭。<br />*宝库开启期间如对宝库内容不满意，可以使用宝库钥匙或20点券/钻石刷新宝库内容。	*Treasure House key can be used to open Treasure House for 30 minutes each time. You can use 20 Coupons or Diamonds instead if your keys are insufficient. When time is up, Treasure House will close. <br />*You can use 20 Coupons or Diamonds to refresh treasure if you aren't satisfied with current items when Treasure House is open.
※活动期间每日参与剧情/精英/组队副本、竞技场、夺宝奇兵、日常任务、悬赏任务、钓鱼都有概率获得藏宝图。<br />※每消费50钻石可获得1个藏宝图。<br />※藏宝图可用于OP20周年庆挖宝活动，可以挖到宝库钥匙、各种稀有道具、贝利等丰富宝藏。<br />※藏宝图仅在活动期间有效，活动结束后，未使用的藏宝图将清零	※You have chances to obtain treasure map if you join Story battle, Elite Battle, Team Battles, Arena, Treasure Hunter, Daily Tasks, Bounty Task, Fishing during event. <br />※You will obtain 1 treasure map from every 50 diamonds you spend. <br />※Treasure map can be used in One Piece 20th Anniversary event to find Treasure House key, rare items and Beli. <br />※Treasure map is only valid during event. Unused treasure maps will be cleared after event.
*活动期间玩家充值钻石的数量会进行累计并进入排行榜，仅排名在前50的玩家可以获得奖励，奖励将在活动结束后通过邮件形式发放。<br />*称号及船员礼包奖励需要玩家活动期间内充值钻石达到一定数量才可获取，若活动期间内充值钻石不足则只可获取基本奖励 	*Players who top up during event will be recorded in Top-Up rankings. Top 50 will get rewards via in-game mail after event.  <br />*Title and crew fragments giftpack will be sent when you top up required diamonds. Only basic rewards will be sent if your top-up amount is insufficient.

受到物理伤害时, 使攻击者<font color="#00EC00">燃烧</font>1回合，并提升自己2%的技力和抗性。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后每次受到物理伤害提升4%技力和抗性，且每回合首次行动前恢复基于自身技力属性的生命值</font>	After receiving phy. damage, <font color=""#00EC00"">Burn</font> the attacker for 1 round and increase self SP and RES by 2%. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can  awake: after skill awaking, increase self SP and RES by 4% after receiving phy. damage. Each round before taking first action, restore HP based on self SP.</font>
受到物理伤害时, 使攻击者<font color="#00EC00">燃烧</font>1回合，并提升自身4%的技力和抗性，且每回合首次行动前恢复基于自身技力属性的生命值。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后受到物理伤害时有20%概率获得<font color="#00EC00">铁块</font>1回合</font>	After receiving phy. damage,  <font color=""#00EC00"">Burn</font> the attacker for 1 round and increase self SP and RES by 4%. Each round before taking first action, restore HP based on self SP.<br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, have 20% chance to obtain <font color="#00EC00">Tekkai</font> buff for </font>1 round</font> after receiving phy. damage.
受到物理伤害时, 使攻击者<font color="#00EC00">燃烧</font>1回合，并提升自身4%的技力和抗性，同时有20%概率获得<font color="#00EC00">铁块</font>1回合，且每回合首次行动前恢复基于自身技力属性的生命值，	After receiving phy. damage, <font color=""#00EC00"">Burn</font> the attacker for 1 round and increase self SP and RES by 4%. Have 20% chances to obtain <font color="#00EC00">Tekkai</font> buff for 1 round. Each round before taking first action, restore HP based on self SP.
战斗开始时，敌方阵营所有<font color="#00EC00">海贼</font>标签的船员释放奥义时<font color="#00EC00">怒气消耗增加100%</font>持续2回合。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后作用范围为全阵营所有船员</font>	When battle starts, all <font color=""#00EC00"">Pirate</font> tag enemies consume <font color=""#00EC00"">Double Fury</font> when casting Ogi, lasting for 2 rounds." <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, effect applies to all enemies.</font>
战斗开始时，敌方阵营所有船员释放奥义时<font color="#00EC00">怒气消耗增加100%</font>持续2回合。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后赤犬血量越少，受到伤害越低</font>	When battle starts, all enemies consume <font color=""#00EC00"">Double Fury</font> when casting Ogi, lasting for 2 rounds. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, the less Akainu's remaining HP, the less damage he will receive. </font>
战斗开始时，敌方阵营所有船员释放奥义时<font color="#00EC00">怒气消耗增加100%</font>持续2回合。且赤犬血量越少，受到伤害越低。（每少1%血量，受到伤害减少0.8%）	When battle starts, all enemies consume <font color=""#00EC00"">Double Fury</font> when casting Ogi, lasting for 2 rounds. The less Akainu's remaining HP, the less damage he will receive. (Every 1% HP reduction decreases 0.8% damage received.)
每回合<font color="#00EC00">闪避</font>第一次受到的奥义或普攻，并反弹所有受到的负面状态给随机敌人。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后黄猿每回合首次行动前，使己方小队随机1人获得额外普攻</font>	<font color="#00EC00">Dodge</font> the first Ogi or Normal attack every round and rebound all Debuffs to random enemies. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, each round before taking first action, a random ally obtains an extra normal attack chance.</font>
每回合<font color="#00EC00">闪避</font>第一次受到的奥义或普攻，并反弹所有受到的负面状态给随机敌人，每回合首次行动前，使已方小队随机1人获得额外普攻。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后黄猿每回合首次行动前，使己方小队随机2人获得额外普攻</font>	<font color="#00EC00">Dodge</font> the first Ogi or Normal attack every round and rebounce all Debuffs to random enemies. Each round before taking first action, a random ally obtains an extra normal attack chance. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, each round before taking first action, 2 random allies obtain an extra normal attack chance.
每回合<font color="#00EC00">闪避</font>第一次受到的奥义或普攻，并反弹所有受到的负面状态给随机敌人，每回合首次行动前，使已方小队随机2人获得额外普攻。	<font color="#00EC00">Dodge</font> the first Ogi or Normal attack damage every round and rebounce all Debuffs to random enemies. Each round before taking first action, 2 random allies obtain an extra normal attack chance.
战斗开始时，对敌方阵营速度比黄猿低的船员进行<font color="#00EC00">标记</font> 5回合，且黄猿对速度低于自己的敌人造成伤害提高20%。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后若目标处于标记状态，黄猿的最终伤害将提升30%</font>	When battle starts, <font color="#00EC00">Mark</font> all enemies with lower Agility than Kizaru for 5 rounds and deal 20% more damage to them. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, kizaru deals extra 30% more damage to marked targets.</font>
战斗开始时，对敌方阵营速度比黄猿低的船员进行<font color="#00EC00">标记</font> 5回合，且黄猿对速度低于自己的敌人造成伤害提高20%，若目标处于标记状态则黄猿造成最终伤害额外提升30%。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后黄猿免疫纯物理伤害和纯技力伤害</font>	When battle starts, <font color="#00EC00">Mark</font> all enemies with lower Agility than Kizaru for 5 rounds and deal 56% more damage to them. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, Kizaru is immune to pure Phy. DMG or pure SP DMG.</font>
战斗开始时，对敌方阵营速度比黄猿低的船员进行<font color="#00EC00">标记</font> 5回合，且黄猿对速度低于自己的敌人造成伤害提高20%，若目标处于标记状态则黄猿造成最终伤害额外提升30%，同时黄猿自身免疫纯物理伤害和纯技力伤害。	When battle starts, <font color="#00EC00">Mark</font> all enemies with lower Agility than Kizaru for 5 rounds and deal 56% more damage to them. Meanwhile, Kizaru is immune to pure Phy. DMG or pure SP DMG.
	
	
对正面敌人造成双属性伤害<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后对小行敌人造成双属性伤害</font>	Deal Phy. DMG and SP DMG to the enemy in front.<br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, deal Phy.DMG and SP DMG to enemies in a horizontal row.</font>
对正面敌人造成双属性伤害<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后有30%的概率造成<font color="#00EC00">冰冻</font>1回合</font>	Deal Phy. DMG and SP DMG to the enemy in front.<br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, have 30% chances to <font color="#00EC00">Freeze</font> targets for 1 round</font>
对正面敌人造成双属性伤害并造成无法驱散的<font color="#00EC00">标记/font>2回合<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后可驱散敌人身上护盾及所有增益buff</font>	Deal Phy. DMG and SP DMG to enemy in front and cast undispellable <font color="#00EC00">Mark</font> to targets for 2 rounds.<br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, dispel enemies' shield and all Buffs.</font>
	
对敌方阵营至多12人造成伤害，并附带无视状态免疫且无法驱散的<font color="#00EC00">强化燃烧 </font>1 回合. <br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后强化燃烧持续2回合</font>	Deal damage to at most 12 enemies and cast <font color=""#00EC00"">Burn II </font> for 1 round, which ignores enemies' immunity and can't be dispelled.<br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, Burn II lasts for 2 rounds.</font>
驱散敌方全阵营船员身上的护盾和所有增益状态，同时对他们造成<font color="#00EC00">冻僵</font>2回合 (速度降低 30%), 再次使用将释放“冰河时代”对敌方阵营至多12人造成伤害，若目标处于 <font color="#00EC00">冻僵 </font>则必定造成<font color="#00EC00">冰冻</font>1回合。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后“冰河时代”范围改为全阵营所有船员</font>	Dispel all enemies' shield and Buffs and cast <font color="#00EC00">Frost</font> to decrease 30% agility for 2 rounds. When Ogi is activated again, release “Ice Age”to deal DMG to at most 12 enemies. <font color="#00EC00">Frost</font> target must <font color="#00EC00">freeze</font> for a round. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, 'Ice Age' applies to all enemies.</font>

展开闪光结界持续2回合. 结界存在期间大幅度提升我方小队成员 <font color="#00EC00">闪避</font>, 并在每个大回合开始增加己方100点怒气。结界存在期间黄猿受到物理伤害时，<font color="#00EC00">标记</font>攻击者2回合. 再次使用将取消结界并释放<font color="#00EC00">八尺琼勾玉</font> 对选定目标和敌方阵营中至多9个 <font color="#00EC00"> 被标记</font> 的目标造成双属性伤害。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后奥义变为瞬发，八尺琼勾玉对敌方全阵营9人造成双属性伤害</font>	Cast Glitter Field for 2 rounds to greatly increase allies' <font color=""#00EC00"">Dodge</font> and add 100 Fury for self side at the start of each round. If Kizaru receives Phy. damage when Glitter Field exists, <font color=""#00EC00"">Mark</font> the attacker for 2 rounds. When Ogi is activated again, remove Field and cast <font color="#00EC00">Yasakani no Magatama</font> to deal Phy. DMG and SP DMG to at most  9 <font color="#00EC00"> Marked</font> enemies. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, Glitter Field will be instantly cast and Yasakani no Magatama deals Phy. DMG and SP DMG to 9 enemies.</font>
对选定目标和敌方阵营中至多9个 <font color="#00EC00"> 被标记</font> 的目标造成双属性伤害。	Deal Phy. DMG and SP DMG to at most 9 <font color="#00EC00">Marked</font> enemies.
	
对小行目标敌人造成双属性伤害。	Deal Phy. DMG and SP DMG to enemies in a horizontal row.

驱散敌方全阵营船员身上的护盾和所有增益状态，同时对他们造成<font color="#00EC00">冻僵</font>2回合 (速度降低 30%), 再次使用将释放“冰河时代”对敌方阵营所有船员造成伤害，若目标处于 <font color="#00EC00">冻僵 </font>则必定造成<font color="#00EC00">冰冻</font>1回合。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后“冰河时代”对为冻僵的船员有20%概率造成无视状态免疫的<font color="#00EC00">强化冰冻 </font>1回合</font>	Dispel all enemies' shield and Buffs and cast <font color="#00EC00">Frost</font> to decrease 30% agility for 2 rounds. 展开闪光结界持续2回合. 结界存在期间大幅度提升我方小队成员 <font color="#00EC00">闪避</font>, 并在每个大回合开始增加己方100点怒气。结界存在期间黄猿受到物理伤害时，<font color="#00EC00">标记</font>攻击者2回合. 再次使用将取消结界并释放<font color="#00EC00">八尺琼勾玉</font> 对敌方阵营中至多9个目标造成双属性伤害。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒：觉醒后展开结界时附加结界开启效果：使我方全小队可必定闪避第一次受到的普攻或奥义，并清除小队所有船员负面状态</font>	Cast Glitter Field for 2 rounds to greatly increase self team allies' <font color=""#00EC00"">Dodge</font> and add 100 Fury for self side at the start of each round. If Kizaru receives Phy. damage when Glitter Field exists, <font color=""#00EC00"">Mark</font> the attacker for 2 rounds. When Ogi is activated again, remove Field and cast <font color="#00EC00">Yasakani no Magatama</font> to deal Phy. DMG and SP DMG to at most 9 <font color="#00EC00"> Marked</font> enemies. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after skill awaking, when Glitter field is activated, allies in self team must dodge the first normal attack or Ogi and clear all Debuffs.</font>
展开闪光结界持续2回合. 展开结界时附加结界开启效果：使我方全小队可必定闪避第一次受到的普攻或奥义，并清除小队所有船员负面状态，结界存在期间大幅度提升我方小队成员 <font color="#00EC00">闪避</font>, 并在每个大回合开始增加己方100点怒气。结界存在期间黄猿受到物理伤害时，<font color="#00EC00">标记</font>攻击者2回合. 再次使用将取消结界并释放<font color="#00EC00">八尺琼勾玉</font> 对敌方阵营中至多9个目标造成双属性伤害。	Glitter field lasts for 2 rounds. When Glitter field is activated, allies must dodge the first normal attack or Ogi and clear all Debuffs. When Glitter Field exists, greatly increase <font color="#00EC00">Dodge</font> and add 100 Fury for self team at the start of each round. If Kizaru receives Phy. damage when Glitter Field exists, <font color=""#00EC00"">Mark</font> the attacker for 2 rounds. When Ogi is activated again, remove Field and cast <font color="#00EC00">Yasakani no Magatama</font> to deal Phy. DMG and SP DMG to at most 9 <font color="#00EC00"> Marked</font> enemies.

战斗开始时已方小队船员提升20%的攻击和技力持续5回合，战国释放奥义时根据【海军】标签人数回复人数*10的怒气。战斗中已方小队在伤害结算时若怒气值高于10点则会额外提升伤害加成，每多10点怒气值增加5%伤害加成。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒： 觉醒后战斗开始时提升全小队30%的攻击与技力</font>	When battle starts, increase all allies' ATK and SP by 20% for 5 rounds. When Sengoku use Ogi, restore fury by 10* the number of marine tag allies. Every 10 fury that exceeds 10, your team gain extra 5% damage bonus in battle. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after awakening, increase all allies' ATK and SP by 30% when battle starts.</font>

玩法规则：\n1.深海大监狱一共分为6层，每一层由30个守卫把守。击败全部守卫可以进入下一层。\n2.每天可免费闯关1次，每次闯关有3次尝试机会。\n3.击败守卫后有概率获得宝箱和船件升品材料。	Rules:\n1. The Great Underwater Prison is divided into 6 levels. Each level is guarded by 30 guards. Defeat all the guards to enter the next level.\n2. There is a free chance for challenge per day.\n3. Chests and ship part improvement materials can be looted from defeated guards.

高级积分	Adv. Point
*八月的天空下起了雨，你需要控制路飞左右移动来尽可能多的躲避雨水。<br />*在60秒内，每存活5秒就会获得50积分，但是一旦被击中则会减少10积分并且降低你的躲避速度。被击中3次则游戏结束。<br />*如果顺利存活60秒则将进入15秒的加时阶段，此时暴雨来袭，使得雨下得更快。加时阶段被击中1次则游戏结束，如果顺利存活，则会额外获得900积分。<br />*每天不限游戏次数，但最多只能获得1500积分。	*The August storm is coming, players need to control Luffy to dodge the rain.<br />*During 1 min, player can get 50 points when surviving for 5 sec. Once hit, player's Points will be decreased by 10 and the speed to escape will slow down. If players are hit 3 times, the event will end.<br />*If players aren't hit within 1 min, the event will add 15 sec and players can continue. During the 15 sec, if players are hit once, the event will end. If players survive the 15 sec, players can obtain extra 900 Points. <br />*Chances to join are unlimited, and player can get at most 1500 Points per day
累计消费达到指定额度可以免费领取高级积分。	Spend a certain Diamond to claim Adv. Point
*积分可以通过玩小游戏获得，可在商店中兑换道具。<br />*高级积分可以通过领取累计消费奖励获得，可在商店中兑换任意物品。	*Play mini-game to get Points and exchange for most items in shop.<br />*Claim Adv. Points from spending rewards and exchange for any items in shop.
*活动期间玩家充值钻石的数量会进行累计并进入排行榜，仅排名在前50的玩家可以获得奖励，奖励将在活动结束后通过邮件形式发放。<br />*称号及船员碎片奖励需要玩家活动期间内充值钻石达到一定数量才可获取，若活动期间内充值钻石不足则只可获取基本奖励 。	* Players who topped up during event will be recorded in Top-up ranking. No.1-50 will get rewards via in-game mail after event. <br />*Title and crew fragments will be sent when your top-up reached required Diamonds. Only basic rewards will be sent if your top-up amount is insufficient.

对敌方全阵营至多7人造成双属性伤害，并造成基于自身最大生命值的额外伤害，当目标处于异常状态时额外附加雷电1回合。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒： 觉醒后释放怒气降低为20点</font>	Deal Phy. DMG and SP DMG to at most 7 enemies, add extra damage based on Sengoku's max HP and cast Thunder Debuff if target is already in Debuff mode. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after awakening, fury cost reduces to 20</font>

<100/100/98% >"

战斗开始时，增加己方全阵营船员30%的伤害,持续5回合，每次卡普释放技能增加全小队10%攻击与技力，持续1回合。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒： 觉醒后每次释放技能增加全小队20%攻击与技力持续2回合</font>	"At the start of battle, increase allies' damage by 30% for 5 rounds. Every time Garp casts a skill, increase allies' ATK and SP by 10% for 1 round. <br /><font color=""#00EC00"">Can awake: after awakening, increase allies' ATK and SP by 20% for 2 round every time Garp casts a skill.
</font>"
卡普造成伤害时，目标每损失1%的生命值卡普提升0.6%的最终伤害<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒： 觉醒后目标每损失1%的生命值卡普提升1%的最终伤害</font>	When Garp deals damage, enemy's HP decreases by 1% and his damage increases by 0.6%. <br /><font color="#00EC00">After awakening, enemy's HP decreases by 1% and his damage increases by 1%. </font>
	
战斗开始时已方小队船员提升20%的攻击和技力持续5回合，战国释放奥义时根据【海军】标签人数回复人数*10的怒气，怒气越高我方小队造成的伤害提升越多，伤害结算时怒气值高于20点生效。怒气超出20点生效（初始20%，之后每增加10点，提升5%）<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒： 觉醒后战斗开始时提升全小队30%的攻击与技力</font>	When battle starts, increase all allies' ATK and SP by 20% for 5 rounds. When Sengoku use Ogi, restore fury by 10* the number of marine tag allies, more fury means team ATK and SP increases more. Every 10 fury that exceeds 20, your team gain extra 5% ATK and SP bonus (20% + 5% per 10 fury that exceeds 20).<br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after awakening, increase all allies' ATK and SP by 30% when battle starts.</font>
自身免疫负面状态，死亡后自动在两回合后复活，并回复40%生命值<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒： 觉醒后以60%的生命值复活</font>	Immune to all Debuffs, 2 rounds after being killed can revive and restore 40% HP.<br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after awakening, 2 rounds after being killed can revive and restore 60% HP.</font>
	
战斗开始时，增加己方全阵营船员30%的伤害,持续5回合，每次卡普释放技能增加全小队20%攻击与技力，持续2回合。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒： 觉醒后造成伤害时回复40%伤害量的生命值</font>	At the start of battle, increase allies' damage by 30% for 5 rounds. 战斗开始时，增加己方全阵营船员30%的伤害,持续5回合，每次卡普释放技能增加全小队20%攻击与技力，持续2回合并且卡普造成伤害时可以回复40%伤害量的生命值。	At the start of battle, increase allies' damage by 30% for 5 rounds. Every time Garp casts a skill, increase allies' ATK and SP by 20% for 2 round. When Garp deals damage, heal himself by 40% damage dealt.

战斗开始时已方小队船员提升30%的攻击和技力持续5回合，战国释放奥义时根据【海军】标签人数回复人数*10的怒气，怒气越高我方小队造成的伤害提升越多，伤害结算时怒气值高于20点生效。怒气超出20点生效（初始20%，之后每增加10点，提升5%）	When battle starts, increase all allies' ATK and SP by 20% for 5 rounds. When Sengoku use Ogi, restore fury by 10* the number of marine tag allies, more fury means team ATK and SP increases more. Every 10 fury that exceeds 20, your team gain extra 5% ATK and SP bonus (20% + 5% per 10 fury that exceeds 20).

"规则:\n1橙色船件升品到红色船件后，红色船件会继承升品前橙色船件的随机属性。
\n2.橙色船件升品到红色船件后，红色船件会继承原来橙色船件已有的经验，由于红色船件升级需要的经验较多，所以等级会有所下降。"	Rule:\n1. When orange ship parts improve to red quality, bonus attributes of orange ship parts will be transferred to red ship parts. \n2. EXP will be also transferred. Red ship parts require more EXP in each level, therefore the level of red ship parts may be lower than the orange ship parts.

对敌方全阵营目标造成双属性伤害，目标越多伤害越高，最高300%伤害，释放奥义后增加全小队60%减伤效果持续2回合，该技能免疫打断。（有更改：对敌方全阵营目标造成双属性伤害，命中目标越多最终技能造成的伤害越高（命中2人及以下为100%基础技能伤害，命中2人以上目标时每增加1个目标增加30%的技能伤害，伤害上限为基础技能伤害300%），释放奥义后增加全小队60%减伤效果持续2回合，该技能免疫打断。）	Deal at most 300% physical and SP damage to all enemies, cannot be disrupted. Hitting more targets means dealing more damages. After released, allies in self formation reduce DMG received by 60%. (更改版 Deal physical and SP damage to all enemies, cannot be disrupted. Hitting more targets means dealing more damages（If 2 or less targets are hit, deal 100% damage. If more than 2 targets are hit, add 30% damage from every target that exceeds 2, dealing 300% damage at most.) After released, allies in self formation reduce DMG received by 60%.)

晕眩：无法行动	Stun: target cannot take action
束缚：无法使用普攻	Trap: target cannot launch normal attack
沉默：无法使用奥义	Silence: target cannot use Ogi
冰冻：无法行动	Freeze: target cannot take action
石化：无法行动	Petrify: target cannot take action
睡眠：无法行动，受到伤害则苏醒	Hypnotize: target cannot take action but wake up after receiving damage
铁块：使受到的直接伤害降低为1	Tekkai: damage received reduces to 1
封印：无法使用技能，无法驱散，无视魔免	Seal: target cannot use Ogi; this Debuff cannot be dispelled and ignore immunity.

海神眷顾：提升15%攻击、15%技巧、15%暴击	Poseidon's Mercy: increase ATK by 15%, SP by 15% and Crit by 15%.
减速：受到减速效果船员在大回合末才行动	Slow Down: target will take action at the end of this round
嘲讽：当站在第一列时，敌方的普通攻击只能指定他为目标	Taunt: when target deployed in front column, enemies' normal attack can only be launched to this target.

标记：防御降低、抵抗降低	Mark: reduce DEF and RES

感恩星	Thanksgiving Star
*1.活动期间完成每日任务可获得餐具。<br />*2.每个任务每天只可完成一次，任务状态每日0点重置。<br />*3.请及时领取任务奖励，以免造成不必要的损失。	*1. Complete daily quest to obtain Tableware. <br />*2. Every quest can be completed once per day and resets at 00:00 every day. <br />*3.Please claim rewards in time.
*1.使用餐具可以打开盘子，餐具不足时可使用钻石补齐差额，1餐具=10钻石。<br />*2.每次获得三个相同图案的食物（不需要连续）可获得对应的感恩星；若打开美味火鸡图案，则本轮感恩星奖励翻倍。<br />*3.仅当打开所有盘子后才结算本轮感恩星，打开全部盘子后可重置状态开始新一轮游戏。	*1. Use Tableware to uncover plates. You can spend Diamonds if Tableware are insufficient. 1 set of Tableware equals to 10 Diamonds.   <br />*2. Player can obtain the corresponding Thanksgiving Star when they collect 3 pieces of the same food. Players can obtain double Thanksgiving Stars if they open a turkey pattern. <br />*3. Only when all plates are uncovered, players can move on to a new round.
*感恩星可以通过玩小游戏获得，可在商店中兑换任意道具。	Thanksgiving stars can be only obtained from mini-game. You can use it to exchange for items in shop.
*活动期间玩家充值钻石的数量会进行累计并进入排行榜，仅排名在前50的玩家可以获得奖励，奖励将在活动结束后通过邮件形式发放。	*Players who top up during event will be recorded in Top-up rank. No.1 to No.50 will get rewards via in-game mail after event.
详细规则：<br />1.活动期间完成每日任务可获得餐具。<br />注：每个任务每天只可完成一次，任务状态每日0点重置，请及时领取任务奖励，以免造成不必要的损失。<br />2.2.使用餐具可以打开盘子，餐具不足时可使用钻石补齐差额，1餐具=10钻石。<br />3.每次获得三个相同图案的食物（不需要连续）可获得对应的感恩星；若打开获得美味火鸡，则本轮感恩星奖励翻倍。<br />4.仅当打开所有盘子后才结算本轮感恩星，打开所有盘子后可重置状态开始新一轮游戏。<br />5.在兑换商店中可以消耗感恩星兑换任意道具。<br />6.所有未消耗的感恩星在活动结束后将被清除，请及时兑换。	Rules:<br />1. Complete daily quest to obtain Tableware. <br />Note: Every quest can be completed only once per day and resets at 00:00 every day. Please claim rewards in time. <br />2.Use Tableware to uncover plates. You can spend Diamonds if Tableware are insufficient. 1 set of Tableware equals to 10 Diamonds.   <br />3. Player can obtain the corresponding Thanksgiving Stars when they collect 3 pieces of the same food. Players can obtain double Thanksgiving Stars if they open a turkey pattern. <br />4. Only when all plates are uncovered, players can move on to a new round. <br />5. Players can use Thanksgiving Stars to exchange for item in shop. <br />6. Unused Thanksgiving Stars will be cleared when event ends. Please use them in time.

If more than 2 targets are hit, add 50% damage for every target that exceeds 2, dealing 300% damage at most.) After released, allies in self formation reduce DMG received by 60%. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after awakening, generate shields for allies in self formation equal to <font color='#FF0000'>40%</font> own DEF after releasing Ogi. </font>
对敌方全阵营目标造成双属性伤害，命中目标越多最终技能造成的伤害越高（命中2人及以下为100%基础技能伤害，命中2人以上目标时每增加1个目标增加30%的技能伤害，伤害上限为基础技能伤害300%），释放奥义后增加全小队60%减伤效果持续2回合，同时为全小队增加一个基于自身40%防御的护盾，该技能免疫打断。	Deal physical and SP damage to all enemies, cannot be disrupted. Hitting more targets means dealing more damages（If 2 or less targets are hit, deal 100% damage. If more than 2 targets are hit, add 50% damage from every target that exceeds 2, dealing 300% damage at most.) After released, allies in self formation gain a shield equal to 40% own DEF and reduce DMG received by 60%.

伤害减免15%	Reduce DMG received by 15%
伤害提升15%	Increase DMG dealt by 15%
伤害提升10%	Increase DMG dealt by 10%
免疫晕眩、石化、睡眠、冰冻并且暴击率增加5%	Immune to Stun, Petrify, Hypnotize, Freeze debuff; increase Crit by 5%
死亡后有10%概率复活	After dying, has 10% chances to revive.
全小队伤害减免15%	Reduce DMG received by 15% for allies in self formation
受到物理伤害时增加自身2%的攻击与技力属性	Each time receiving physical attack, increase own ATK and SP by 2%.
受到物理伤害时, 使攻击者<font color="#00EC00">燃烧</font>1回合，并提升自己1%的技力和抗性。<	After receiving physical DMG, <font color=""#00EC00"">Burn</font> the attacker for 1 round and increase self SP and RES by 1%. <
对此船员造成物理伤害的敌人会受到1回合的<font color="#00EC00">冻僵</font>效果且提升自己5点速度直到战斗结束。	Increase own Agility by 5 until battle ends; the enemy who deals physical DMG to this ally will receive <font color="#00EC00">Freeze</font> Debuff for 1 round.
每回合<font color="#00EC00">闪避</font>第一次受到的奥义或普攻。	<font color="#00EC00">Dodge</font> the first Ogi or Normal attack received each round.
造成伤害时目标每损失1%的血量提升0.3%的最终伤害	When dealing damage, increases damage by 0.3% based on target's per 1% missing HP.
免疫负面状态	Immune to Debuffs
免疫晕眩、石化、睡眠、冰冻并且伤害提升5%	Immune to Stun, Petrify, Hypnotize, Freeze debuff; increase DMG dealt by 5%
战斗开始时，大幅提升己方阵营所有船员的10%暴击率，持续5回合	When battle starts, greatly increase team's Crit by 10% for 5 rounds.
每次触发暴击时提升自身3%攻击和3%闪避	Each time launching Crit Hit, increase own ATK and Dodge by 3%
对男性角色造成的伤害提高20%	Increase DMG dealt to male enemies by 20%.
每次行动前，治疗己方生命最低的1个船员，并解除一个负面状态。	Each time before taking actions, heal 1 ally with lowest HP and clear 1 Debuff.
战斗开始时，己方怒气增加20点。	When battle starts, increase self team Fury by 20.
每回合首次行动前解除已方全部负面状态	Each round before taking first action, clear all Debuffs for team.
每回合首次行动前，恢复基于自身攻击力的5%生命并增加10点怒气	Each round before taking first action, recover HP according to 5% own ATK and increase Fury by 10.
每次受到攻击时恢复自身2%的生命。	Each time receiving attack, heal self by 2% Max HP.
开场增加10点怒气	When battle starts, increase Fury by 10.
奥义击杀目标时立刻刷新CD	When Ogi kills a target, clear Ogi CD immediately.
每回合首次行动前增加20点怒气	Each round before taking first action, increase Fury by 20.

出血：每回合减少生命	Bleeding: reduce HP each round.
燃烧：每回合减少生命	Burn: reduce HP each round.
中毒：每回合减少生命	Poison: reduce HP each round.
雷电：每回合减少生命，并有概率造成晕眩	Thunder: reduce HP each round and has chance to stun target.
晕眩：无法行动	Stun: target cannot take action
束缚：无法使用普攻	Trap: target cannot launch normal attack
沉默：无法使用奥义	Silence: target cannot use Ogi
冰冻：无法行动	Freeze: target cannot take action
石化：无法行动	Petrify: target cannot take action
睡眠：无法行动，受到伤害则苏醒	Hypnotize: target cannot take action but wake up after receiving damage
铁块：使受到的直接伤害降低为1	Tekkai: damage received reduces to 1
封印：无法使用技能，无法驱散，无视魔免	Seal: target cannot use Ogi; this Debuff cannot be dispelled and ignore immunity.
鲜血诅咒：造成伤害的同时自己也会受伤30%	Blood Curse: receive 30% of the damage dealt to enemies
稻草人：船员免死，如果船员死亡会立刻复活并回复80%生命	Straw Voodoo Doll: target can revive and recover 80% HP
护盾：吸收伤害	Shield: absorb damage
狂暴：提升30%暴击、50%暴伤	Berserker: increase Crit by 30% and Crit DMG by 50%
衰弱：降低15%攻击、15%技巧、20%命中、20%精准	Weaken: reduce ATK by 15%, SP by 15%, Hit by 20% and Accuracy by 20%
海神眷顾：提升15%攻击、15%技巧、15%暴击	Poseidon's Mercy: increase ATK by 15%, SP by 15% and Crit by 15%.
双攻提升：攻击提升、技力提升	不用翻译
双攻降低：攻击降低、技力降低	不用翻译
双防提升：防御提升、抵抗提升	不用翻译
双防降低：防御降低、抵抗降低	不用翻译
减速：受到减速效果船员在大回合末才行动	Slow Down: target will take action at the end of this round
嘲讽：当站在第一列时，敌方的普通攻击只能指定他为目标	Taunt: when target deployed in front column, enemies' normal attack can only be launched to this target.
杀意：伤害提升30%，奥义击杀无冷却	不用翻译
根性：免疫负面状态，伤害减免提升30%	不用翻译
分析：奥义击杀无冷却	不用翻译
剑客根性：剑客免疫负面状态，伤害减免提升30%	不用翻译
强化嘲讽：闪避提升90%、当站在第一列时，敌方的普通攻击只能指定他为目标	Taunt II: increases dodge by 90%; when target deployed in front column, enemies' normal attack can only be launched to this target.
标记：防御降低、抵抗降低	Mark: reduce DEF and RES
强化燃烧：每回合扣血，该燃烧无法驱散、无视状态免疫，并且中了此燃烧时无法回血	Burn II: reduce HP each round and cannot recover HP; this Debuff ignores immunity and cannot be dispelled.
冻僵：按百分比降低速度	Frost: reduce Agility by a certain percentage
额外普攻：本轮大回合中可进行额外普攻	Extra Attack: can launch extra normal attack in this round
激励：阵营所有船员提升XX%的伤害	Courage: increase allies' DMG by XX%
全小队伤害增加：本轮大回合小队船员提升XX%伤害	Team DMG Buff: increase DMG for allies in self formation by XX%
奥义怒气消耗增加：奥义释放怒气值增加XX%该效果无法驱散、无视状态免疫	Fury cost up: increase Fury cost by XX%;  this Debuff ignores immunity and cannot be dispelled.
吸血：攻击造成的伤害百分比转化为生命值	Blood Suck: heal self by a certain percentage of damage dealt
怒气伤害加成：怒气越高，伤害越高	Bonus DMG from Fury: more fury means more damage dealt.
The Strongest Man：小队队友攻击，进行协助攻击	The Strongest Man: assist allies to attack
Father and Kids：小队血最少的队友受到伤害，对造成伤害的目标进行追击	Father and Kids: when ally with the lowest HP receive damage, counterattack the damage dealer
易伤：受到的伤害增加	AMP DMG: increase damage received
速度增伤：对速度比自己低的目标造成伤害增加	Bonus DMG from Fury: deal more damage to target with lower agility
狂怒：增加普攻跟奥义的伤害	Furor: increase damage of normal attack and Ogi
怒气伤害加成（小队）：怒气越高，伤害越高	Bonus DMG from Fury (Team): more fury means more damage dealt
强化冰冻（无视魔免）：无法行动	Freeze II: cannot take action; this Debuff ignore immunity
	
	
cfg_carnival	cfg_carnival
感恩星	Thanksgiving Star
	
	
cfg_carnival_module	cfg_carnival_module
*1.活动期间完成每日任务可获得餐具。<br />*2.每个任务每天只可完成一次，任务状态每日0点重置。<br />*3.请及时领取任务奖励，以免造成不必要的损失。	*1. Complete daily quest to obtain Tableware. <br />*2. Every quest can be completed once per day and resets at 00:00 every day. <br />*3.Please claim rewards in time.
*1.使用餐具可以打开盘子，餐具不足时可使用钻石补齐差额，1餐具=10钻石。<br />*2.每次获得三个相同图案的食物（不需要连续）可获得对应的感恩星；若打开美味火鸡图案，则本轮感恩星奖励翻倍。<br />*3.仅当打开所有盘子后才结算本轮感恩星，打开全部盘子后可重置状态开始新一轮游戏。	*1. Use Tableware to uncover plates. You can spend Diamonds if Tableware are insufficient. 1 set of Tableware equals to 10 Diamonds.   <br />*2. Player can obtain the corresponding Thanksgiving Star when they collect 3 pieces of the same food. Players can obtain double Thanksgiving Stars if they open a turkey pattern. <br />*3. Only when all plates are uncovered, players can move on to a new round.
*感恩星可以通过玩小游戏获得，可在商店中兑换任意道具。	Thanksgiving stars can be only obtained from mini-game. You can use it to exchange for items in shop.
*活动期间玩家充值钻石的数量会进行累计并进入排行榜，仅排名在前50的玩家可以获得奖励，奖励将在活动结束后通过邮件形式发放。	*Players who top up during event will be recorded in Top-up rank. No.1 to No.50 will get rewards via in-game mail after event.
详细规则：<br />1.活动期间完成每日任务可获得餐具。<br />注：每个任务每天只可完成一次，任务状态每日0点重置，请及时领取任务奖励，以免造成不必要的损失。<br />2.2.使用餐具可以打开盘子，餐具不足时可使用钻石补齐差额，1餐具=10钻石。<br />3.每次获得三个相同图案的食物（不需要连续）可获得对应的感恩星；若打开获得美味火鸡，则本轮感恩星奖励翻倍。<br />4.仅当打开所有盘子后才结算本轮感恩星，打开所有盘子后可重置状态开始新一轮游戏。<br />5.在兑换商店中可以消耗感恩星兑换任意道具。<br />6.所有未消耗的感恩星在活动结束后将被清除，请及时兑换。	Rules:<br />1. Complete daily quest to obtain Tableware. <br />Note: Every quest can be completed only once per day and resets at 00:00 every day. Please claim rewards in time. <br />2.Use Tableware to uncover plates. You can spend Diamonds if Tableware are insufficient. 1 set of Tableware equals to 10 Diamonds.   <br />3. Player can obtain the corresponding Thanksgiving Stars when they collect 3 pieces of the same food. Players can obtain double Thanksgiving Stars if they open a turkey pattern. <br />4. Only when all plates are uncovered, players can move on to a new round. <br />5. Players can use Thanksgiving Stars to exchange for item in shop. <br />6. Unused Thanksgiving Stars will be cleared when event ends. Please use them in time.

世界政府公认的七位大海贼，拥有灾难性的破坏力量和与国家匹敌的巨大战力。	The seven powerful and notorious pirates who have allied themselves with the World Government.
各自修炼2年后重聚的草帽一伙，每个人都有着强大的战力。	Every one in Straw Hat Pirates have greatly improved until the reunion after 2 years .
世界政府直属组织，以绝对的正义为名义在全世界海洋维持治安工作。	An organization under World Government in charge of oceans by the name of absolute justice.
全世界为之震颤大海贼，拥有着与海军正面对抗的力量。	Grand pirates with power and awe that keep Marine in check.
	
	
	
几百年前，由所有鱼人岛居民建造的巨大船只。传说指出这是岛上居民的梦想，人们托付给这艘船的思念到底是什么？	All dwellers on Fishman Island built this giant ship hundreds of years ago. Legend has it that this ship was their dream but what exactly it was?
海贼王罗杰所搭乘的海贼船！是一艘汤姆以宝树亚当为材料制造的船，也是世界上唯一成功航行[伟大航路]一周的船只。	It was Gol D. Roger's ship, made from the treasure tree "Adam" and the only ship that has sailed to the end of the Grand Line.
	
	
	
为本小队生命最少的1个船员恢复基于战船30%攻击和技力的生命值，并提升他们基于战船10%的防御和抗性属性，持续1回合。<br />进场冷却: 1 回合   释放冷却: 4 回合	Heal an ally with lowest HP, which is equal to 30% of Ship's ATK & SP, and increase DEF and RES equal to 10% of Ship's DEF & RES for 1 round. <br />Start CD Time: 1 Round   CD Time: 4 Rounds

After released, allies in self formation reduce DMG received by 60%.<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒: 觉醒后,命中2人以上目标时每增加1个目标增加<font color='#FF0000'>50%</font>的技能伤害。</font>	Deal physical and SP damage to all enemies, cannot be disrupted. Hitting more targets means dealing more damages（If 2 or less targets are hit, deal 100% damage. If more than 2 targets are hit, add 30% damage from every target that exceeds 2, dealing 300% damage at most.) After released, allies in self formation reduce DMG received by 60%.<br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after awakening, if more than 2 targets are hit, add <font color='#FF0000'>50%</font> damage for every target that exceeds 2. </font>
对敌方全阵营目标造成双属性伤害，命中目标越多最终技能造成的伤害越高（命中2人及以下为100%基础技能伤害，命中2人以上目标时每增加1个目标增加50%的技能伤害，伤害上限为基础技能伤害300%），释放奥义后增加全小队60%减伤效果持续2回合，该技能免疫打断。<br /><font color="#00EC00">可觉醒: 觉醒后,奥义释放后为全小队增加一个基于自身<font color='#FF0000'>40%</font>防御的护盾。</font>	Deal physical and SP damage to all enemies, cannot be disrupted. Hitting more targets means dealing more damages（If 2 or less targets are hit, deal 100% damage. After released, allies in self formation reduce DMG received by 60%. <br /><font color="#00EC00">Can awake: after awakening, generate shields for allies in self formation equal to <font color='#FF0000'>40%</font> own DEF after releasing Ogi. </font>
对敌方全阵营目标造成双属性伤害，命中目标越多最终技能造成的伤害越高（命中2人及以下为100%基础技能伤害，命中2人以上目标时每增加1个目标增加30%的技能伤害，伤害上限为基础技能伤害300%），释放奥义后增加全小队60%减伤效果持续2回合，同时为全小队增加一个基于自身40%防御的护盾，该技能免疫打断。	Deal physical and SP damage to all enemies, cannot be disrupted. Hitting more targets means dealing more damages（If 2 or less targets are hit, deal 100% damage. If more than 2 targets are hit, add 50% damage from every target that exceeds 2, dealing 300% damage at most.) After released, allies in self formation gain a shield equal to 40% own DEF and reduce DMG received by 60%.
